src: मैं एक स्ट्रोक से ठीक हो रहा था.
mt: I was recovering from a stroke.
ref: I was recovering from a stroke.

src: बॉब को इससे नफ़रत थी क्योंकि वह उस किरदार जैसा बिल्कुल भी नहीं था.
mt: Bob hated the role because he was nothing like the character.
ref: Bob hated it because he was nothing like that character.

src: उसके बच्चों ने ज़ोर देकर कहा कि वह बैठ कर उसे उनके साथ देखे.
mt: His children urged him to sit and watch them.
ref: Her kids insisted that she sit down to watch it with them.

src: उसने महसूस किया कि वह उसके किचेन का लाइट बल्ब था जो ख़राब हो कर जल रहा था.
mt: He felt that he was the kitchen light bulb that was broken and burning.
ref: She realized it was the light bulb in her kitchen burning out.

src: लेकिन तभी उसे एक ज़रूरी फ़ोन कॉल आ गया.
mt: But then he got an important phone call.
ref: But then she got an important phone call.

src: वह महसूस करता है कि उसकी कॉफ़ी ख़रीदने की आदत बहुत महंगी है.
mt: He feels that his habit of buying coffee is very expensive.
ref: He realizes that his coffee buying habit is very expensive.

src: जब वह स्कूल में पहुंची तो वह उसे खोजने के लिए गई.
mt: When she arrived at school, she went to look for him.
ref: When she walked into the school she went looking for her.

src: दौड़ के दौरान उसने परेशानी महसूस की जब इतने सारे लोगों ने उसे पार किया.
mt: She felt overwhelmed when so many people passed her.
ref: During the race he felt frustrated when so many people passed him.

src: उसकी डेट ने उसे पिक अप किया और उसे एक सुंदर गुलाब दिया.
mt: His date picked him up and gave him a beautiful rose.
ref: Her date picked her up and gave her a beautiful rose.

src: उसने स्क्रैंटन, पेनसिल्वेनिया में सवारी की.
mt: He flew from Scranton, Pennsylvania.
ref: He rode into Scranton, Pennsylvania.

src: उसने अपनी भड़कीली नॉटिकल यूनिफ़ार्म पहनने के लिए इंतज़ार करने का प्लैन किया था.
mt: She was planning to wait until she was ready to wear her flashy naval uniform.
ref: He planned to wait to put on his gaudy nautical uniform.

src: मैंने उसे बताया कि मेरा कुत्ता काटता है.
mt: I told him that my dog bites.
ref: I told her that my dog bites.

src: वह फ़ैसला करता है की एक दिन एक फूल के चित्र को बनाने की कोशिश करेगा.
mt: He decides to try to draw a picture of a flower one day.
ref: He decides to try to draw a picture of a flower one day.

src: यह कैसे करना है इस पर उसने स्कूल में एक किताब पढ़ी.
mt: He read a book in school on how to do this.
ref: He read a book in school on how to do this.

src: उसकी कई मनपसंद फ़िल्में जापानी में थीं.
mt: She had many of her favorite films in Japanese.
ref: Many of her favorite movies were in Japanese.

src: उसने अपनी जैकेट पहन ली और बाहर चला गया.
mt: He put on his jacket and walked out.
ref: He put on his jacket and went outside.

src: जैसे रात आई उसने अपने ज़रिए किए गए काम को जांचा.
mt: As night fell, she checked her work.
ref: As night approached he surveyed the work he'd done.

src: जैसे ही मैं एक बाहर निकलने के रस्ते से गुज़र रहा था, मुझे अपनी बांह पर ठंडा, सख़्त स्टील महसूस हुआ.
mt: As I was walking down a corridor, I felt a cold, hard steel on my arm.
ref: As I was passing an exit, I felt cold, hard steel on my arm.

src: ख़ून बह कर उसके पैर से नीचे गया और उसके जूते में चला गया.
mt: Blood ran out and went down his feet and into his shoes.
ref: The blood ran down her foot and into her shoe.

src: वह बहुत होशियार था लेकिन पढ़ने में दिक्कत का सामना करता था.
mt: He was very bright but struggled with reading.
ref: He was very smart but struggled with reading.

src: उसने सभी के लिए फल का सलाद बनाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: He decided to make a fruit salad for everyone.
ref: She decided to make a fruit salad for everyone.

src: वह उसे हर जगह अपने साथ ले जाती थी.
mt: She took him everywhere with her.
ref: She took it with her everywhere.

src: मैं 22 का था और वह 38 साल का था.
mt: I was 22 and he was 38.
ref: I was 22 and he was 38 years old.

src: उसने भूमिका को ध्यान से पढ़ा.
mt: She read the role carefully.
ref: He studied the part carefully.

src: उससे पूरी क्लास जलन करती है.
mt: 100% of the class is on fire.
ref: She is envied throughout the class.

src: जश्न मनाने के लिए हम सब ड्राइव पर गए.
mt: We all went for a drive to celebrate.
ref: To celebrate we all went for a drive.

src: वह हमेशा इसे लगाना चाहती है.
mt: She always wanted to do this.
ref: She always wants it put on.

src: उसने स्कोरबोर्ड पर नज़र डाली, और देखा कि केवल 5 सेकंड बाकी थे.
mt: She looked at the scoreboard, and saw that only five seconds remained.
ref: He glanced at the scoreboard, and saw there was only 5 seconds left.

src: जब मैंने इधर-उधर देखा तो मुझे एक बच्चा दिखाई दिया.
mt: When I looked around, I saw a child.
ref: When I looked around, I noticed a kid.

src: वे छह महीने से कोशिश कर रहे थे लेकिन सफलता नहीं मिली.
mt: They had been trying for six months but failed.
ref: They had been trying for six months with no success.

src: कैथरीन को एथलीट को टेलीविजन पर उस खेल को खेलते हुए देखना बहुत अच्छा लगता है.
mt: Katherine likes to watch athletes play the game on television.
ref: Catherine loves watching the athletes play the sport on television.

src: आख़िरकार वह ड्राइविंग लाइसेंस के लिए काफ़ी बड़ा हो चुका है.
mt: Finally, it is big enough for a driving license.
ref: Finally he is old enough for a driver's license.

src: मुझे वह बेहद पसंद आया.
mt: I really liked that.
ref: I absolutely loved it.

src: मैं नींद से बिस्तर से उठा और नहा लिया.
mt: I woke up from bed and took a shower.
ref: I drowsily got out of bed and took a shower.

src: एक दिन वह लिसा को एक कविता लिखने का फ़ैसला करता है.
mt: 1 day later, he decides to write a poem for Lisa.
ref: One day he decides to write Lisa a Poem.

src: उसने फ़ैसला किया कि जाने से पहले उसे फ़्रेंच बोलना सीखना चाहिए.
mt: He decided to learn French before he went.
ref: He decides that he should learn to speak French before he goes.

src: उसका दोस्त एक बेहतरीन फोटोग्राफ़र था, लेकिन उसने कभी कोशिश नहीं की थी.
mt: His friend was a great photographer, but he had never tried.
ref: His friend was an excellent photographer, but he had never tried.

src: यह एक हाई डेफ़िनिशन क्वालिटी पिक्चर के साथ एक बड़ी फ़्लैटस्क्रीन है.
mt: This is a high definition quality picture with a big flatscreen.
ref: It is a big flatscreen with a  high definition quality picture.

src: और उसने एक छोटी लड़की को गुब्बारा पकड़े हुए देखा.
mt: And he saw a little girl holding a balloon.
ref: And he saw a little girl holding a balloon.

src: उसे एहसास हुआ कि उसका बायोडाटा ठीक से फ़ार्मेट किया हुआ नहीं था.
mt: He realized his biodata was not properly formatted.
ref: She realized her resume was not formatted properly.

src: उसने उनके जातीय व्यंजन का स्वाद चखा.
mt: He sampled their ethnic cuisine.
ref: He tasted their ethnic cuisine.

src: मेरे आसपास एक पट्टे की ज़रुरत है.
mt: I need a lease around me.
ref: My neighborhood requires a leash.

src: इसलिए जो ने सोचा कि टहलना अच्छा रहेगा.
mt: So who thought walking would be good.
ref: So Joe thought it would be nice to take a walk.

src: आख़िरकार उसने UPS के आदमी को दरवाज़े तक आते हुए देखा.
mt: Finally, he saw the UPS man coming up the walk.
ref: Finally she saw the UPS man walking up to the door.

src: वह इसके बजाय वीडियो गेम खेलना चाहता था.
mt: He wanted to play video games instead.
ref: He wanted to play video games instead.

src: विजेता के पास $1000 कॉलेज स्कॉलरशिप जीतने का मौका होगा.
mt: 1st place winner will get a $1000 college scholarship.
ref: The winner would have a chance to win a $1000 college scholarship.

src: उसे मालूम हुआ कि उसका वॉलेट उसके कोट से चुराया गया था.
mt: He found out that his wallet had been stolen from his coat.
ref: He discovered that his wallet had been stolen from his coat.

src: उसने पहले कभी टायर नहीं बदला था.
mt: He had never changed a tire before.
ref: He had never changed a tire before.

src: वह फ़ैसला करता है कि उसे लैपटॉप में निवेश करने की ज़रूरत है.
mt: He decides he needs to invest in a laptop.
ref: He decides he needs to invest in a laptop.

src: उसका एक जॉब इंटरव्यू आने वाला था.
mt: He was going to have a job interview.
ref: He had a job interview coming up.

src: सैम, शॉन, और मैंने गेम खेले.
mt: Sam, Shawn, and I played a game.
ref: Sam, Sean, and I played games.

src: वह डाकघर गई.
mt: She went to the post office.
ref: She went to the post office.

src: उसने कुछ देर के लिए अपना काम बंद कर दिया.
mt: He stopped working for a few minutes.
ref: He closed his work for a while.

src: तब, उसके दोस्त ने उसे बताया कि प्लास्टिक पर्यावरण के लिए ख़राब है.
mt: Then his friend told him that plastic is bad for the environment.
ref: Then, his friend told him that plastic is bad for the environment.

src: उसने कुछ स्थानीय कलाकारों को फ़ोन किया और उनका रेट पूछा.
mt: He called some local artists and asked their rates.
ref: He called up some local artists and asked their rates.

src: उसने कई बार कोशिश की लेकिन हमेशा असफ़ल रही.
mt: He tried many times but always failed.
ref: She made several attempts but always failed.

src: वह पूरी गर्मियों में अपने स्थानीय पुस्तकालय से दूर रहने के विचार से नफ़रत करती थी.
mt: She hated the idea of not going to her local library all summer.
ref: She hated the thought of being away from her local library all summer.

src: वह आमतौर पर डेंटिस्ट से सच में बहुत डरता है.
mt: He is usually very afraid of the dentist in reality.
ref: He is normally really afraid of dentists.

src: उसे मिलने वाले हर मौके पर वह मिट्टी के पाई बना लेता.
mt: He always made mud pies in spite of the rain.
ref: He would make mud pies every chance he got.

src: रॉब के दोस्तों ने उसे सिक्स फ़्लैग का मुफ़्त टिकट देने का ऑफ़र दिया.
mt: Rob's friends offered him a free Six Flags ticket.
ref: Rob's friends offered him a free ticket to six flags.

src: उसने शुक्रवार का वादा किया था.
mt: He promised to do it on Friday.
ref: He promised to on Friday.

src: वह दुखी थी कि सब लोग उसका खास दिन भूल गए थे.
mt: She was sad that everyone forgot her special day.
ref: She was upset that everyone had forgotten her special day.

src: मैं बहुत गुस्से में था, मैंने बस उसके मुक्के से अपना बचाव किया.
mt: I was very angry, I just defended myself from his punches.
ref: As mad I was, I simply defended her punch.

src: बेकी और ऐश्ली बचपन में दोस्त हुआ करते थे.
mt: Beck and Ashlee were childhood friends.
ref: Becky and Ashley used to be friends when they were kids.

src: उनका गैर-ज़िम्मेदार पड़ोसी अक्सर अपना कुत्ता बाहर छोड़ जाता था, जो दिनभर भौंकता रहता था.
mt: Their irresponsible neighbor often left his dog outside, which barked all day.
ref: Their thoughtless neighbor often left his dog outside barking all day.

src: वह अपने नए स्कूल, बस से जाया करती थी.
mt: She went to her new school by bus.
ref: She took the bus to her new school.

src: वह चाहती थी कि दाँतों का डॉक्टर उसे सुला दे.
mt: She wanted the dentist to put her to sleep.
ref: She wanted the dentist to put her to sleep.

src: वह हर शाम असाइंमेंट को बेहतर बनाने के लिए उन पर काम करता था.
mt: He worked on improving the algorithm every night.
ref: He worked every evening on assignments in order to improve it.

src: यह कि मेरी बहुत सी हॉबी या रुचियाँ नहीं हैं.
mt: 1. I have no hobbies or interests.
ref: That I don't have many hobbies or interests.

src: पर उसके पास कुछ भी फ़ैंसी खरीदने के पैसे नहीं थे.
mt: But he didn't have the money to buy fancy things.
ref: But she could not afford anything fancy.

src: एक दिन वह किसी ट्रेल पर थी और उसे पेड़ पर बना एक घर दिखा.
mt: 1 day she was on a trail and saw a house built on a tree.
ref: One day she was on a trail and found a tree house.

src: ट्रेसी ने तय किया कि वह अपने घर के पीछे जंगल में घूमने जाएगी.
mt: Tracy decided to go for a walk in the woods behind her house.
ref: Tracey decided to go for a walk in the woods behind her house.

src: लेकिन, उसके पास एक भी पैसा नहीं था.
mt: But he had no money.
ref: Unfortunately, he didn't have any money.

src: उसकी पत्नी एक घंटे में वहाँ पहुँचने वाली थी.
mt: His wife was due to arrive an hour later.
ref: His wife would be there in an hour.

src: उसने स्कूल में कड़ी मेहनत की. वह फ़ुटबॉल टीम में था.
mt: She worked hard in school. She was on the football team.
ref: He worked really hard in school, was on the soccer team.

src: जीना को वह चाहिए था, लेकिन वह नहीं जानती थी कि उसे कहाँ से खरीदे.
mt: She wanted to live, but she didn't know where to buy it.
ref: Gina wanted one but didn't know where to buy one.

src: एक दिन, वह स्टोर जाने के लिए निकली.
mt: 1 day, she went to the store.
ref: One day, she left to go to the store.

src: वह पुरानी होती जा रही थी.
mt: She was getting old.
ref: It was becoming worn out.

src: उसे याद आया कि उसने मेहमानों के चीज़ के साथ खाने के लिए कुछ भी नहीं बनाया है.
mt: He remembered that he had not made anything to eat with the guest's things.
ref: He realizes he hasn't prepared anything for guests to eat with cheese.

src: एक दिन वह बहुत बीमार थी, लेकिन फिर भी काम पर गई.
mt: 1 day she was very sick, but still went to work.
ref: One day she was very sick but still went to work.

src: उन्होंने सारे गेम जीते और चैंम्पियनशिप में पहुँच गए.
mt: They won all the games and made it to the championship.
ref: They had won every game and made it to the championship.

src: एक दिन हवाएँ तेज़ चल रही थी, इसकी कुछ वजह इमारत की ऊँचाई भी थी.
mt: 1 day before, winds were strong, and the building was tall.
ref: One day the wind was strong, partly due to the height of the building.

src: उसने कई महीनों तक बचत की, ताकि वह एक अच्छा कीबोर्ड खरीद पाए.
mt: He saved up for months to buy a good keyboard.
ref: She saved up for months to afford a good keyboard.

src: वह हर रोज़ अपनी फ़ील्ड में जॉब के लिए आवेदन करता.
mt: He applies for a job in his field every day.
ref: He applied for jobs in his field every day.

src: उसका ज़्यादातर समय लाइब्रेरी में बीतता था.
mt: He spent most of his time in the library.
ref: Most of her time was spent in the library.

src: वह कार में बैठकर धैर्य के साथ पहुँचने का इंतज़ार कर रही थी.
mt: She was waiting patiently in her car to arrive.
ref: She sat patiently in the car waiting to arrive.

src: हाईवे पर, स्टीव ने अपनी कार बहुत तेज़ चलाई.
mt: On the highway, Steve drove his car very fast.
ref: On the highway, Steve drove his car very fast.

src: वह पार्टी के दिन तक बहुत खुश थी.
mt: She was very happy until the party day.
ref: She was so excited leading up to the party.

src: वह उदास था कि वह पैसे न होने की वजह से खाना नहीं खा सकता था.
mt: He was sad that he could not eat because he did not have money.
ref: He was sad that he couldn't eat because he had no money.

src: वह लगभग छह मील का था और मैंने कड़ी मेहनत की.
mt: It was about six miles long and I worked hard.
ref: It was about six miles and I worked real hard.

src: उसने अपने हाथ को घुमाया और जितना हो सका उतनी जोर से रोल-अप हवाई जहाज़ को फेंका.
mt: He rolled up his sleeve and threw the plane as hard as he could.
ref: He wound up his arm and threw roll-up airplane as hard as he could.

src: वह अचानक उठ बैठा.
mt: 1. He suddenly sat up.
ref: Suddenly he sat bolt upright.

src: जॉन, मेग से प्यार करता था और उससे शादी करना चाहता था.
mt: John loved Meg and wanted to marry her.
ref: John loved Meg, and wanted to marry her.

src: बॉबी ने अपना जूता फेंकने की कोशिश की, लेकिन वह फंस गया.
mt: Bobby tried to throw his shoe, but it got stuck.
ref: Bobby tried throwing his shoe, but it got stuck.

src: आखिरकार, 4 दिनों के बाद वह खाना खा सकी.
mt: 4 days later, she was finally able to eat.
ref: She was finally able to eat food after 4 days.

src: वह उसे बहुत पसंद थे.
mt: 1. He liked her very much.
ref: She loved them.

src: जिस तरह से नाव उठी और फिर गिरी, वह मार्कस को पसंद नहीं आया.
mt: The way the boat rose and fell did not please Marcus.
ref: Marcus hated the way the boat rose up and crashed down.

src: वह अपनी कुर्सी पर आराम से बैठ गई और उसने अपनी आँखें बंद कर लीं.
mt: She sat comfortably on her chair and closed her eyes.
ref: She got comfortable in her chair and closed her eyes.

src: वह अक्सर अपने दोस्तों के साथ वहां जाता रहता है.
mt: He often goes there with his friends.
ref: He goes there all the time with friends.

src: कैफ़े में बैठकर, वह अक्सर किताब पढ़ता था.
mt: He often read books while sitting in a cafe.
ref: While at the cafe, he usually read a book.

src: उसका ड्राइविंग लाइसेंस, बटुए में था.
mt: His driving license was in his wallet.
ref: His driver's license was in the wallet.

src: वह सिर्फ एस्केप रूम के रोमांच के बाहर नहीं खड़ा था.
mt: He was not just standing outside the thrill of the escape room.
ref: He was not just outside of the escape room adventure.

src: लेकिन इसे पूरा तो करना था.
mt: But it was not finished.
ref: But it had to be done.

src: स्कूल की छत, भार से दब गई थी.
mt: The school's roof collapsed under the weight.
ref: The school roof buckled under the weight.

src: मुझे बहुत आश्चर्य हुआ कि मेरे दोस्तों ने मेरे लिए एक पार्टी की योजना बनाई थी.
mt: I was surprised that my friends had planned a party for me.
ref: To my surprise my friends planned a party for me.

src: मैं उसे कचरे में से उठा लाया.
mt: I picked him up from the trash.
ref: I retrieved it from the trash.

src: हमने बोस्टन में रोव्स व्हार्फ से एक फ़ेरी ली.
mt: We took a ferry from Rowes Wharf in Boston.
ref: We took a ferry from Rowes Wharf in Boston.

src: जब मैं छोटा था, तब मुझे वह सब असली लगता था.
mt: When I was young, it all seemed real.
ref: I used to think it was real when I was young.

src: वह बच्चों और जानवरों के साथ आए लोगों के सामने से गुज़री.
mt: She passed in front of children and people with animals.
ref: She passed people with children and animals.

src: एक बिल्ली को तो नए कुत्ते से फ़र्क नहीं पड़ा, लेकिन दूसरी बिल्ला डरा हुआ था.
mt: 1 cat didn't care about the new dog, but the other cat was scared.
ref: One cat didn't mind the new dog, but the other cat was scared.

src: मैं आमतौर पर उसे नहीं देख सकता, क्योंकि वह एक अफ़्रीकी हिरन है.
mt: I usually can't see it, because it's an African antelope.
ref: I can't usually see them because it's an African antelope.

src: आखिर में मैंने सोचा कि यह उसकी ज़िम्मेदारी है.
mt: In the end, I thought it was her responsibility.
ref: I finally decided that it is her own responsibility.

src: उसने अपने भाइयों के साथ बहुत अभ्यास किया.
mt: He practiced with his brothers a lot.
ref: He practiced a lot with his brothers.

src: उसे समझ नहीं आ रहा था कि वह महक किसकी थी.
mt: He could not figure out what the smell was from.
ref: She could not figure out what it was.

src: उसने डेंटिस्ट के पास जाने का सोचा, ताकि उसे पता चले कि वजह क्या है.
mt: He thought about going to the dentist to find out what was causing it.
ref: He decides to visit his dentist to see what is the matter.

src: उसके पास पहली बार एक डिशवॉशर था.
mt: He had his first dishwasher.
ref: She had a dishwasher for the first time.

src: वे अपने खाने के लिए दौड़ पड़ीं.
mt: They ran to their food.
ref: The came running in for their food.

src: उसे टूटे अंगूठे से अपनी कार का दरवाज़ा खोलने में दिक्कत हो रही थी.
mt: She had trouble opening her car door with a broken pinky.
ref: He had trouble opening his car door with a broken thumb.

src: उसे बॉस ने कहा कि उसे जल्द ही एक कार बेचनी होगी.
mt: He was told by his boss that he would have to sell his car soon.
ref: Her boss tells her that she needs to sell a car soon.

src: दोनों बिल्लियां एक-दूसरे से नफ़रत करती थीं.
mt: The two cats hated each other.
ref: The two cats hated each other.

src: उसका फ़्लोर पुराना था और उसमें दरारें थीं.
mt: Its floor was old and had cracks in it.
ref: His was old and cracked.

src: उसने कुछ टिकट ऑर्डर कर दिए.
mt: He ordered some tickets.
ref: He ordered a few tickets.

src: 12 आदमी एक कास्केट लेकर आए.
mt: 12 men arrived in a van.
ref: 12 men brought a casket.

src: पहले चार राउंड में वह आगे रहा.
mt: 1st 4 rounds, he was ahead.
ref: He dominated the first four rounds.

src: उसने अपने बेडरूम के फ़र्श से आलू चिप्स का एक पैकेट उठाया.
mt: He picked up a packet of potato chips from the floor of his bedroom.
ref: He picked up a bag of potato chips from his bedroom floor.

src: पिता और बेटों की टीमों ने माचिस के डिब्बों से बनी छोटी कारें डिज़ाइन कीं.
mt: Father and son teams designed small cars made of matchbox containers.
ref: Father and son teams designed small matchbox cars.

src: दुर्भाग्य से वह टीम में शामिल नहीं हो सका.
mt: Unfortunately, he was not able to join the team.
ref: Unfortunately he did not make the team.

src: उसने पीछे देखा और पाया कि बर्फ़ की एक दीवार उसकी तरफ़ आ रही थी.
mt: He looked back and saw a wall of snow coming his way.
ref: She looked back and saw a wall of snow coming towards her.

src: फ़िल्म की रिलीज़ के दिन वह टिकट खिड़की पर लाइन में लगा रहा.
mt: On the day of the film's release, he was in line at the ticket booth.
ref: He waited in line at the box office on opening day.

src: वह बहुत सारे अजनबियों के बीच जाने से घबरा रहा था.
mt: He was afraid of going among many strangers.
ref: He was nervous about being around so many strangers.

src: एक सुबह जब बच्ची के कमरे से कोई आवाज़ नहीं आ रही थी, तब एलेन देखने गई कि क्या हुआ.
mt: When no sound came from the girl's room in the morning, Ellen went to see what was happening.
ref: One morning Ellen did not hear her baby fussing, so she went to check.

src: उसकी सबसे कीमती सीडी एक जैज़ सीडी थी, जिसपर दो डॉलफिन को एक साथ फोटोशॉप करके लगाया हुआ था.
mt: Her most valuable CD was a jazz CD, with two dolphins photoshopped together.
ref: She prized a jazz CD with two dolphins photoshopped together.

src: उस समय ज्वार आया हुआ था, तो उसने एक टाइड पूल देखा.
mt: 1. He saw a tide pool at low tide.
ref: The tide drew out, and she saw a tide pool.

src: उसके बाल और नाखून ख़राब हो जाएंगे और वहां टीवी भी नहीं थी.
mt: His hair and nails will be ruined and there was no TV there.
ref: It would ruin her hair and nails and there was no tv.

src: फिर उसे एहसास हुआ कि वह भटक गई है!
mt: She realized she was lost!
ref: Then she realized she was lost!

src: आज रात उसकी टीम, चैंपियनशिप गेम में खेल रही थी.
mt: His team was playing in the championship game tonight.
ref: His team was playing in the championship game tonight.

src: उसने उन सभी रेस्टोरेंट के बारे में सोचा, जहां वह हाल ही में गया था.
mt: He thought of all the restaurants he had been to recently.
ref: He thought back on all the restaurants he's recently visited.

src: एक दिन वह पिकनिक के लिए गया था.
mt: 1 day ago he went on a picnic.
ref: One day he was at a picnic.

src: उसने एक बंदूक अपने बेटे, क्रिस्चियन को दे दी.
mt: He gave his son a gun.
ref: He gave one to his son, Christian.

src: वह अपने माता-पिता के सामने नखरे दिखा रहा था कि बर्फ़ के बिना क्रिसमस का कोई मज़ा नहीं.
mt: He was showing off in front of his parents that there is no fun in Christmas without snow.
ref: He whined to his parents that it just wasn't Christmas without it.

src: अब, जब उसके बच्चे बड़े हो गए हैं, तब उसके पास कुछ खाली समय है.
mt: Now that her children are grown, she has some free time.
ref: Now that his children are grown up, he has more spare time.

src: इस वजह से, बेनसन की रातों की नींद उड़ने लगी.
mt: As a result, Benson's nights were getting restless.
ref: Benson began losing sleep about it.

src: जगह बनाने के लिए हमने कुछ मिनट खुदाई की.
mt: We dug for a few minutes to make room.
ref: We dug for several minutes trying to make room.

src: सैम, कैरेन को याद कर रहा था, लेकिन उसने इसका एक उपाय खोजा था.
mt: Sam was thinking of Karen, but he had found a way around it.
ref: Sam was missing Karen, but he had a plan to fix that.

src: वह मार्शमैलो को भूनने के लिए आग जलाना चाहता था.
mt: He wanted to burn marshmallows over the fire.
ref: He wanted to start a fire to roast marshmallows.

src: वह शौचालय धोती है और फर्श साफ़ करती है.
mt: She cleans the toilet and mops the floor.
ref: She washes toilets and scrubs floors.

src: जेसन ने सोचा कि वह शादी से पहले हिंदी बोलना सीखेगा.
mt: Jason thought he would learn Hindi before the wedding.
ref: Jason decides that he wants to learn Hindi before the wedding.

src: टॉड को ऐशली से चिढ़ हो गई थी.
mt: Todd was jealous of Ashley.
ref: Todd got irritated with Ashley.

src: हम सभी तैयार हो गए और इवेंट के लिए बहुत उत्साहित थे.
mt: We were all ready and very excited for the event.
ref: We got all dressed up for the exciting event.

src: उन्होंने तय किया कि वे कुछ कूकीज़ बेक करेंगी.
mt: They decided to bake some cookies.
ref: The girls decided to bake some cookies.

src: कभी-कभी वे ऐसी बातें कह देती हैं जिनका उन्हें कोई मतलब नहीं होता।
mt: Sometimes they say things that don't mean anything.
ref: Sometimes they say things they do not mean.

src: कई घंटों से बर्फ बहुत ज़्यादा गिर रही थी।
mt: Snow had been falling heavily for many hours.
ref: The snow was coming down very hard for many hours.

src: लैरी पहले अपनी कॉफी से वास्तव में ऊर्जावान महसूस कर रहा था।
mt: Larry felt really energetic from his coffee.
ref: Larry was feeling really energetic from his coffee earlier.

src: लेकिन पूरा दिन बीत गया और किसी ने उसे कोई उपहार नहीं दिया।
mt: But the whole day passed and no one gave him a present.
ref: But the whole day went by and no one gave her any gifts.

src: मैंने अपने आस पास नयी की तलाश का फैसला किया ताकि मुझे खुशी हो।
mt: I decided to look for new things around me so that I could be happy.
ref: I decided to look around for a new one so I would be happy.

src: जूते बहुत महंगे थे।
mt: The shoes were very expensive.
ref: The shoes were very expensive.

src: वह एक हफ्ते तक साफ पानी के बिना रहने की कल्पना भी नहीं कर सकती थी!
mt: She couldn't even imagine going a week without clean water!
ref: She couldn't imagine going without clean water for a week!

src: वह पहले कभी नहीं खेली थी और घबराई हुई थी।
mt: She had never played before and was nervous.
ref: She had never played before and was nervous.

src: उसने तीन बसें पकड़ीं।
mt: He stopped three buses.
ref: She caught three buses.

src: उसकी मां उसे बैग विभाग में ले गई।
mt: His mother took him to the baggage department.
ref: Her mother took her to the bag department.

src: उसने उसे अपने बिस्तर के पास रखा।
mt: He put him by his bed.
ref: He kept it by his bed.

src: वह पिछले दो सीजन से चोटिल हैं।
mt: He has been injured in the past two seasons.
ref: For the last two seasons he has been injured.

src: उसने तुरंत टास्क पढ़ीं।
mt: He immediately read the task.
ref: She immediately read through the task.

src: उसका कुछ भी खरीदने का इरादा नहीं है, लेकिन बस घूमना चाहता है।
mt: He has no intention of buying anything, but just wanted to walk around.
ref: He does not intend on buying anything, but just wants to walk around.

src: उसने पूरा दिन बर्बाद कर दिया था और उसे पूरा करने के लिए केवल एक ही बचा था।
mt: He had wasted the whole day and had only one left to finish.
ref: She had wasted the whole day and only had one left to complete it.

src: हम पिछले कुछ मंगलवार को बहुत व्यस्त रहे हैं।
mt: We have been very busy the last few Mondays.
ref: We have been too busy the last couple of Tuesdays.

src: बॉब ने पार्क में टहलने जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: Bob decided to go for a walk in the park.
ref: Bob decided to go for a walk at the park.

src: टिकट ऑनलाइन बिक्री पर मिलने लगे और सर्वर बहुत व्यस्त था।
mt: Tickets were going online and servers were very busy.
ref: Tickets went on sale online and the server was very busy.

src: उसकी माँ ने उसका सारा सामान पैक करने में उसकी मदद की, और वह चला गया।
mt: His mother helped him pack all his belongings, and he left.
ref: His mom helped him pack all his stuff, and he drove away.

src: अपने भरे iPod के बावजूद, वह संगीत से ऊब गई।
mt: Despite her iPod being full, she got bored of music.
ref: Despite her very full iPod, she became bored with music.

src: अरी अंदाजन सहमत हो गयी।
mt: Ari Andajan agreed.
ref: Ari tentatively agreed.

src: उसकी एक हेडलाइट बंद हो गयी थी और उसे लगा कि यह सुरक्षित है।
mt: One of its headlights was out and he thought it was safe.
ref: One of his headlights was out and he thought it was safer.

src: यह मज़ेदार था, और वे एक घंटे तक खेले।
mt: It was fun, and they played for an hour.
ref: It was all in fun, and they played for an hour.

src: उसने एक कार का विज्ञापन देखा जो किसी यात्रा के लिए बहुत बढ़िया होगी।
mt: He saw an ad for a car that would be great for a trip.
ref: She saw a commercial advertising a car that would be great for a trip.

src: वह शहरों और ग्रामीण इलाकों से मंत्रमुग्ध था।
mt: He was mesmerized by the cities and the countryside.
ref: He was enthralled with the cities and countryside.

src: हालाँकि वह एक गर्लफ्रेंड चाहता था, वह नहीं जानता था कि किसी से कैसे संपर्क किया जाए।
mt: Though he wanted a girlfriend, he didn't know how to contact anyone.
ref: While he wanted a girlfriend he did not know how to approach anyone.

src: उसने हवाईअड्डे की सुरक्षा को जल्दबाजी से पार किया।
mt: He bypassed airport security in a hurry.
ref: She hurried through airport security.

src: वह तेज धूप में सो गई।
mt: She slept in the hot sun.
ref: She dozed off in the warm sun.

src: सेना ने कहा कि वह शामिल होने के लिए बहुत कमजोर था।
mt: The military said it was too weak to participate.
ref: The Army said he was too weak to join.

src: डर के मारे भागते हुए, चूहा जितनी तेजी से आगे बढ़ सकता था, आगे बढ़ा।
mt: In fear, the rabbit ran as fast as it could, ahead.
ref: Running in fear, the rodent moved as fast as it could.

src: वहां, उन्होंने पर्यटन स्थलों का दौरा किया और स्थानीय मित्रवत लोगों को देखा।
mt: There, they toured tourist sites and met friendly locals.
ref: There, he visited tourist sites and saw friendly locals.

src: वह इसे शौक के तौर पर पसंद करती हैं।
mt: She likes it as a hobby.
ref: She enjoys this as a hobby.

src: उन्होंने संगीत वीडियो देखने का फैसला किया।
mt: They decided to watch a music video.
ref: They decided to watch music videos.

src: मैंने अपनी कार में सब कुछ पैक करना सुनिश्चित किया।
mt: I made sure to pack everything in my car.
ref: I made sure to pack everything up in my car.

src: वह सोचता है कि वे सभी खौफनाक होती हैं।
mt: He thinks they are all scary.
ref: He thinks all of them are creepy.

src: लिआ क्रेगलिस्ट खोजती है और प्रवेश स्तर की पोजीशन पाती है।
mt: Liya Craiglist searches and gets entry level position.
ref: Leah searches craigslist and finds an entry level position.

src: मुझे अपने कज़िन के लिए उपहार लेने थे।
mt: I was going to buy a gift for my cousin.
ref: I had to get gifts for my cousins.

src: उसने आराम के लिए होटलों में रुकने से इनकार कर दिया।
mt: He refused to stay in hotels for rest.
ref: He refused to stop at hotels for a break.

src: मैं ड्राइव करके शिकागो गया।
mt: I drove to Chicago.
ref: I drove to Chicago.

src: वह घबरा गई और उसे नहीं पता था कि क्या करना है।
mt: She was scared and didn't know what to do.
ref: She panicked and didn't know what to do.

src: और जेफ का कमरा बहुत गर्म था।
mt: And Jeff's room was very hot.
ref: And Jeff's room was very hot.

src: उन्होंने जॉय को चिढ़ाया और कहा कि यह उनकी कांच की आंख है।
mt: He taunted Joy and said that this was his glass eye.
ref: He teased Joey and said it was his glass eye.

src: छात्र दरवाजे की ओर दौड़े, गोलियों की आवाज आने पर रुक गए।
mt: Students ran toward the door, stopping when they heard the sound of gunshots.
ref: Rushing towards the door, the students stopped when gunshots rang out.

src: उसने पूरी तरह से काम करना बंद कर दिया।
mt: It has completely stopped working.
ref: It stopped working completely.

src: अभी मैं एक बार में केवल बीस मील की दूरी तक ही बाइक चला सकता हूँ।
mt: I can only ride my bike twenty miles at a time right now.
ref: Right now I can only bike about twenty miles at once.

src: जिस गर्मी में मैं 19 साल का था, वह आखिरी बार था जब मैंने कैंप किया था।
mt: 19 years ago, the last time I camped was in the heat.
ref: The summer I was 19 was the last time I camped.

src: जब तक मैं कक्षा से निकला, तब तक मैं इसके बारे में भूल चुका था।
mt: I had forgotten all about it by the time I left class.
ref: By the time I left the classroom, I had forgotten about it.

src: वह यह सुनिश्चित करने के लिए देर तक रुकती थी कि उसका काम सही है।
mt: She would stay late to make sure her work was right.
ref: She stays late to make sure her work is correct.

src: हमने इस विषय पर एक किताब को देखा और पढ़ा।
mt: We have seen and read a book on this subject.
ref: We checked out a book on the subject and read up.

src: उसके पिता उससे बहुत परेशान थे।
mt: His father was very worried about him.
ref: His father was very upset with him.

src: वह टेबल के नीचे छिप गई और रोने लगी।
mt: She hid under the table and started crying.
ref: She hid under the table and cried.

src: हम एक नया खेल खेलना चाहते थे।
mt: We wanted to play a new game.
ref: We wanted to play a new game.

src: मैं एक नया खरीदने के लिए स्टोर पर गया।
mt: I went to the store to buy a new one.
ref: I went to the store to buy a new one.

src: उसने देखा कि वह अपनी पाठ्यपुस्तक घर पर भूल गई है।
mt: She saw that she had left her textbook at home.
ref: She noticed that she forgot her textbook at home.

src: मैं सीधे दूसरे स्कीयर के रास्ते में चला गया।
mt: I went straight into the path of the other skier.
ref: I skied directly in the path of another skier.

src: लेकिन उसके पास ज्यादा पैसे नहीं थे।
mt: But he didn't have much money.
ref: But he didn't have a lot of money.

src: उन्होंने उसे तब तक परेशान किया जब तक वह कैंपिंग पर चला नहीं गया।
mt: He harassed her until she went camping.
ref: They bugged him until he went camping anyway.

src: उसने नौकरी की पोस्टिंग के लिए वर्गीकृत विज्ञापनों की खोज की।
mt: He searched classified ads for job postings.
ref: He searched the classified ads for job postings.

src: उसने सबक लिया और खाना बनाना सीखने के लिए कड़ी मेहनत की।
mt: He learned and worked hard to learn how to cook.
ref: He took lessons and worked hard learning how to cook.

src: लेकिन वह फोर्क लाना भूल गई थी!
mt: But she forgot to bring the fork!
ref: But she had forgotten to bring forks!

src: कपड़े पहनने से पहले, उसने चेक किया कि स्कूल की छुट्टी तो नहीं हो गई.
mt: Before getting dressed, he checked to make sure school was not out.
ref: Before she got dressed, she checked to see if school was canceled.

src: नेल टेक्निशियन ने उसके नाखून साफ़ किए और काटे.
mt: A nail technician cleaned and cut her nails.
ref: The nail technician cleaned and trimmed her nails.

src: बहादुर होने का दिखावा करते हुए, वे एक अंधेरे घर में गए.
mt: Bravely, they went into a dark house.
ref: Faking a brave face, the went forth into the darkened house.

src: उसने हाई स्कूल में कुश्ती ले ली.
mt: He took up wrestling in high school.
ref: He took wrestling in high school.

src: पर खाना खराब था और वेटर उससे भी बुरा था.
mt: The food was bad and the waiter was worse.
ref: But the food was bad and the waiter was even worse!

src: उसके माता-पिता टैटू करवाने के बिल्कुल खिलाफ़ थे.
mt: Her parents were completely against her getting tattoos.
ref: Her parents were very against the idea of tattoos.

src: उसने तय किया कि वह कोई एक्सपेरिमेंट करेगी.
mt: She decided to do an experiment.
ref: She decided she must perform an experiment.

src: जैक्लिन और रॉब की आपस में नहीं बनती.
mt: Jackle and Rob don't get along.
ref: Jaclyn and Rob do not get along.

src: उनके यहाँ रात का खाना खाने मेहमान आने वाले थे और वे केक बनाने वाली थीं.
mt: They were expecting guests for dinner and were baking a cake.
ref: They were going to have dinner guests and were baking a cake.

src: उसे भगवान मिल गए और उसने बुरे रास्तों पर चलना छोड़ दिया.
mt: He found God and stopped walking the bad road.
ref: He found god and changed his wicked ways.

src: उसे शुरू में खूब मज़ा आया.
mt: It was fun at first.
ref: She had fun at first.

src: पर उसकी नई जॉब की वजह से उसे खाना बनाने के लिए उतना समय नहीं मिलता था.
mt: But she didn't have time to cook because of her new job.
ref: But her new job meant she had less time to make food.

src: उसे अपने हुनर के लिए हमेशा सराहा जाता.
mt: He is always praised for his skill.
ref: He would always get recognition for his talent.

src: सूज़न ने ई-मेल चेक करने के लिए, थिएटर में अपना फ़ोन इस्तेमाल किया.
mt: Susan checked her email by using her phone in the theater.
ref: Susan used her cell phone in the theater to check her e-mail.

src: वह कभी नहीं खिला.
mt: He never smiled.
ref: It never bloomed.

src: अब सूरज ढल रहा था.
mt: The sun was setting.
ref: Now the sun was setting.

src: आज उसका बिल्कुल पहला बास्केटबॉल गेम था.
mt: It was his first basketball game ever.
ref: Tonight was his very first basketball game.

src: वसंत करीब आ रहा था और वह पौधे लगाना शुरू करना चाहते थे.
mt: Spring was approaching and he wanted to start planting.
ref: Spring was quickly approaching and he wanted to start planting.

src: उसका बॉयफ़्रेंड पूरे खाने के दौरान अजीब तरह से बर्ताव कर रहा था.
mt: Her boyfriend was acting strangely throughout the entire meal.
ref: Her boyfriend had been acting weird all through dinner.

src: उसके दोस्तों ने उसे बाहर ले जाकर उसे खुश करने की कोशिश की.
mt: His friends tried to cheer him up by taking him outside.
ref: His friends tried to cheer him up by taking him out.

src: उस सुबह वह बहुत चिड़चिड़ी सी जागी थी.
mt: She woke up very cranky that morning.
ref: She had woke up the other morning extremely fussy.

src: उसने अपनी फ़्लाइट और होटल बुक कर लिए.
mt: He booked his flight and hotel.
ref: She booked her flight and hotel.

src: हर साल, क्रिसमस की पिछली शाम को हम उनके लिए बिसकुट और दूध रखते थे.
mt: Every year, on the night before Christmas, we would leave them biscuits and milk.
ref: Each year we left cookies and milk for him on Christmas Eve.

src: पर, वह भी बहुत देर से उठी.
mt: But he also got up very late.
ref: Unfortunately, she also woke up very late.

src: उनके आईटी विभाग ने सबसे उपकरण खोजने के लिए बहुत रीसर्च की.
mt: Their IT department did a lot of research to find the best tool.
ref: Their IT department did a lot of research to find the best equipment.

src: हम अपने डिवीज़न के प्रतिद्वंदियों के खिलाफ़ खेल रहे थे.
mt: We were playing against our division rivals.
ref: We were playing our division rivals.

src: उसने इस एक बच्चे को टीम से निकाल दिया क्योंकि वह उतना अच्छा नहीं है.
mt: He kicked this one kid off the team because he wasn't good enough.
ref: He has to cut this one kid because he is not good enough.

src: उसने कई लोगों से जाने के लिए कहा, लेकिन वे नहीं गए.
mt: He asked many people to leave, but they did not.
ref: He told several people to leave but they didn't.

src: मैंने तय किया कि मैं कोशिश करके उसी दोपहर उन्हें कटवा लूँ.
mt: I decided to try to cut them that afternoon.
ref: I decided to try and get it cut that afternoon.

src: मैंने वह रास्ता लिया जो राइडिंग ट्रैक की ओर जाता था.
mt: I took the road that led to the riding track.
ref: I took a path that led to a riding track.

src: वह कार्यस्थल के लिए अपनी ट्रेन को मिस कर गया और इसके बजाय पार्क चला गया।
mt: He missed his train to work and instead went to the park.
ref: He missed his train to work and instead went to the park.

src: उसने दो मील दूर रेस्ट स्टॉप का एक चिन्ह देखा।
mt: He saw a sign for a rest stop two miles away.
ref: He saw a sign for a rest stop two miles away.

src: उसकी मदद करने के लिए, उसकी माँ ने एक रोमांचक खिलौना निकाला जो जिंगल कर रहा था।
mt: To help her, her mother pulled out a fun toy that was jingling.
ref: To help him, his mother put out an exciting toy that jingled.

src: मुझे समझ नहीं आ रहा था कि क्या चाहिए, मेरे पास पहले से ही कुत्ते थे।
mt: I didn't know what I wanted, I already had dogs.
ref: I wasn't sure what to get, I already had dogs.

src: इसलिए उसने अपने कॉलेज में सिंगिंग क्लास ज्वाइन की।
mt: So he joined a singing class at his college.
ref: So he joined a singing class at his college.

src: उसका हमेशा से अपनी पड़ोसी लेक्सी पर एक बड़ा क्रश था, लेकिन डरा हुआ था।
mt: He had always had a big crush on his neighbor Lexi, but was afraid.
ref: He always had a big crush on his neighbor Lexy, but was scared.

src: वह इसे पारित करना चाहती थी ।
mt: She wanted to pass it.
ref: She wanted to pass it.

src: तब उसे याद आया कि उसने पिछले हफ्ते एक मुफ्त पिज्जा जीता था!
mt: Then he remembered that he had won a free pizza last week!
ref: Then he remembered he had won a free pizza last week!

src: वह तैयार हुआ और सभा स्थल की ओर चल दिया।
mt: He got ready and walked towards the rally site.
ref: He got ready and drove to the meeting place.

src: हमने कॉफी पी।
mt: We had coffee.
ref: We drank coffee.

src: वह एक नया सेल फोन चाहती थी लेकिन उसके पास पर्याप्त पैसे नहीं थे।
mt: She wanted a new cell phone but didn't have enough money.
ref: She wanted a new cell phone but she didn't have enough money.

src: मैंने पैदल जाने के बजाय अपनी साइकिल को दुकान तक ले जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: I decided to take my bike to the store instead of walking.
ref: I decided to take my bicycle to the store instead of walking.

src: गाड़ी चलाने के 9 घंटे बाद वे अपनी दादी के ब्लॉक में थे।
mt: 9 hours after driving, they were at their grandmother's block.
ref: After 9 hours of driving the were on their grandmother's block.

src: अंत में वह अब इससे नहीं बच सकती थी।
mt: In the end, she could not escape it.
ref: Finally she could avoid it no longer.

src: उसने हेडफ़ोन की एक जोड़ी देखी जो वह चाहता था लेकिन पैसों की कमी के कारण खरीद नहीं सकता था।
mt: He saw a pair of headphones that he wanted but couldn't afford to buy.
ref: He saw a pair of headphones that he wanted but couldn't afford.

src: मैंने इसे अभी तक नहीं खोला है।
mt: I haven't opened it yet.
ref: I haven't opened it yet.

src: चूंकि उसके पास शायद ही कभी आगंतुक आते हैं, इसलिए उसे सफाई की बात नहीं दिखती।
mt: Since he rarely has visitors, he doesn't care about cleaning.
ref: Since he rarely has visitors, he doesn't see the point to cleaning.

src: चूंकि परीक्षा कठिन है, इसलिए मैंने पूरी रात पढ़ाई करने का फैसला किया।
mt: Since the exam is difficult, I decided to study all night.
ref: Since the exam is tough, I decided to study all night.

src: हमें एक ग्रुप फोटोग्राफ चाहिए था।
mt: We needed a group photo.
ref: We wanted a group photograph.

src: सब कुछ गंदा और फर्श पर पड़ा था।
mt: Everything was dirty and on the floor.
ref: Everything was dirty and on the floor.

src: शाम हुई तो वह थक गया था।
mt: He was tired when the evening came.
ref: When evening came, he was tired.

src: उन्हें नहीं पता था कि वे सही जगह पहुंचे हैं।
mt: They didn't know they had arrived at the right place.
ref: They did not know if they had reached the right spot.

src: उसने बिल्कुल पढ़ाई नहीं की है।
mt: She has not studied at all.
ref: He has not studied at all.

src: वह अकेले समय बिताकर थक चुकी थी।
mt: She was tired of spending time alone.
ref: She was tired of spending time alone.

src: हमने काम पर जाने के लिए साथ में राइड करने का फैसला किया।
mt: We decided to carpool to work together.
ref: We decided to ride to work together.

src: हालांकि, लोगों ने उसे परेशान किया जब उन्होंने उसके जेंडर को लेकर लड़ाई लड़ी।
mt: However, people harassed him when they fought over his gender.
ref: However, people harassed her when they fought out her gender.

src: उसके दोस्त सैम ने उसे अपने परिवार के साथ जाने के लिए आमंत्रित किया।
mt: His friend Sam invited him to join his family.
ref: His friend Sam invited him to go with his family.

src: उस पर एक नया गाना आया जो मुझे अच्छा लगा।
mt: I got a new song on it that I like.
ref: A new song came on that I liked.

src: उन्होंने एक जैसे कपड़े पहने, एक जैसे बात की और 24/7 साथ रहती थीं।
mt: They wore the same clothes, talked the same, and lived together 24/7.
ref: They dressed alike, talked alike and were together 24/7.

src: तीनों ही तब जब मैं किशोर था।
mt: 3 of them when I was a teenager.
ref: All three of them when I was a teenager.

src: वैसे तो उसके पास ज़्यादा पैसे नहीं थे, लेकिन उसने थोड़ा-थोड़ा बचाना शुरू किया.
mt: He didn't have much money, but he started saving a little at a time.
ref: Although he doesn't have much money, he starts saving a little.

src: उसे बताया गया कि उसे फिर से ब्रेसेस लगवाने होंगे.
mt: He was told he would need braces again.
ref: She was told she needed braces again.

src: वहां उसके चाचा का एक खेत था.
mt: There was a field belonging to his uncle there.
ref: Her uncle owned a farm there.

src: एक दिन उसके सुपरवाइजर ने पूरे विभाग को मीटिंग के लिए बुलाया.
mt: 1 day later his supervisor called the whole department to a meeting.
ref: One day his supervisor calls a meeting for the entire department.

src: उसने अपने पिता को कॉल किया.
mt: He called his father.
ref: She called her dad.

src: एक रात वह टीवी देखते-देखते सो गया.
mt: He fell asleep watching TV one night.
ref: One night he fell asleep while watching television.

src: वह अपने घर के पास वाले मतदान स्थल पर गया.
mt: He went to his local polling place near his home.
ref: He went to the polling place near his home.

src: उसने गाड़ी रोकी और देखा कि उसका टायर पंक्चर था.
mt: He stopped the car and saw that his tire was punctured.
ref: He pulled over and saw that his tire was flat!

src: उसने तय किया कि वह नया अपार्टमेंट खोजेगी.
mt: She decided to look for a new apartment.
ref: She decided to look for a new apartment.

src: उसमें सिर्फ़ एक ही टुकड़ा बचा था.
mt: Only one piece remained.
ref: There was only one slice left.

src: कैथी और उसका परिवार गोद लेने के दिन, उस पालतू जानवरों की दुकान पर गया.
mt: On the day they adopted Kati, the family went to a pet store.
ref: Cathy and her family visited the pet store on adoption day.

src: एक दिन मोनिका को एक जन्मदिन की पार्टी में बुलाया गया.
mt: 1 day Monica is invited to a birthday party.
ref: One day Monica was invited to a birthday.

src: उसने उसे धकेला और वह खुल गया.
mt: He pushed her and she opened.
ref: He pushed on it and it opened.

src: लड़की को पता चला कि उनके माता-पिता की आपस में नहीं बनती.
mt: The girl found out that her parents didn't get along.
ref: She finds out that their parents don't get along.

src: मैं उन्हें देखने के लिए, घंटों लाइन में खड़ा रहा.
mt: I stood in line for hours to see them.
ref: I waited in line for hours to get to see him.

src: वे वहां जल्दी पहुंच गए और उन्हें बहुत अच्छी सीटें मिल गईं.
mt: They arrived early and got good seats.
ref: They got there early and had really good seats.

src: मैंने कुछ सस्ती चीज़ खोजी.
mt: I found some cheap things.
ref: I looked for something cheap to do.

src: उसने उसे जमा नहीं किया और क्लास छोड़ दिया.
mt: He didn't pay and left class.
ref: Instead of turning it in, she skipped class.

src: उसने कुछ नया बनाया था, जिससे वह अपनी पत्नी को सरप्राइज देने वाला था.
mt: He had made something new, which would have surprised his wife.
ref: He had a plan to surprise his wife with a new piece.

src: लेकिन मेरी गर्लफ्रेंड के पिता ने कल एक शीशा तोड़ दिया.
mt: But my girlfriend's father broke a window yesterday.
ref: But my girlfriend's dad broke a mirror yesterday.

src: वह देर तक काम करता था, और अक्सर घर आकर अपने बच्चों से नहीं मिल पाता था.
mt: He worked late, and often didn't get home to see his children.
ref: He worked so late, he often missed his kids when he came home.

src: उसने उसे उठाया और खींचने लगा.
mt: He picked her up and pulled her along.
ref: He picked it up and pulled on it.

src: वह टीवी पर उन्हें देखता हुआ बड़ा हुआ था.
mt: He grew up watching them on TV.
ref: He grew up watching them on television.

src: उसने तुरंत अपने पति को खुशखबरी देने के लिए कॉल किया.
mt: She immediately called her husband to share the good news.
ref: She immediately called her husband to share the good news.

src: वह डाइटिंग कर रही है, इसलिए कभी वहां नहीं जा सकती.
mt: She is dieting, so she can't go there.
ref: She is on a diet so she can never go there.

src: शुरुआत में वह काफ़ी डरा हुआ और परेशान था कि उसे कोई नहीं मिलेगा.
mt: He was very scared and worried that no one would come.
ref: At first he feels apprehensive and worried he won't meet anyone.

src: उसकी माँ ने कहा कि एक छोटे बच्चे के लिए वह बहुत खतरनाक है.
mt: "It's very dangerous for a small child," her mother said.
ref: His mom said it was too dangerous for a little boy.

src: आज मैंने उन्हें काफ़ी बेचैन पाया.
mt: I found them very restless today.
ref: Today as I watched them they seemed agitated.

src: उसकी कॉस्टयूम में एक हूप स्कर्ट की ज़रुरत थी.
mt: She needed a hoop skirt in her costume.
ref: Her costume required a hoop skirt.

src: मेरे मैनेजर ने बीटल्स की टीशर्ट पहनी हुई थी.
mt: My manager was wearing a Beatles T-shirt.
ref: My manager was wearing a Beatles T Shirt.

src: उसने अपनी पसंदीदा टीम को देखा!
mt: He saw his favorite team!
ref: He saw his favorite team!

src: वह डेंटिस्ट से नफ़रत करती थी, इसलिए उसने इसे अनदेखा करने की कोशिश की.
mt: She hated the dentist, so she tried to ignore it.
ref: She hated the dentist, so she tried to ignore it.

src: उसने अपने घर की सारी किताबों को पढ़ लिया.
mt: He read all the books in his house.
ref: He read all of the books in his house.

src: मेरे पास बिल्कुल भी पैसे नहीं थे, लेकिन मुझे लगा कि मैं उनका साथ तो दे सकता हूं.
mt: I had no money at all, but I thought I could at least be with them.
ref: I was broke, but thought I could keep them company.

src: वहां पर एक प्यारी सी लड़की भी थी जो अपने कपड़े धो रही थी.
mt: There was a cute little girl there who was washing her clothes.
ref: There was a cute girl doing her laundry there too.

src: इसलिए उसने उस सुबह झूठी बीमार वाली आवाज़ में फ़ोन किया.
mt: So he called in sick that morning in a fake-sick voice.
ref: So he called in that morning using a fake sick voice.

src: ग्रेग के गुज़रते ही गली से एक हाथ निकला.
mt: As Greg passed through the alley, a hand emerged from the street.
ref: An arm emerged from an alleyway as Greg passed.

src: उसकी प्रेमिका उसे चिढ़ाती है कि वह कभी कैंपिंग ट्रिप पर नहीं जा सकता था.
mt: His girlfriend teases him that he could never go on a camping trip.
ref: His girlfriend teases him that he could never go on a camping trip.

src: उसके पास अगले महीने तक अपने परिवार के खाने के लिए और कोई पैसे नहीं होंगे.
mt: He will have no money to feed his family for the next month.
ref: He would have no more money for food for his family until next month.

src: एक दिन उसने अपनी बहन मेरी को बताया कि वह संकोचमहसूस करती है.
mt: 1 day ago she told her sister Mary that she felt shy.
ref: One day she told her sister Mary she felt insecure.

src: वह कुछ दोस्तों के साथ फ़ुटबॉल खेल रहा था और सिर पर चोट लग गई.
mt: He was playing football with some friends and hit his head.
ref: He was playing football with some friends and got hit in the head.

src: उसकी मां ने उसे आराम पहुंचाने के लिए हर मुमकिन चीज़ की कोशिश की है.
mt: His mother has tried everything to make him feel better.
ref: Her mother has tried everything to sooth her.

src: मैं झील के नज़दीक चल कर गया और कुछ बत्तख़ को देखा.
mt: I went to the lake and saw some ducks.
ref: I walked near the lake and saw some ducks.

src: उसके ज़्यादा दोस्त नहीं थे लेकिन तस्वीरें लेना बहुत पसंद था.
mt: He had few friends but liked taking pictures a lot.
ref: He didn't have many friends but loved taking pictures.

src: पांच पहली बार के केवर्स उसके पीछे चलने लगे.
mt: 5 first-time Kevvers started running behind him.
ref: Five first-time cavers walked behind him.

src: शॉन ने सारा को पिक अप किया और वे स्टोर की तरफ़ ड्राइव करते हुए गए.
mt: Sean picked up Sarah and they drove to the store.
ref: Sean picked Sara up and they drove to the store.

src: एक मुश्किल परीक्षा आ रही थी जिसके लिए वह तैयार नहीं था.
mt: A difficult exam was coming up that he was not prepared for.
ref: There was a difficult test coming that he was not ready for.

src: उसने उसे कुकिंग शो दिखाना शुरू किया और उन्हें उसके साथ देखा.
mt: She started showing him cooking shows and made him watch them with her.
ref: He introduced her to cooking shows and watched them with her.

src: वह रोज़ उससे मिलने के लिए आता था.
mt: He came to see her every day.
ref: He came by to see her everyday.

src: ऑफ़िस के कर्मचारी ने शिकायत की कि वह हमेशा गंदी रहती थी.
mt: An office employee complained that she was always dirty.
ref: The office staff complained it was always dirty.

src: लेकिन उसे गर्म कोको चाहिए था.
mt: But he wanted hot cocoa.
ref: But she wanted hot cocoa.

src: उसने अपनी कार बफ़लो तक के लिए पूरे रास्ते चलाई.
mt: He drove his car all the way to Buffalo.
ref: She drove her car all the way to Buffalo.

src: आख़िरकार हमने इसके इस्तेमाल को बांट करके करने का फ़ैसला लिया.
mt: We finally decided to split the use of it.
ref: Finally we decided to divide its use.

src: अचानक से पायलट ने एक घोषणा की.
mt: The pilot made an announcement suddenly.
ref: Suddenly the pilot made an announcement.

src: उसने अपने ज़्यादातर क्रेयॉन ख़त्म कर लिए थे इसलिए उसके पास केवल भूरा और काला था.
mt: He had used up most of his crayons so he only had brown and black left.
ref: He had worn down most of his crayons so he only had brown and black.

src: ऐसा नहीं था कि वह पेश करने से घबरा रहा था.
mt: He wasn't afraid to show.
ref: It's not that he was nervous presenting.

src: वह खेलना पसंद करता था लेकिन कभी जीता नहीं.
mt: He liked to play but never won.
ref: He loved playing but never won.

src: वह हाथ धोने के लिए गई, लेकिन साबुन नहीं था.
mt: She went to wash her hands, but there was no soap.
ref: She went to wash her hands, but there was no soap.

src: डैड और बिल उस आवाज़ को सुनते ही जानते थे.
mt: Dad and Bill knew the sound immediately.
ref: Dad and Bill knew that sound when they heard it.

src: वहां एक पिंजरे में एक साथ दो थे.
mt: 2 were in a cage together.
ref: There were two together in a cage.

src: जिल ने बहुत मेहनत से पढ़ाई की।
mt: Jill studied very hard.
ref: Jill studied really hard.

src: वह चिंतित थें कि कुछ नया सीखने के लिए अब बहुत बूढ़े हो गए हैं।
mt: He was concerned that he was too old to learn anything new.
ref: He was worried that he was too old to learn something new.

src: उनके पास एक्शन अकीर्तियों एक व्यापक संग्रह था।
mt: They had a wide collection of action figures.
ref: He had an extensive collection of action figures.

src: हालाँकि वह ऊँची एड़ी के जूते की दिखावट पसंद करती थी, वह उससे पहनने के अनुभव से नफरत करती थी।
mt: She liked the look of high heels, but hated the experience of wearing them.
ref: Although she loved how heels looked, she hated how they felt.

src: मैं इसे तब भी खेलूंगा जब दूसरों को पता नहीं होगा।
mt: I will play it when others don't know.
ref: I would play it even when others didn't know.

src: उसे एक विदेशी भाषा में लिखा एक पत्र मिला।
mt: He received a letter written in a foreign language.
ref: She found a letter written in a foreign language.

src: वह बहुत परेशान थी और उदास होकर घर चली गई।
mt: She was very upset and went home sad.
ref: She was very upset and went home to sulk.

src: उसने इसे शेव कर हटाने की कोशिश की।
mt: He tried to shave it off.
ref: She tried shaving it off.

src: जीना अपने भाई-बहनों के साथ दबी हुई पिछली सीट पर बैठी थी।
mt: She was sitting in the back seat with her siblings.
ref: Gina sat in the back seat squished by her siblings.

src: नए घर में यह पहला महीना था और हम किसी को नहीं जानते थे।
mt: It was our first month in our new home and we didn't know anyone.
ref: It was the first month at a new house and we didn't know anyone.

src: वह चिंतित था कि वह हमेशा खो जाएगा।
mt: He was worried that he would always lose.
ref: He was concerned he would always get lost.

src: और उसने लिगर की तस्वीरें देखीं।
mt: And she saw pictures of Lager.
ref: And she saw pictures of ligers.

src: उसने किताब पहले ही पढ़ ली थी।
mt: He had already read the book.
ref: She read the book beforehand.

src: तब उसे एहसास हुआ कि उसने बाहर से अपने आप को बंद कर लिया है!
mt: Then he realized he had locked himself out!
ref: Then she realized she had locked herself out!

src: मैंने टेबल पर रखी सारी अव्यवस्थ चीजों और कागज़ात से छुटकारा पाने का फैसला किया।
mt: I decided to get rid of all the mess on the table and papers.
ref: I decided to get rid of all the clutter and papers on the table.

src: उनकी शादी को कई साल हो चुके थे।
mt: Their marriage had been for many years.
ref: They were married for many Year's.

src: एक बत्तख मिली और उसे देखने लगे।
mt: A duck was found and looked at.
ref: A duck was found and stared at.

src: वहाँ उसने तैरते हुए डॉल्फिन का विज्ञापन देखा।
mt: He saw an advertisement for swimming dolphins.
ref: There she saw a sign advertising dolphin swims.

src: उसने एक बस यात्रा की।
mt: He took a bus ride.
ref: She took a bus tour.

src: मेरा प्याला काउंटर पर गिरा।
mt: My cup fell on the counter.
ref: My cup spilled on the counter.

src: वे बियर पी रहे थे और बातें कर रहे थे।
mt: They were drinking beer and talking.
ref: They were drinking beers and talking.

src: एक दिन उसे एक आर्ट गैलरी के उद्घाटन में भाग लेने के लिए आमंत्रित किया गया।
mt: 1 day later, he was invited to attend the opening of an art gallery.
ref: One day she is invited to attend an art gallery opening.

src: जिल ने अपनी पुरानी कार डीलरशिप के पास खड़ी कर दी।.
mt: Jill drove her old car to the dealership.
ref: Jill drove her old car down to the car dealership.

src: उसने ध्यान नहीं दिया था कि यह पहले से ही वेलेंटाइन डे था।
mt: He didn't notice that it was already Valentine's Day.
ref: He had not noticed that it was already Valentine's Day.

src: वह सवारी करना नहीं जानता था।
mt: He didn't know how to ride.
ref: He didn't know how to ride.

src: एक बार गर्मियों में एक दोस्त ने क्वेंटिन को अपने झील वाले घर में आमंत्रित किया।
mt: In the summer one friend invited Quentin to his lake house.
ref: One summer a friend invited Quentin to his lake house.

src: वह उसके लिए कुछ मिनटों बाद पेनकेक्स की एक प्लेट ले आई।
mt: She brought him a plate of pancakes a few minutes later.
ref: She brought him a plate of pancakes minutes later.

src: एक परिवार के रूप में हमने तय किया कि यह एक अच्छा विचार था।
mt: As a family, we decided that this was a good idea.
ref: As a family we decided that this was a great idea.

src: वे मुरझा रहे हैं और धूप से सूख रहे हैं।
mt: They are wilting and drying in the sun.
ref: They are wilting and dry from the sun.

src: जिल इस बात से नाराज थी कि वह हर गेम हार रही थी।
mt: Jill was upset that she was losing every game.
ref: Jill was angry that she was losing every game.

src: कुछ घंटों के बाद, मुझे दौड़ने जैसा एहसास हुआ।
mt: After a few hours, I felt like I was running.
ref: After a few hours, I felt like running.

src: उसने दरवाजे तोड़ने और घरों को लूटने का मन बना लिया।
mt: He had decided to break into houses and loot them.
ref: He made up his mind to kick in doors and rob houses.

src: मैंने अपनी समस्या के समाधान के लिए पूरे इंटरनेट पर देखा।
mt: I searched the entire internet for a solution to my problem.
ref: I looked all over the internet for a solution to my problem.

src: वह झुक गया और उसे उठा लिया।
mt: 1. He bent and picked him up. 2. He bent and picked him up. 3. He bent and picked him up. 4. He bent and picked him up. 5. He bent and picked him up. 6. He bent and picked him up. 7. He bent and picked him up. 8. He bent and picked him up. 9. He bent and picked him up. 10. He bent and picked him up. 11. He bent and picked him up. 12. He bent and picked him up. 13. He bent and picked him up. 14. He bent and picked him up. 15. He bent and picked him up. 16. He bent and picked him up. 17. He bent and picked him up. 18. He bent and picked him up. 19. ref: He bent down and picked it up.

src: वह एक नई जोड़ी लेना चाहता है ताकि वह संगीत सुन सके।
mt: He wants to get a new pair so he can listen to music.
ref: He wants to get a new pair so he can listen to music.

src: परन्तु, टिकट बहुत महंगे थे।
mt: However, the tickets were very expensive.
ref: However, the tickets were too expensive.

src: वह दिन में कम से कम एक बार खाता था।
mt: He ate at least once a day.
ref: He would eat at least one a day.

src: एक दिन उसके पसंदीदा अनुरोधकर्ताओं में से एक ने उसके काम को अस्वीकार कर दिया।
mt: 1 day after his favorite client rejected his work.
ref: One day one of her favorite requesters rejected her work.

src: ट्रिना को डोनोवन पसंद था इसलिए उसने हाँ कहा लेकिन वह वास्तव में चिंतित थी।
mt: Trina liked Donovan so she said yes, but she was really worried.
ref: Trina liked Donovan so she said yes but she was really worried.

src: जब वह छह साल का हुआ तो उसने अपने जन्मदिन के लिए बाइक मांगी।
mt: When he was six years old, he asked for a bike for his birthday.
ref: When he turned six Year's old he asked for a bike for his birthday.

src: उसने एक वनीला मिल्कशेक का ऑर्डर दिया।
mt: He ordered a vanilla milkshake.
ref: She ordered a vanilla milkshake.

src: उसने अपने आखिरी पैसे का इस्तेमाल एक कॉटन कैंडी खरीदने के लिए किया।
mt: He used his last money to buy a cotton candy.
ref: He used the last of his money to buy a fluffy cotton candy.

src: उसके पास करने के लिए काम थे।
mt: He had work to do.
ref: He had chores to do.

src: एक दिन राशिद के भाई को काम के लिए देर हो गई।
mt: 1 day late Rashid's brother was late for work.
ref: One day Rashid's brother was late for work.

src: कैशियर ने उसका कार्ड वापस लाने में बहुत लंबा समय लिया।
mt: The cashier took a long time to return his card.
ref: The cashier took a very long time bringing her card back.

src: इसलिए कल मैं तलाश में बाहर गया।
mt: So I went out looking for it yesterday.
ref: Hence yesterday I went out looking.

src: मैंने प्रमोशन पाने की कोशिश करने का फैसला किया।
mt: I decided to try to get a promotion.
ref: I decided to try to get promoted.

src: मैगी घबरा रही थी क्योंकि वह किसी को नहीं जानती थी।
mt: Maggie was scared because she didn't know anyone.
ref: Maggie was nervous because she didn't know anyone.

src: स्टोर की विंडो में ट्रेन सेट रखा हुआ था।
mt: A train set was on display in the store's window.
ref: There was a train set in the window of the store.

src: उसने तब तक इंतजार किया जब तक उसकी माँ झपकी नहीं लेने लगी।
mt: He waited until his mother dozed off.
ref: She waited until her mother was taking a nap.

src: वह लुइसियाना में रहने वाली एक लड़की से प्यार करता था।
mt: He loved a girl who lived in Louisiana.
ref: He loved a girl who lived in Louisiana.

src: वह जानता था कि अगर वह पास नहीं हुआ तो उसे समर स्कूल जाना होगा।
mt: He knew that if he didn't pass, he would have to go to summer school.
ref: He knew if he didn't pass he would have to go to summer school.

src: वह प्रक्रिया शुरू करने के लिए अपने स्थानीय दयाशील संस्था में गई।
mt: She went to her local charitable institution to start the process.
ref: She went to her local humane society to start the process.

src: मैं बैलेंस बीम सीख रहा था और उस पर मूव्स कर रहा था।
mt: I was learning balance beam and doing moves on it.
ref: I was learning the balance beam and doing moves on it.

src: हम जिसे खरीदना चाहते हैं उसे चुनना मुश्किल था।
mt: 1. We had a hard time choosing what to buy.
ref: It was going to be hard to choose the one we wanted to buy.

src: उसने फैसला किया कि वह अमेरिका के हार्टलैंड में ज्यादा खुश रहेगा।
mt: He decided he would be happier in America's Heartland.
ref: He decided he would be happier in America's Heartland.

src: वह जानती थी कि उसकी माँ उसे उसके प्रेम जीवन के बारे में घेरेगी।
mt: She knew her mother would corner her about her love life.
ref: She knew that her mother would hound her about her love life.

src: नतीजतन मैं काफी अकेलापन महसूस करने लगा हूं।
mt: As a result, I started feeling lonely.
ref: As a result I have begun to feel quite lonely.

src: एक दिन वह रात भर फील्ड ट्रिप पर गई।
mt: 1 day she went on a field trip all night.
ref: One day she went on an overnight field trip.

src: मैं शामिल होने के लिए इंतजार नहीं कर सकता था।
mt: I can't wait to join.
ref: I couldn't wait to attend.

src: आश्चर्यजनक रूप से मैंने इसे गिरा दिया।
mt: I  surprisedly dropped it.
ref: To my surprise I dropped it.

src: वहां न कभी बारिश हुई और न ही तूफान आया।
mt: There was never a rain and nor a storm.
ref: It never rained or stormed there.

src: वह उस पर एक किताब देखने के लिए पुस्तकालय में गई।
mt: She went to the library to look at a book on him.
ref: She went down to the library to check out a book on it.

src: उसने अपने दोस्त से बात की और पाया कि उसे अभ्यास करने जाना है।
mt: He talked to his friend and found out that he was going to practice.
ref: He talked to his friend and found out he needed to go to practice.

src: वह उसे इधर-उधर घुमाती रही लेकिन फिर भी उसे नींद नहीं आई।
mt: She kept turning him around but still he did not sleep.
ref: She walked him around but still he did not sleep.

src: उसने सोचा कि वह इसे एक वयस्क के रूप में कर सकता है।
mt: He thought he could do it as an adult.
ref: He thought he could do it as an adult.

src: अस्थमा के कारण वह खेल नहीं खेल सकती थी
mt: She could not play sports because of asthma
ref: Because of asthma she couldn't play sports.

src: जोइ घबराया हुआ था।
mt: Joie was scared.
ref: Joe was nervous.

src: उसने खुद को उन सवालों के लिए तैयार किया जो वे पूछे जा सकते हैं।
mt: He prepared himself for the questions they could ask him.
ref: He prepared himself for the questions they may ask.

src: इसलिए, ऐलेन ने फैसला किया कि वह खाने के लिए बाहर जाएगी।
mt: So, Elaine decided to go out to eat.
ref: Therefore, Elaine decided that she would go out to eat.

src: उसने आवेदन भरने में काफी समय बिताया।
mt: He spent a lot of time filling out the application.
ref: He spent a long time filling out the application.

src: उन्होंने एक बार में 3 शॉट पिए।
mt: 3 shots in one go.
ref: They drank 3 shots in one bar.

src: वे उसके घर पर इस बात पर चर्चा करने के लिए मिले कि किस भोजन और बैंड का उपयोग करना है।
mt: They met at his house to discuss what food and band to use.
ref: They met at her house to discuss what food and band to use.

src: उसका छोटा भाई शॉवर का उपयोग कर रहा है।
mt: His little brother is using the shower.
ref: His little brother is using the shower.

src: वह डॉक्टर के पास चेकअप कराने गया।
mt: He went to the doctor for a checkup.
ref: He went to his doctor to get a checkup.

src: वह इस बात को लेकर अनिश्चित थी कि उसे दरवाजा खोलना चाहिए या नहीं।
mt: She was uncertain whether she should open the door or not.
ref: She was unsure as to whether she should open the door or not.

src: उसने कुछ स्वादिष्ट सेब लेने के लिए कृषि बाजार में जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to go to the agricultural market to buy some delicious apples.
ref: She decided to drive to the farm market to pick some delicious apples.

src: उनके दोस्तों ने इस पर टिप्पणी की जब वे वहाँ गए
mt: Their friends commented on this when they went there
ref: His friends commented on it when they went over.

src: हालाँकि, उसके माता-पिता ने हमेशा उनकी देखभाल करने की पूरी कोशिश की।
mt: However, her parents had always tried their best to take care of her.
ref: However, his parents always did his best to provide for him.

src: जब उसके रूममेट तैयार हो रहे थे, जिल अपने बालों को लेकर परेशान थी।
mt: When her roommate was getting ready, Jill was worried about her hair.
ref: As her roommates got ready, Jill fussed about her hair.

src: हवा तेज थी और बैनर उड़ गया।
mt: The wind was strong and the banner blew away.
ref: The wind was strong and blew the banner away.

src: उसने एक बार उन्हें मेरे लिए बनाया था क्योंकि मेरा दिन खराब था।
mt: He made it for me once because my day was bad.
ref: She once made them for me because I was having a bad day.

src: उनके दादाजी को पक्षी देखना पसंद था, इसलिए टिम उनके साथ देखता था।
mt: His grandfather liked to watch birds, so Tim watched with him.
ref: His grandpa loved birdwatching, so Tim watched with him.

src: वह अपनी पहली नौकरी शुरू करने के लिए बहुत उत्साहित था।
mt: She was very excited to start her first job.
ref: He was very excited to have started his first job.

src: दिन खत्म होने से ज्यादा जीना कभी खुश नहीं हुई थी।
mt: I have never been happier than at the end of the day.
ref: Gina was never more happy for a day to end.

src: सबसे पहले उन्होंने अपना फर्नीचर पैक किया।
mt: 1st, they packed their furniture.
ref: First they packed up their furniture.

src: वह एक खरीद सकती थी, लेकिन अगर वह मिल जाए तो यह और भी खास होगा।
mt: She could have bought one, but if she found one it would be even more special.
ref: She could buy one, but it would be more special if she found it.

src: वह चाहता था कि उसकी शादी बेहतरीन तरीके से हो।
mt: He wanted his wedding to be perfect.
ref: He wanted his wedding to go perfectly.

src: अचानक उसने जोर से भिनभिनाने की आवाज सुनी।
mt: Suddenly, he heard a loud, crackling noise.
ref: All of a sudden he heard loud buzzing.

src: टॉड का आँगन पत्तों से भरा हुआ था।
mt: The Todd's yard was filled with leaves.
ref: Todd's yard was full of leaves.

src: उसने अपने लक्ष्य तक पहुंचने के लिए हर रात मेहनत की।
mt: He worked hard every night to reach his goal.
ref: He worked out every night to try to reach his goal.

src: साथ ही वह अपने फोन की स्क्रीन को कपड़े से साफ करने की कोशिश कर रहा था।
mt: He was also trying to clean his phone's screen with a cloth.
ref: At the same time, he was trying to clean his phone screen with a cloth.

src: वह केवल 8वीं कक्षा में थी, लेकिन वह जानती थी कि वह अच्छी है।
mt: She was only in the eighth grade, but she knew she was good.
ref: She was only in the 8th grade, but she knew she was good.

src: उन्होंने फूलदान पर मारा और वह कई टुकड़ों में टूट गया।
mt: He hit the flower pot and it shattered into pieces.
ref: They knocked over the vase and it broke into many pieces.

src: स्टीव की गर्लफ्रेंड ने उनसे ब्रेकअप कर लिया।
mt: Steve's girlfriend broke up with him.
ref: Steve's girlfriend broke up with him.

src: महज आधा दर्जन गेंदे की कीमत देख कर ग्लोरिया हैरान रह गई।
mt: Glory was shocked to see the price of just a dozen roses.
ref: Gloria was shocked at the price of even just half a dozen lilies.

src: उनका लक्ष्य किसी भी बास्केट को कोर्ट करने में सक्षम होना था।
mt: Their goal was to be able to dunk any basketball.
ref: His goal was to be able to make any basket on the court.

src: हालांकि, उसे अपना वजन कम करने की जरूरत है ताकि स्किनी जींस अच्छी लगे।
mt: However, she needs to lose weight so skinny jeans look good.
ref: However, she needs to lose weight so the skinny jeans will look good.

src: हमारी पूरी बैंड क्लास जा रही थी।
mt: We were all going to the zoo.
ref: Our entire band class was going.

src: वह गर्मी से बहुत परेशान था।
mt: 1. He was very upset with the heat.
ref: He was so sick of the heat.

src: वह गाने से बहुत डरता था।
mt: 1. He was very afraid of the songs.
ref: He was just too afraid to sing.

src: इतना ही पर्याप्त था।
mt: That was enough.
ref: That was more than enough.

src: चलते समय मुझे कुछ ऐसा मिला जिसने मुझे डरा दिया।
mt: I found something while running that scared me.
ref: While walking I stumbled across something that scared me.

src: आज वह जल्दी में थी।
mt: 1. He was in a hurry today.
ref: Today she was in a hurry.

src: वह अकेला महसूस करता था क्योंकि वह शहर में किसी को नहीं जानता था।
mt: He felt alone because he didn't know anyone in the city.
ref: He felt lonely because he did not know anybody in the town.

src: वह डॉक्टर बनने के लिए कॉलेज गया था।
mt: He went to college to become a doctor.
ref: He went to college to become a doctor.

src: वह बिना किसी आय के टूट गया था।
mt: It was broken without income.
ref: He was broke with no income.

src: उसने शॉवर चालू किया और उसके गर्म होने का इंतज़ार करने लगा।
mt: He turned on the shower and waited for it to heat up.
ref: He turned on the shower and waited for it to get hot.

src: वह सभी हॉर्न और अन्य ब्रास के वाद्ययंत्रों से प्यार करती थी।
mt: She loved all horns and other brass instruments.
ref: She loved all the horns and other brass instruments involved.

src: हम शहर में कई जगह घूमे।
mt: We have been to many places in the city.
ref: We went many places around town.

src: सेट में ड्रमस्टिक्स, एक झांझ और एक सीट थी।
mt: The set included a drumstick, a tambourine and a chair.
ref: The set had drumsticks, a cymbal, and a seat.

src: वह बहुत घबराई हुई थी।
mt: She was very frightened.
ref: She was very nervous.

src: वे दावतें और ड्रिंक लेते थे और टीवी के इर्द-गिर्द मंडराते थे।
mt: They were feasting and drinking and milling around the TV.
ref: They would get treats and drinks and huddle around the tv.

src: मैंने टेलर को फोन किया और पूछा कि मैं यह कब कर सकता हूं।
mt: I called Taylor and asked when I could do this.
ref: I called the teller and asked when i could do this.

src: वह यह जानकर कराह उठा कि वह स्टीक या हैम्बर्गर नहीं बना सकता।
mt: He was dismayed to learn that he could not make steak or hamburger.
ref: He groaned, knowing he couldn't make steak or hamburgers.

src: वह अक्सर रात की पाली में काम करता था।
mt: He often worked the night shift.
ref: He often worked the night shift.

src: शिक्षक ने प्रत्येक छात्र को एक रंगीन सिरप टॉपिंग लेने दिया।
mt: The teacher allowed each student to take a colored syrup topping.
ref: The teacher let each student pick a colored syrup topping.

src: वह तीनों को पसंद करता था लेकिन उसे निर्णय लेने की जरूरत थी।
mt: He liked all three but he had to make a decision.
ref: He liked all three of them but he needed to make a decision.

src: उसने नहीं सोचाकि यह मजेदार लग रहा था, लेकिन उसने उसे संतुष्ट करने का फैसला किया।
mt: He didn't think it was fun, but he decided to satisfy him.
ref: He didn't think it sounded like fun but decided to humor her.

src: एला के पिता ने उसके लिए एक प्रसिद्ध निर्माता द्वारा एक महंगा भव्य पियानो खरीदा।
mt: Ella's father bought her a grand piano from a famous manufacturer.
ref: Ella's father bought her an expensive grand piano by a renowned maker.

src: वह बंदूक की दुकान पर गया और कई सवाल पूछे।
mt: He went to the gun store and asked many questions.
ref: He went to the gun store and asked many questions.

src: वहाँ, वह द्वीप के बिल्कुल सिरे पर गई।
mt: She went there, to the very tip of the island.
ref: There, she went to the very tip of the island.

src: उसने सावधान रहने की कोशिश की क्योंकि वह अपने शब्दों को मिटा नहीं सकता था।
mt: He tried to be careful because he could not erase his words.
ref: He tried to be careful since he couldn't erase his words.

src: उसके जुनून को देखते हुए, सारा के पिता ने उसके लिए एक नया टेलिस्कोप खरीदा।
mt: In response to her passion, Sarah's father bought her a new telescope.
ref: Noticing her passion, Sarah's father bought her a new telescope.

src: उसे बदलाव के लिए इधर-उधर करने की जरूरत है।
mt: He needs to be moved around for the change.
ref: She need to move it around for a change.

src: वह एक रनडाउन ट्रेलर पार्क में बीवी को पीटने वाले के साथ रह रही थी।
mt: She was living with a man who beat her in a rundown trailer park.
ref: She'd been living with a wife beater in a rundown trailer park.

src: मुझे यकीन नहीं है कि यह कब हुआ था लेकिन ऐसा लगता है कि यह म्यूच्यूअल रहा है।
mt: I'm not sure when this happened, but it looks like it was mutual.
ref: I'm not sure when it happened but it seems to have been mutual.

src: उसकी माँ अस्पताल गई और अन्ना आशान्वित थी।
mt: His mother went to the hospital and Anna was reassured.
ref: Her mom went into the hospital and Anna was hopeful.

src: वे सभी कुछ भी सच कबूल करने से डरते थे और उन्होंने केवल डेयर को चुना।
mt: They were all afraid to admit everything they knew and chose Dare alone.
ref: They were all afraid to confess anything and only picked Dare.

src: उसे एहसास हुआ कि वह अपना टूथब्रश भूल गया है।
mt: He realized that he had forgotten his toothbrush.
ref: He realized that he'd forgotten his toothbrush.

src: उसने अपने गणित के होमवर्क के साथ शुरुआत की।
mt: He started with his math homework.
ref: She started with her math homework.

src: उन्होंने लगातार अपनी पसंदीदा कहानियों के संस्करण एकत्र किए।
mt: He collected his favorite stories in a continuous series.
ref: He consistently collected issues of his favorite stories.

src: उसने सोचा कि अगर वे उसे काटेंगे तो वह एक वैम्पायर में बदल जाएगा।
mt: He thought if they cut him he would turn into a vampire.
ref: He thought that if they bite him he would turn into a vampire.

src: वह अपने स्कूल क्वायर में गाती है।
mt: She is singing in her school choir.
ref: She sings in her school choir.

src: एक रात, उसे एक ब्लैक मांबा ने काट लिया।
mt: 1 night, a black mamba bit him.
ref: One night, he was bit by a black mamba.

src: उसने सड़कों पर पैसे की भीख मांगी।
mt: He begged for money on the streets.
ref: He begged for money on the streets.

src: प्रत्येक सामग्री खोजने के लिए निकल पड़ा।
mt: He went out to find each material.
ref: Each set out to find ingredients.

src: जूडी आलू के साथ रोस्टऔर ग्रेवी के साथ रोल बनाती है।
mt: Judy makes roast potatoes with gravy and rolls.
ref: Judy makes a roast with potatoes and rolls with gravy.

src: उसे इतना बुरा लगा कि उसने हर तरह से उसका इंतजार किया।
mt: He was so upset that he waited for him in every way.
ref: She felt so bad that she waited on him hand and foot.

src: वे सबसे अच्छे दोस्त बन गए और एक साथ बड़े हुए।
mt: They became the best of friends and grew up together.
ref: They became best friends and grew up together.

src: वे दो फिल्में देखना चाहते थे।
mt: They wanted to see two movies.
ref: There were two movies they wanted to see.

src: एमी जल्दी से अपने वेटसूट को पहन लिया।
mt: Amy quickly put on her wet suit.
ref: Amy hurriedly suited up in her wetsuit.

src: उन्होंने स्क्रैप लकड़ी, और कीलों का इस्तेमाल किया।
mt: They used scrap wood and nails.
ref: He used planks of scrap wood, and nails.

src: लेकिन वह अपनी ही जीवंत कल्पना में खो जाता था।
mt: But he lost himself in his own living imagination.
ref: But he would become lost in his own vivid imagination.

src: जीना ने दोस्तों को टिप्पणी करते हुए देखा, और उसके बारे में कहानियाँ सुनाईं।
mt: Gene saw his friends commenting and telling stories about him.
ref: Gina watched as friends made remarks, and told stories about him.

src: उसे लगता है कि वह उल्टी करने जा रही है।
mt: She thinks she is going to turn around.
ref: She feels like she is going to throw up.

src: वह फैसला करती है कि उसे एक नया बिस्तर लेने की जरूरत है।
mt: She decides that she needs a new bed.
ref: She decides that she needs to get a new bed.

src: लेकिन वह समाचार मीडिया से काफी निराश महसूस कर रहा है।
mt: But he is very disappointed with the media.
ref: But he's been feeling pretty frustrated by the news media.

src: वे प्रतिदिन केले के बागान में जाते हैं और कुछ लेते हैं।
mt: They go to the banana plantation every day and take some.
ref: Everyday they go to the banana plantation and get some.

src: एक स्थानीय समूह ने 1957 की ट्रांजिट बस किराए पर ली, जिसे पुराने रंगों में रंगा गया था।
mt: A local group rented a 1957 Transit bus, which was painted in old colors.
ref: A local group rented a 1957 transit bus, painted in old colors.

src: वह अपनी बाहों खरोंच जब तक वे निशान छोड़ दिया क्योंकि यह इतना बुरा था ।
mt: She scratched her arms until they bled as it was so bad.
ref: He scratched his arms until they left scars because it was so bad.

src: हर रोज़ स्कूल के बाद, वे स्थानीय चारकोल के मैदान में खेलने के लिए मिलते.
mt: Every day after school, they meet to play in the local charcoal fields.
ref: Everyday after school they would meet at the local blacktop to play.

src: उन्होंने सारी चीज़ें इकट्ठा की और उसमें लग गए.
mt: They gathered all the things and got in.
ref: The got all the ingredients together and got to it.

src: वह 2 घंटे के लिए बाहर काम किया ।
mt: 2 hours outside.
ref: She worked out for 2 hours.

src: वह अपनी उपलब्धियों पर बहुत गर्व महसूस करती थी.
mt: She was very proud of her accomplishments.
ref: She was very proud of her accomplishment.

src: उन्होंने बहुत सारे सेबों का ढेर इकट्ठा किया और उन्हें घर ले आए.
mt: They collected a lot of apples and brought them home.
ref: They picked a huge bunch of apples and brought them home.

src: ये स्टोर से एक दूध पीने की बॉटल खरीदने के लिए थे.
mt: They were buying a milk bottle from the store.
ref: It was for a sucker from the store.

src: वह कुछ ही समय पहले पहुँचा था और ट्रांसिलवेनिया देखने के लिए उत्साहित था.
mt: He had just arrived and was excited to see Transylvania.
ref: He had just arrived and was excited to see Transylvania.

src: उसकी पसंदीदा वीडियो गेम सीरीज़ में एक नया गेम रिलीज़ होने जा रहा था.
mt: A new game in her favorite video game series was about to be released.
ref: His favorite video game series was releasing a new game.

src: इसमें कार की बहुत बुरी टक्कर करानी थी.
mt: It was a very bad crash.
ref: It involved a big car crash.

src: राल्फ़ कभी उसकी बात नहीं सुनता था.
mt: Ralph never listened to her.
ref: Ralph never listened to what she said.

src: उसने तय किया कि वह एक एस्ट्रोनॉट बनेगी.
mt: She decided she would be an astronaut.
ref: She decided to become an astronaut.

src: मुझे अपना बहुत सारा सामान लाना था.
mt: I had to bring a lot of my stuff.
ref: I had a lot of stuff to move.

src: हर हफ़्ते उसकी एक खेलने की तारीख होती थी.
mt: Every week she had a play date.
ref: She had a playdate every week.

src: उसके घर से भी आती थी, या कम से कम उसे यही याद है.
mt: It was from his home, or at least that's what he remembers.
ref: Her house did as well, or at least that's what he remembers.

src: जेक स्कीइंग करने में बहुत अच्छा नहीं था, फिर भी वह चला गया.
mt: He was not very good at skiing, but he went anyway.
ref: Jake wasn't very good at skiing but went anyways.

src: उसने सीखने के लिए एक क्लास के लिए साइन अप कर दिया.
mt: He signed up for a class to learn.
ref: She signed up for a class to teach her.

src: वह अपनी दोस्त सैली से मिली.
mt: She met her friend Sally.
ref: She meet her friend Sally.

src: उसने उसे लेने के कुछ ही घंटों के भीतर उसे गिरा दिया.
mt: He threw him down just a few hours after taking him.
ref: He had dropped it a few time hours within getting it.
