src: जीना बाहर उतरी और उसने अपने पैर स्ट्रैच किए.
mt: She stepped outside and stretched her legs.
ref: Gina got out and stretched her legs.

src: यह सोचकर कि मेरा कोई दोस्त होगा, मैंने फ़ोन उठा लिया.
mt: I picked up the phone, thinking that one of my friends would be on the other end.
ref: Thinking it was one of my friends I answered.

src: उससे छोटी-छोटी गलतियाँ होती जा रही थीं और लोग गुस्सा हो रहे थे.
mt: He was making small mistakes and people were getting angry.
ref: She kept making small mistakes and people were getting mad.

src: ऐलेक ने पाया कि ब्लॉक, उसकी वैज्ञानिक चेतना का विकास करने में मदद करेंगे.
mt: Aleck found that blocks, his scientific consciousness development, will help.
ref: Alec figured that blocks would develop her scientific mind.

src: मैं आधी रात को चुपके से उसके घर में घुस गया.
mt: I snuck into his house at midnight.
ref: I crept into his house in the middle of the night.

src: उसमें बजाने के लिए उसके पास कोई भी रिकार्ड नहीं था.
mt: He had no records to play on it.
ref: He didn't have any records to play on it.

src: उसने एक स्मूदी ब्लेंडर खरीदा.
mt: He bought a smoothie blender.
ref: She purchased a smoothie blender.

src: डांस करने के बाद, प्रशिक्षक उसे बात करने के लिए बुलाया.
mt: After dancing, the instructor called her to talk.
ref: After she danced, the instructor wanted to talk to her.

src: वह बाहर टैको स्टैंड से टैको लेने गई.
mt: She went out to get a taco from the taco stand.
ref: She went to get tacos from the taco stand outside.

src: हालाँकि, वह बहुत ज़्यादा पैसों की उम्मीद कर भी नहीं रही थी.
mt: However, she was not expecting much money.
ref: Although it wasn't a lot of money she was expecting it.

src: उसने सेलो बजाने के पाठ लेना शुरू कर दिया.
mt: He started learning to play the cello.
ref: She began taking lessons for playing the cello.

src: उसे पानी और धूप बहुत पसंद आई.
mt: She likes water and sun very much.
ref: He loved the water and the sunshine.

src: अचानक, वह एक पत्थर से टकराया और गिर गया.
mt: Suddenly, he hit a rock and fell.
ref: All of a sudden he hit a rock and fell.

src: चलते वक्त उसके चेहरे पर हमेशा त्योरी चढ़ी होती थी.
mt: He always had a crease in his brow while he was driving.
ref: He always walks around with a scowl on his face.

src: उसका ध्यान कहीं और था.
mt: He was looking elsewhere.
ref: He wasn't paying attention.

src: वह अपने ड्रम पर, पहले से ज़्यादा प्रैक्टिस कर रहा था.
mt: He was practicing more on his drum.
ref: He had been doing extra practice on his drums.

src: मैंने अपने घर को सजाने का तय किया.
mt: I have decided to decorate my home.
ref: I decided to decorate my house.

src: मैं कंपनी के साथ लगभग आठ साल से काम कर रहा हूँ.
mt: I have been working with the company for about eight years.
ref: I have been with the company for nearly eight years.

src: उसने तय किया कि वह घर की साबुन बनाएगी.
mt: She decided to make soap at home.
ref: She decided to make homemade soap.

src: वे समझ नहीं पा रहे थे कि इसके बाद कहाँ जाना चाहिए.
mt: They did not know where to go after that.
ref: They were stuck on where to go next.

src: उसने एक हफ़्ते तक बहुत पढ़ाई की.
mt: He studied a lot for a week.
ref: He studies very hard for a week.

src: उसने पहले कभी खाना नहीं बनाया था, और आज रात उसे यही करना था.
mt: He had never cooked before, and tonight he was going to have to.
ref: She had never cooked a meal before, and that was her job tonight.

src: उसे वह बहुत ही पुराने ज़माने का लगता था.
mt: It seemed very old-fashioned to him.
ref: He thought that it was too old-fashioned.

src: उसे वह बहुत पसंद था.
mt: He liked it very much.
ref: She was in love with it.

src: मुझे उसके लिए क्रिसमस गिफ़्ट खरीदने के लिए कोई गिफ़्ट सोचना था.
mt: I had to think of a gift to buy him for Christmas.
ref: I needed a gift idea for him for a Christmas gift.

src: ग्राहक ने स्‍पगे᠎टि माँगी.
mt: Customer requested a spagetthi.
ref: The customer asked for Spaghetti.

src: दुर्भाग्य से, एक बड़ी एसयूवी ने आकर उसे टक्कर मार दी.
mt: Unfortunately, a large SUV hit it.
ref: Unfortunately a large SUV slammed into her.

src: हाई स्कूल सीनियर होने के नाते, अब वे कॉलेज के बारे में सोचने लगे हैं.
mt: As high school seniors, they are now starting to think about college.
ref: Now high school seniors, they've started thinking about college.

src: वह एक छोटी बिल्ली थी, और हमें नहीं पता चला कि वह क्यों मरी.
mt: She was a small cat, and we don't know why she died.
ref: She was a young cat, and we didn't know why she died.

src: पालतू जानवरों का चिड़ियाघर उसकी पसंदीदा जगह थी.
mt: Her favorite place was the petting zoo.
ref: The petting zoo was her favorite part.

src: वह परिवार से अलग हो गई है.
mt: She has separated from her family.
ref: Sally is estranged from the family.

src: वह खास तौर पर अपने बाल कटवाने गई थी.
mt: She went especially to get her hair cut.
ref: She flew specifically to get her hair done.

src: उसकी ट्रेन उसे सोफ़िया के केंद्र में ले गई.
mt: His train took him to the center of Sofia.
ref: His train took him to the center of Sofia.

src: वह रास्ते में एक दरवाज़े पर पहुँचा.
mt: He reached a door along the way.
ref: He came to a gate in the path.

src: मैं इस फ़िल्म को देखने के लिए बहुत उत्साहित था.
mt: I was very excited to see this movie.
ref: I was so excited to see this movie.

src: इस साल अपने जन्मदिन खुद को तोहफ़ा देने का तय किया.
mt: 2017 is the year I'm going to give myself a birthday present.
ref: For my birthday this year I decided to treat myself.

src: अब ग्रेसन को अपना किराया देने के लिए कुछ पैसे चाहिए थी.
mt: Now Grace needed some money to pay her rent.
ref: Now Grayson needs some money to help pay his rent.

src: जब लांस, आर्मीमें भर्ती हुआ, तो एडम ने भी उसके लिए आवेदन किया.
mt: When Lance enlisted in the Army, Ed also applied.
ref: When Lance joined the Army, Adam signed up, too.

src: अटेंडेंस बोर्ड में साइन करने के बाद, डेंटिस्ट ने मुझसे नमस्कार किया.
mt: After signing the attendance board, the dentist greeted me with namaste.
ref: After signing the attendance board, the dentist greeted me.

src: उसके माता-पिता ने क्रिसमस के लिए, उसे एक सेट खरीद कर दिया.
mt: His parents bought him a set for Christmas.
ref: His parents bought him a set for Christmas.

src: मेरे घर के पास एक शानदान बुफ़े था.
mt: There was a fabulous buffet near my house.
ref: There used to be this amazing buffet by my house.

src: वह जंगल जिम में करतब दिखाने का प्रयास कर रहा था
mt: He was attempting to show off in the gym
ref: He was in the jungle gym trying to do tricks.

src: उसने बबल बाथ लिया
mt: He took a bubble bath
ref: She took a bubble bath.

src: वह पहली बार अपने प्रेमी के माता-पिता से मिल रही थी
mt: She was meeting her boyfriend's parents for the first time.
ref: It was her first time meeting her boyfriend's parents.

src: हमने एक साथ मजेदार विंटर ब्रेक लेने का निर्णय लिया
mt: We decided to take a joint winter break together
ref: We decided to have a fun winter break together.

src: उसे लगा कि यह गिलहरी के लिए गर्म रहने का बहुत ही प्यारा सा तरीका है
mt: He thought it was a very nice way for the squirrel to keep warm
ref: He thought it was a cute way for the squirrel to say warm.

src: इसीलिए उसके दोस्त टाम ने उसे दुर्लभ प्रकार की वैरायटी लाकर दी
mt: So his friend Tom gave him a rare variety of it
ref: So his friend Tom got him a large case of a rare variety.

src: उसे हमेशा लगता था कि उसकी वजह से उसकी पूरी टीम पीछे जा रही है।
mt: He always felt that he was holding his whole team back.
ref: She always felt that she held the rest of her team back.

src: शुरुआत में उसे मजा आ रहा था
mt: 1st he was enjoying
ref: At first he was having fun.

src: दुर्भाग्य से वह यह निर्णय नहीं ले पा रहा था कि क्या खरीदे
mt: Unfortunately he was unable to decide what to buy
ref: Unfortunately he couldn't decide what to get.

src: वह कभी कोर्ट नहीं गया
mt: He never went to court
ref: He never went to court.

src: इसीलिए वह जंगलों में चला गया
mt: So he went into the woods
ref: So, he went out in the woods.

src: टेड को लगता था कि खेल एक विशिष्ट प्रकार की कला का रूप हैं जिसकी प्रशंसा की जानी चाहिए।
mt: Ted thought that games were a particular kind of art that should be appreciated.
ref: Ted thought that games were a burgeoning art form, worthy of praise.

src: अपने कुछ और कार्यों को निपटाने के पूर्व उसने ऊर्जा प्राप्त करने के लिए जूस पिया।
mt: Before finishing up some of his other tasks, he had juice to get energy.
ref: She drank some juice to refuel before running a few errands.

src: वह सुबह और रात दोनों समय टहलती है
mt: She walks in the morning and at night
ref: She takes a walk in the morning and at night.

src: पिछले सप्ताह वह एलिवेटर में अकेले था।
mt: He was alone in the elevator last week.
ref: Last week he was alone in an elevator.

src: वह बाहर यह देखने के लिए कि क्या हो रहा है गया तभी उसे अपनी कार क्षतिग्रस्त दिखी।
mt: He went outside to see what was happening and saw his car damaged.
ref: He ran outside to see what had happened, only to find his car damaged.

src: वहां रहने वाले लोगों को इसके बारे में पता भी नहीं चला।
mt: People living there didn't know about it.
ref: The people who lived there did not know.

src: कारमेन को पिज़्ज़ा की एक नई रेसिपी ढूंढनी थी ।
mt: Carmen was looking for a new pizza recipe.
ref: Carmen had to find a recipe for the pizza.

src: कंप्यूटर पर टाइप करने की स्थिति में उनसे बहुत ज्यादा आवाज आती है।
mt: In the position of typing on a computer, they are very loud.
ref: They are making a loud tapping sound when he types on his computer.

src: इसीलिए वह अपने पूरे घर में छुट्टे पैसे ढूंढता रहा।
mt: So he searched all over his house for his money.
ref: So he searched all over his house for spare change.

src: दुर्भाग्यवश सिक्योरिटी वाला ज्यादा समय लगा रहा था।
mt: Unfortunately, the security was taking too long.
ref: Unfortunately security was taking forever.

src: वह अपने बगीचे के आडू से बनाती हैं।
mt: She makes jam from her pear tree.
ref: She makes from the peaches grown in the orchard.

src: यहां तक कि उसका प्यार बहुत तगड़ा है फिर भी उसके टैको बहुत अच्छे नहीं होते हैं।
mt: Even though his love is very strong, his tacos are not very good.
ref: Although her love is strong, her tacos are not very good.

src: उसने कॉलेज जाने का निर्णय लिया और कला की क्लास में एडमिशन लेने का सोचा।
mt: He decided to go to college and thought about taking art classes.
ref: He decided to go to college and take art classes.

src: जेनी और उसकी मां ने एक अपार्टमेंट में जिसमें बहुत सारे कीट पतंगे थे वहां रहना शुरू किया।
mt: Jenny and her mother moved into an apartment infested with cockroaches.
ref: Jenny and her mom moved to a tiny apartment filled with roaches.

src: वह 2 वर्षों से प्रयासरत था परंतु उसे कोई सही मार्ग नहीं सूझ रहा था।
mt: 2 years he was trying but no right path was coming to his mind.
ref: He had been trying for Years, but lacked initiative.

src: उनमें से एक लड़की ने गलती से सबसे छोटी लड़की को पूल में धक्का देकर गिरा दिया
mt: 1 of the girls accidentally pushed the smallest girl into the pool, causing her to drown.
ref: One of the girls accidentally pushed the youngest girl into the pool.

src: वह इतनी प्यारी थी कि मैंने उसे अपने आप बुलाया।
mt: She was so cute that I called her myself.
ref: She was cute so I called her over.

src: पर उसने बारिश में कभी गाड़ी नहीं चलाई थी।
mt: But he had never driven in the rain.
ref: But she has never driven in the rainy.

src: मैंने यह सब एक छोटी बुकलेट में शामिल किया।
mt: I have included all this in a small booklet.
ref: I included them in a small booklet.

src: उसने $5 में बिक्री पर एक कैमरा देखा।
mt: He bought a camera for $5.
ref: He spotted a camera on sale for $5.

src: एक दिन उसके मालिक ने गेंद को बहुत जोर से फेंका।
mt: 1 day his owner threw the ball very hard.
ref: One day his owner threw the ball too hard.

src: कारों के गुजरने के लिए संकेत खुल गए थे।
mt: Traffic signals were open for cars to pass.
ref: The signed opened up for the cars to pass.

src: एक दिन, जब वह काम कर रही थी, उसे जमीन पर 20 डॉलर मिले!
mt: 20 dollars were found on the ground one day when she was working!
ref: One day, while she was working, she found $20 on the ground!

src: वह जांच के लिए एक ऑनलाइन टेस्टिंग साइट पर गया था।
mt: He went to an online testing site for examination.
ref: He went on an online testing site to check.

src: उसके बाल भूरे होने लगे थे!
mt: His hair was turning brown!
ref: Her hair was beginning to come in gray!

src: जब वह पार्टी में पहुंची तो अजीब सा संगीत बज रहा था।
mt: When she arrived at the party, strange music was playing.
ref: When she arrived at the party, there was weird music playing.

src: मैंने सोचा कि मैं इसे मॉडिफाई करके इसे और सुंदर बना दूंगा।
mt: I thought I would modify it to make it more beautiful.
ref: I thought I would make it cooler by modifying it.

src: उन्होंने ड्राइव के लिए अपने सभी सूटकेस और स्नैक्स पैक किए।
mt: They packed all their suitcases and snack packs for the drive.
ref: They packed all their suitcases and snacks for drive.

src: उसे समुद्र के किनारे रहने में मजा आता है।
mt: He likes to live by the sea.
ref: He enjoys living by the ocean.

src: उसने बीच में एक बड़े हीरे वाली एक सुंदर अंगूठी देखी।
mt: She saw a beautiful ring with a large diamond in the middle.
ref: He noticed a beautiful ring with a large diamond in the center.

src: मेरी गर्लफ्रेंड को ओपेरा पसंद है और मुझे नहीं।
mt: My girlfriend likes opera and I don't.
ref: My girlfriends loves the opera and I don't.

src: वे एक व्यापार बैठक कर रहे थे और चाहते थे कि वह वहां रहे।
mt: They were attending a business meeting and wanted to stay there.
ref: They were having a business meeting and wanted her to be there.

src: वह बहुत प्यारी और दुलारी थी।
mt: She was very cute and cuddly.
ref: She was very sweet and loving.

src: मैं इससे प्यार करता था, प्यार करता था और इसकी सांसें लेता था।
mt: I loved it, loved it, and breathed its air.
ref: I loved it, loved it and breathed it.

src: मई में हैरी का जन्मदिन था और स्कूल भी छूट गया था।
mt: Harry's birthday was in May and school was out.
ref: Harry had his birthday in May and school also let out.

src: यह जिम था।
mt: This was a gym.
ref: It was gym.

src: मैं जब घर पहुंचा तब 2 घंटे का दिन बचा हुआ था।
mt: 2 hours of the day remained when I arrived home.
ref: I rushed home with 2 hours of daylight left.

src: रेस्ट स्टॉप के अंदर उसने देखा कि एक अजीब आदमी उसे गौर से देख रहा है।
mt: He saw a strange man looking at him intently inside the rest stop.
ref: Inside the rest stop she saw a strange man looking at her intently.

src: मैं पीछे की सीट पर सो गया था।
mt: I was sleeping in the back seat.
ref: I had fallen asleep in the backseat.

src: कभी-कभी वे ठंडे पानी का आनंद लेते हुए घंटों तक भीतरी ट्यूब पर तैरते रहते हैं।
mt: Sometimes they enjoy the cold water by floating on the inner tube for hours.
ref: Sometimes they float on inner tubes for hours enjoying the cool water.

src: वह आज जल्दी घर पहुंचने के लिए अपना रास्ता तेजी से करने की कोशिश कर रहा था।
mt: He was trying to hurry home as quickly as possible.
ref: He was trying to do his route fast to get home early today.

src: उसने मूर्खतापूर्ण हरकतें करके उसका ध्यान आकर्षित करने की कोशिश की।
mt: He tried to attract attention by foolish actions.
ref: He tried to get her attention by acting silly.

src: उसने पहले कभी अच्छी क्रीम बनाने के बारे में नहीं सोचा था।
mt: She had never thought about making good cream before.
ref: She had never thought of making nice cream before.

src: उसकी माँ ने उसे बताया कि यह एक बुरी आदत थी।
mt: His mother told him that it was a bad habit.
ref: Her mother told her that it was a bad habit.

src: और पहुंचने पर दरवाज़ा बंद पाया।
mt: And when I reached the door, it was closed.
ref: And had arrived to find the door locked.

src: जब हम गाड़ी से लोकेशन पर जा रहे थे तो हमारी बस खराब हो गई।
mt: When we were going to the location in our car, our bus broke down.
ref: When we were driving to the location, our bus broke down.

src: उनमें से कोई भी मुझे नहीं बता सका कि उन्हें क्या टॉपिंग चाहिए।
mt: None of them could tell me what topping they wanted.
ref: None of them could tell me what toppings they wanted.

src: उसने अपना भाषण बढ़िया करने के लिए पूरे सप्ताहांत अभ्यास किया।
mt: He practiced his speech all weekend to make it better.
ref: She practiced all weekend on perfecting her speech.

src: अब वह रो रहा था क्योंकि वह इसे वापस चाहता था।
mt: Now he was crying because he wanted it back.
ref: Now he was crying because he wanted it back.

src: उसने वास्तव में कठिन अभ्यास किया और टीम के लिए प्रयास किया।
mt: He really practiced hard and tried for the team.
ref: She practiced real hard and tried out for the team.

src: यह खुशी का मौका नहीं था।
mt: This was not a happy occasion.
ref: It was not a happy occasion.

src: मैं अंधेरे में पेड़ के सामने बैठ जाता था और रोशनी की प्रशंसा करता था।
mt: I sat in front of a tree in the dark and praised the light.
ref: I sat in front of the tree in the dark and admired the lights.

src: जिम परेशान था लेकिन साथ ही सभी को गलत साबित करने के लिए प्रेरित भी हुआ।
mt: He was frustrated but also motivated to prove everyone wrong.
ref: Jim was upset but at the same time motivated to prove everyone wrong.

src: वह इसका भुगतान करना चाहती थी।
mt: She wanted to pay for it.
ref: She wanted to pay it off.

src: फिर वह फर्श पर कुछ कागज के स्क्रैप देखे।
mt: He then saw some paper scraps on the floor.
ref: Then he came upon some paper scraps on the floor.

src: उन्होंने चौथाई में एक गिलास नींबू पानी बेचा।
mt: They sold a glass of lemonade for a quarter.
ref: They sold a glass of lemonade for a quarter each.

src: उसने अपनी पोशाक पहनी और दरवाजे से बाहर भागी।
mt: She put on her dress and ran out the door.
ref: She put on her costume and ran out the door.

src: उसने अपना सारा सामान पैक करने और अपनी कार को लोड करने और छोड़ने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to pack his belongings, load his car, and leave.
ref: She decided to pack all her stuff and load her car and leave.

src: उस सुबह बाहर बहुत ठंड थी और उसे भयंकर लगा।
mt: It was very cold outside that morning and it was terrifying.
ref: It was very cold outside that morning and he felt terrible.

src: परिवार को दो पिज्जा मिले एक बिना चीज़ के।
mt: 2 pizzas were delivered to the family, one without cheese.
ref: The family got two pizzas one with no cheese.

src: बारिश हो रही थी और सभी बारिश में भीग गए।
mt: It was raining and we all got soaked.
ref: It was raining and everyone got soaked in the rain.

src: उसने एक दिन ओरेगन की यात्रा करने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to take a day trip to Oregon.
ref: He decided to travel to Oregon one day.

src: दोनों लोगों ने एक दोस्ताना मैच खेला।
mt: Both people played a friendly match.
ref: The two guys played a friendly match.

src: लैरी हर दिन खदानों में लंबे समय तक काम करता था।
mt: Larry worked in the mines for many years.
ref: Lary would work long hours every day in the mines.

src: उसने इसे बेचने और एक नयी खरीदने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to sell it and buy a new one.
ref: He decided to trade it in and buy a new one.

src: सैर के दौरान उसके कुत्ते ने और भी कई कुत्ते देखे।
mt: While walking his dog, he saw more dogs.
ref: During the walk, his dog saw several other dogs.

src: उसकी बेटी को अभी उसका पहला बच्चा हुआ और वह एक लड़की थी।
mt: His daughter had just had her first child and it was a girl.
ref: His daughter just had her first baby and she had a girl.

src: उसमें पांच लोग थे।
mt: 5 people were on board.
ref: Five people were inside it.

src: मेल के लिए नहीं बल्कि चीजों पर मुहर लगाने की तरह।
mt: Not for mail, but for things like stamps.
ref: Not the kind for mail but the kind to stamp things with.

src: उसे कुछ जेली के अलावा कुछ नहीं मिला।
mt: He got nothing but some jelly.
ref: He found nothing, except some jelly.

src: उसने उन्हें खुद बनाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to make them himself.
ref: She decided to make them herself.

src: दौड़ के समय के करीब, वह एक दौड़ में फिसल गया और उसका घुटना क्षतिग्रस्त हो गया।
mt: At the time of the race, he slipped in a run and his knee was injured.
ref: Near the time of the race, he slipped on a run and damaged his knee.

src: सूज़ी ने अपनी दादी को कॉल किया और कुछ भेजने को कहा।
mt: Suzie called her grandmother and asked her to send something.
ref: Susie called her grandma and asked her to send some.

src: सालों की मशक्कत के बाद आखिरकार उन्होंने एक बच्ची को जन्म दिया।
mt: After years of struggle, they finally gave birth to a girl.
ref: After years of trying, they finally conceived a baby girl.

src: एक दिन माइक ने अपनी कुर्सी तब हिलाई जब वह खड़ा था।
mt: 1 day ago Mike stood up and rocked his chair.
ref: One day Mike moved his chair while he was standing.

src: उसने गेराज बिक्री की योजना बनाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to plan garage sales.
ref: She decided to plan a garage sale.

src: यह एक पुराना, जर्जर, निर्जन घर था जिसे डराने के लिए बनाया गया था।
mt: It was an old, dilapidated, deserted house built to scare.
ref: It was an old, rickety, uninhabited house that was made for scares.

src: वह काम से एक महीने दूर रहने और केवल बिस्कुट बनाने का फैसला करती है।
mt: She decides to stay home for a month and only make biscuits.
ref: She decides to take a month away from work and only make biscuits.

src: एक दिन लूसी की माँ बहुत परेशान थी।
mt: 1 day Lucy's mother was very worried.
ref: One day Lucy's mom was very upset.

src: उसने उनके लिए खास खाना तैयार किया.
mt: She made them a special meal.
ref: He prepared a big meal for them.

src: उसने वीडियो ब्लॉग बनाने शुरू कर दिए.
mt: He started making video blogs.
ref: He started vlogging.

src: एक ट्रक के पिंजड़े में एक घोड़ा था.
mt: A horse was in a truck's cage.
ref: There was a truck with a horse in the cage.

src: वे रेस्टोरेंट के अंदर सबसे पहले पहुँचे थे.
mt: They were the first to arrive at the restaurant.
ref: They were the first ones inside the restaurant.

src: वह उनके साथ स्टोर पर गया और अलग-अलग खुशबू की मोमबत्तियाँ चुनने में उनकी मदद की.
mt: He went with her to the store and helped her choose different scented candles.
ref: He had went to the store with her and helped her pick out scents.

src: अंत में एक चुन लेने के बाद मैं उसे घर ले आया.
mt: After finally choosing one, I brought it home.
ref: After finally picking one out I took it home.

src: शुरू में वह बहुत अच्छा नहीं खेल सका और कई बार गिरा.
mt: He didn't start out playing very well and fell down many times.
ref: He did poorly at first, and he fell off a lot.

src: विलसन ने बेन को घास और पत्तियों से खाद बनाने का तरीका बताया.
mt: Wilson taught Ben how to make fertilizer from grass and leaves.
ref: Wilson showed Ben how to make compost with grass and leaves.

src: उसके फ़्रिज में खाने के लिए कुछ भी नहीं था.
mt: There was nothing to eat in his fridge.
ref: There was nothing in his fridge to eat.

src: हर कोई खाने के लिए कुछ साथ लेकर आया.
mt: Everyone brought something to eat.
ref: Everyone brought something along to eat.

src: उसने अपने अपार्टमेंट में पार्टी करने का तय किया.
mt: He planned to party in his apartment.
ref: She decided to have a party at her apartment.

src: उसने उसे सेट अप किया और हंसों के उड़ने का इंतज़ार करने लगा.
mt: He set it up and waited for the pigeons to fly.
ref: He set it up and waited for the geese to fly by.

src: लेकिन, अब उसे मैनेजर के पद पर प्रमोट कर दिया गया है.
mt: But now he has been promoted to manager.
ref: However, now she has been promoted to manager.

src: उसे सबसे पहले उठकर शांत माहौल में नाव चलाना अच्छा लगता था.
mt: He liked to row his boat in a quiet place.
ref: She loved peacefully rowing the canoe before anyone else was awake.

src: वह हमेशा अपना सबसे अच्छा देती थी और अक्सर ही ओवरटाइम काम करती थी.
mt: She always gave her best and often worked overtime.
ref: She always did her best and often worked overtime.

src: जब वह किसी चिहुआहुआ के हिसाब से भी बहुत छोटा था, तब भी उसे खाने से प्यार था.
mt: He loved to eat even when he was smaller than a Chihuahua.
ref: He was small, even for a chihuahua, but he loved food.

src: उसकी बॉस कारा ने उस पर एक सिफ़्ट में बहुत सारे लोगों को काम पर लगाने का इलज़ाम लगाया था.
mt: Her boss Kara accused her of putting too many people on the shift in a siphon.
ref: Her boss Cara accused her of putting too many people on a shift.

src: उसने माउंटेन केबिन जाने का तय किया.
mt: He decided to go to the mountain cabin.
ref: She decided to visit the mountain cabin.

src: उसने अपने दोस्तों को बताया कि सबसे मुश्किल काम अजनबी लोगों से बात करना है.
mt: He told his friends that the hardest part was talking to strangers.
ref: She told her friend the hardest thing is communicating with strangers.

src: फै़ंसी कल 14 साल की हो गई.
mt: 14 years ago today, Fancy died.
ref: Fancy turned 14 Year's old yesterday.

src: फिर भी, उसे प्राथमिक चिकित्सा किट रखने की ज़रूरत महसूस नहीं होती थी.
mt: However, he did not feel the need to carry a first aid kit.
ref: But he thought keeping an first aid kit was unnecessary.

src: उसने अपने लिए टोकरी में लंच पैक कर लिया.
mt: He packed his lunch in a basket for himself.
ref: He packed himself a lunch in a basket.

src: उन्होंने उसका नाम जॉय रखा.
mt: They named him Joy.
ref: They named her Joy.

src: उसने स्टोर से गोंद चुराने का तय किया.
mt: He decided to steal glue from the store.
ref: He decided to steal the gum from the store.

src: वह एक गेम खेलने के लिए तैयार हो रहा था, पर उसे एहसास हुआ कि वह अपना पर्स लाना भूल गया था.
mt: He was getting ready to play a game, but realized he had forgotten his wallet.
ref: He was getting ready to play a game but realized he forgot his wallet.

src: वह नज़ारे देखने के लिए आस-पास घूमने गया.
mt: He went around to see the sights.
ref: He walked around to see the sights.

src: वह स्टोर में गई और उसने एक फ़्लैट हेयर स्‍ट्रेटनर खरीदा.
mt: She went to the store and bought a flat hair straightener.
ref: She went to the store and purchased a flat iron straightener.

src: हम अक्सर वहाँ साथ में जाते हैं और हमें बहुत मज़ा आता है.
mt: We often go there together and we have a lot of fun.
ref: We go there together all the time and it's always amazing.

src: उसे पहले कभी गोली नहीं लगी थी, इसने उसे जीवन के बारे में सोचने पर मज़ूबर किया.
mt: She had never been shot before, and it made her think about life.
ref: He had never gotten shot before, it made him think about life.

src: डग ने ट्रेसी को दोबारा प्यार करना सिखाया.
mt: Doug taught Tracey how to love again.
ref: Doug taught Tracy how to feel love again.

src: वह एक नई किताब चाहता था लेकिन उसे नहीं पता था कि क्या चाहिए।
mt: He wanted a new book but he didn't know what to get.
ref: He wanted a new book but had no idea what to get.

src: वह सोचता था कि आयरिश राजधानी जीवंत और मैत्रीपूर्ण थी।
mt: He thought the Irish capital was lively and friendly.
ref: He thought the Irish capital was lively and friendly.

src: वह और उसकी गर्लफ्रेंड धूप पाने के लिए घंटों रेत में लेटे रहते।
mt: They lay in the sand for hours to catch some sun.
ref: He and his girlfriend spent hours laying in the sand, getting sun.

src: मेरे दोस्त का एक टायर पंक्चर हो गया था और बीच सड़क में फंस गया था।
mt: My friend's tire had a puncture and got stuck in the middle of the road.
ref: My friend had a flat tired and was stuck in the middle of the road.

src: उसने ठंडे पेय के लिए बर्फ के टुकड़े लाने के लिए फ्रीजर खोला।
mt: He opened the freezer to get ice cubes for a cold drink.
ref: She opened the freezer to get ice cubes for a cold drink.

src: उसने गेंद को नेट पर मारा और एक अंक हासिल किया।
mt: He hit the ball over the net and scored a point.
ref: He hit the ball over the net and scored a point.

src: पुरस्कार के प्रभारी व्यक्ति ने उसका पता लिया और उसे मेल कर दिया।
mt: The award recipient took down his address and sent him a letter.
ref: The person in charge of prizes got her address and mailed them out.

src: वह स्थानीय स्टोर में जाता है और एक डायरी खरीदता है।
mt: He goes to a local store and buys a diary.
ref: He goes to the local store and buys a diary.

src: वह इस्तांबुल में उतरी और दर्शनीय स्थलों की यात्रा शुरू की।
mt: She landed in Istanbul and started touring the tourist sites.
ref: She landed in Istanbul and started sightseeing.

src: जॉस को डर था कि वह और नई लड़की एक साथ नहीं होंगी।
mt: Joss was afraid that he and the new girl would not be together.
ref: Joss was afraid she and the new girl would not get along.

src: वे रसोई में इकट्ठे हुए और पिज्जा तैयार किया।
mt: They gathered in the kitchen and made pizza.
ref: The gathered in the kitchen and prepared pizza.

src: इसे खेलना मजेदार है लेकिन ईमानदारी से इसे देखना बहुत उबाऊ है।
mt: It's fun to play, but honestly, watching it is very boring.
ref: It's fun to play but honestly it's so boring to watch.

src: देर रात भी।
ref: Even late at night.

src: बस अपनी मनचाही नई टोपी पाने के लिए उसने एक घंटा ड्राइव किया।
mt: He drove an hour to get his desired new hat.
ref: He drove an hour just to get the new hat he wanted.

src: वह कई पबों में गए बिना शहर को नहीं छोड़ सकता था!
mt: He couldn't leave the city without going to many pubs!
ref: He couldn't leave the city without visiting its many pubs!

src: उसने फैसला किया कि वह भी स्की करना चाहता है।
mt: He decided that he also wanted to ski.
ref: He decides he wants to ski too.

src: वे थकानेवाले थे और वह कभी भी अन्य बच्चों की तरह अच्छा नहीं दिखता था।
mt: They were tired and he never looked good like other children.
ref: They were tedious and he never looked as nice as some other kids.

src: वह अपने दोस्तों के साथ शामिल हो गई और उनकी रात बहुत अच्छी रही।
mt: She joined her friends and had a great night.
ref: She joined her friends and they had a great night.

src: उन्होंने उसका बहुत अच्छे से ख्याल रखा।
mt: 1. They took good care of him.
ref: She took very good care of it.

src: उन्होंने बिना तैयारी के जैम सेशन आयोजित करने का फैसला किया।
mt: They decided to hold an impromptu jam session without preparation.
ref: They decided to have an impromptu jam session.

src: बनाया गया अंतिम पॉइंट मैच के विजेता का निर्धारण करेगा।
mt: The final point will determine the match winner.
ref: The last point made would determine the winner of the match.

src: यह पहला साल था जब जीना की माँ ने उन्हें साथ आने दिया।
mt: 2014 was the first year that Gina's mother allowed her to go with her.
ref: It was the first year Gina's mom let them come with.

src: वह उसे मूंगफली खिलाने लगी।
mt: She started feeding him peanuts.
ref: She began to feed it peanuts.

src: उसे डर था कि कहीं वह अपनी नई साइकिल से गिर न जाए।
mt: He was afraid that he might fall off his new bicycle.
ref: She was afraid that she would fall of her new bicycle.

src: ऐसा उसके साथ पहली बार हुआ था।
mt: It was the first time he had done so.
ref: It was her first time.

src: एक दिन, उसके माता-पिता ने उसे बताया कि वे वहां से जा रहे हैं।
mt: 1 day, his parents told him they were leaving.
ref: One day, her parents told her they were moving.

src: उन्होंने लॉग रखने के लिए एक नोटबुक छोड़ी।
mt: They left a notebook to keep a log.
ref: They left a notebook to keep a log.

src: जब मैंने ओवन में रखा, तो मैं चला गया।
mt: When I put it in the oven, I went away.
ref: When I put in the oven, I walked away.

src: स्कूल जाने से पहले उसने अपना नाश्ता किया।
mt: He ate his breakfast before going to school.
ref: She made herself breakfast before she left for school.

src: वह उसमें चढ़ गई और खुशी से खेली।
mt: She climbed in and played happily.
ref: She climbed into it and played happily.

src: उन्होंने एक टैब खोला।
mt: He opened a tab.
ref: They opened a tab.

src: मैंने कभी तैयारी नहीं की और केवल मूल बातें ही जानता था।
mt: I never prepared and only knew the basics.
ref: I never prepared and only new the very basics.

src: उन्होंने कहा कि नैट उद्दंड था और उसे दवा की जरूरत थी।
mt: He said that Natt was ill and needed medicine.
ref: She said that Nate was disruptive and needed medication.

src: वह लगभग हर हफ्ते वहां जाती थी।
mt: She went there almost every week.
ref: She used to go there almost every week.

src: मैं अपनी कार में बैठा और दुकान की ओर चल पड़ा।
mt: I sat in my car and started driving towards the store.
ref: I got in my car and rushed to the store.

src: वह जल्द ही एक घर खरीदने वाला था।
mt: He was soon going to buy a house.
ref: He was soon to buy a house.

src: उसके दोस्तों ने उसे चिढ़ाया कि वह ऊंचाइयों से डरता है।
mt: His friends taunted him that he was afraid of heights.
ref: His friends teased him that he was afraid of heights.

src: उसने निर्देशों को गलत तरीके से पढ़ा और इसे अपने पूरे शरीर पर लगा लिया।
mt: He misread the instructions and applied it all over his body.
ref: She misread the directions and applied it all over her body.

src: वह जानता था कि अलकोहल अस्वास्थ्यकर है और विवेक को खराब कर सकती है।
mt: He knew that alcohol was unhealthy and could impair judgment.
ref: He knew that alcohol was unhealthy and could impair judgement.

src: उसने तालाब के उस पार देखा और एक मक्खी पर नज़र रखी।
mt: He saw across the pond and kept an eye on a fly.
ref: He looked across the pond and spied a fly.

src: उसकी माँ हमेशा उससे ये चाहती थी।
mt: His mother always wanted him to be a doctor.
ref: His mom always wanted him to.

src: कई गज दूर से मैंने एक लाल सांप देखा।
mt: I saw a red snake from afar.
ref: From several yards away, I saw a red snake.

src: वह सप्ताह में कई बार कैसीनो जाने लगा।
mt: He started going to the casino several times a week.
ref: He started going to the casino multiple times a week.

src: मैंने एक फोटो फ्रेम निकाला।
mt: I pulled a photo frame out.
ref: I pulled out a photo frame.

src: मैथ्यू चिल्लाया।
mt: Matthew chills.
ref: Matthew screamed.

src: उसे उम्मीद थी कि वह काफी तेज थी।
mt: She thought she was fast enough.
ref: She hoped she was fast enough.

src: पिछली बार जब मैं घर गया था, मैंने रात में शिकार किया था।
mt: The last time I went home, I hunted at night.
ref: This past time I went home, I hunted at night.

src: जैक एक अच्छा शॉट एंगल पाने के लिए झुक कर एक तस्वीर लेने के लिए रुका।
mt: Jack a good shot angle to get a picture by stopping to take a picture of a bend.
ref: Jack paused to take a picture, leaning to get a good shot angle.

src: वहीं उन्होंने लिन के क्रश जिम को देखा।
mt: He also saw Lin's crush gym.
ref: While there they saw Lynn's crush Jim.

src: वो मजाकिया कपड़े पहनती थी।
mt: She wore funny clothes.
ref: She wore funny clothes.

src: वह यह जानकर बहुत उत्साहित थी क्योंकि वह हमेशा से एक बच्चा चाहती थी।
mt: She was very excited to know that she was going to have a baby because she had always wanted to be a mother.
ref: She was very excited knowing this for she always wanted a baby.

src: उसने सोचा कि उसके पास एक मौका है क्योंकि वह पतली और सुंदर थी।
mt: She thought she had a chance because she was thin and pretty.
ref: She thought she had a chance since she was thin and pretty.

src: उसने कभी अपने कमरे की सफाई नहीं की।
mt: He never cleaned his room.
ref: He never cleaned his room.

src: वह मेन रोड के चौराहे पर गई।
mt: She went to the crossroads on Main Road.
ref: She entered the crosswalk on the main road.

src: उसने दिन की छुट्टी सिर्फ इसलिए ली ताकि वह इसे समुद्र तट पर बिता सके।
mt: He took the day off just so he could spend it at the beach.
ref: He took the day off just so he could spend it on the beach.

src: रॉन ने फैसला किया कि जितना हो सके काम पर ओवरटाइम काम करेगा।
mt: Ron decided to work overtime as much as possible.
ref: Ron decided to work overtime at work as much as he could.

src: मैंने फोटोशॉप में कई किताबों के कवर बनाए।
mt: I made the covers of many books in Photoshop.
ref: I made several book covers in Photoshop.

src: पुरानी वाली बहुत घिसी हुई थी।
mt: It was very worn out.
ref: The old one was very worn.

src: डेनियल ने एक वेबसाइट बनाई जहां वह अपने लिखे हुए लेख को पोस्ट कर सकता था।
mt: Daniel created a website where he could post his written articles.
ref: Daniel made a website where he could post article he wrote.

src: शॉट के लिए खुला होने के बाद से गैरी अपने हाथ हवा में लहरा रहा था।
mt: Since the shot opened, Gary was waving his hands in the air.
ref: Gary was waving his hands in the air since he was open for a shot.

src: उन्होंने हमें सिखाया कि लकड़ियों से आग कैसे बनाई जाती है।
mt: They taught us how to make fire from wood.
ref: He taught us how to build a fire with sticks.

src: चूंकि कई आइटम सेल पर थे, इसलिए मैंने उन्हें देखा है।
mt: Because many items were on sale, I saw them.
ref: Since several items were for sale, I've looked at them.

src: कंपनी ने कहा कि उसे जाना होगा और उसे छोड़ दिया।
mt: The company said it would have to go and leave it.
ref: The company said they had to let her go and laid her off.

src: उसके पास टीवी देखने के अलावा करने के लिए कुछ नहीं था।
mt: He had nothing to do but watch TV.
ref: He never had anything to do but watch tv.

src: एक दोस्त ने सुझाव दिया कि वह ध्यान करने की कोशिश करें।
mt: A friend suggested he try to pay attention.
ref: A friend suggested that she try meditation.

src: लेकिन एक रात वह सुखद भोजन के लिए तरस रही थी।
mt: But one night she was fasting for a pleasant meal.
ref: But one night she was craving comfort food.

src: वह काम और स्कूल के बाद घर पर रही।
mt: 1. He stays at home after work and school.
ref: She stayed home from work and school.

src: वे हाइक पर चल पड़े।
mt: They started walking on the hike.
ref: They started on the hike.

src: हालांकि कल सुबह हवा बहुत तेज थी।
mt: However, the wind was very strong this morning.
ref: Yesterday morning it was very windy, though.

src: मुझे क्रिसमस के लिए एक ड्राइंग निर्देश पुस्तिका मिली।
mt: I got a drawing instructions booklet for Christmas.
ref: I received a drawing instruction book for Christmas.

src: वह कला का अध्ययन करना चाहती थी लेकिन उसे पैसे कमाने की चिंता थी।
mt: She wanted to study art but was worried about making money.
ref: She wanted to study art but was worried about making money.

src: दुर्भाग्य से उसके स्कूल जाना था और माता-पिता सख्त थे।
mt: Unfortunately, he was supposed to go to school and his parents were strict.
ref: Unfortunately she had school and strict parents.

src: उसके क्रश पीटर ने उसे हाइकिंग पर जाने के लिए कहा था!
mt: Her crush Peter had asked her to go hiking with him!
ref: Her crush Peter had asked her to go hiking!

src: उन्होंने इसे वर्तमान में सबसे ऊंचे से दोगुना ऊंचा बनाने की योजना बनाई।
mt: They plan to make it twice as high as the current highest.
ref: He drew plans to make it twice as high as the current tallest.

src: अपनी यात्रा के अंतिम दिन वे एक साथ एक तस्वीर एक चाहती हैं।
mt: On the last day of their journey, they want to take a picture together.
ref: On the last day of their trip they want a picture together.

src: वह लुका-छिपी खेलना चाहता था।
mt: He wanted to play hide-and-seek.
ref: He wanted to play hide and seek.

src: उन्होंने गति सीमा से तेज़ ड्राइव कर समय पर पहुंचने का प्रयास किया।
mt: They tried to get there on time by driving faster than the speed limit.
ref: He tried to get their on time by driving over the speed limit.

src: बैंड के पहले दिन उसने शिक्षक को ऐसा बताया।
mt: On the first day of band, he told his teacher to play.
ref: The first day of band she told the teacher so.

src: उसने पूरे गलियारे को देखा लेकिन एक फल को चुन नहीं सका।
mt: He looked over the whole aisle but couldn't choose a fruit.
ref: He looked through the whole aisle but could not decide on a fruit.

src: उन्होंने शेरों समेत कई जानवरों को देखा।
mt: They saw many animals including lions.
ref: The saw many animals, including lions.

src: वह पूरे दिन घर पर अभ्यास करती थी।
mt: She practiced at home all day.
ref: She practiced all day at home.

src: उसकी टीम बहुत अच्छा नहीं कर रही थी।
mt: His team was not doing very well.
ref: Her team wasn't doing very well.

src: वह भयानक चिंता से पीड़ित थी।
mt: She was in terrible distress.
ref: She was suffering from crippling anxiety.

src: वह घबरा गया!
mt: He was scared!
ref: He was terrified!

src: अभी कुछ समय पहले, ब्लू बेले को वापस बुलाया गया और उन्होंने निर्माण करना छोड़ दिया।
mt: Just a few minutes ago, the blue bell was called back and they left off construction.
ref: Not too long ago, Blue Belle had a recall and quit producing.

src: लेकिन उसने भव्य पुरस्कार जीतने की उम्मीद में टैलेंट शो में प्रवेश किया।
mt: But she entered the talent show in hopes of winning a grand prize.
ref: But he entered the talent show hoping to win the grand prize.

src: उसकी माँ उसे करने के लिए कहती है।
mt: His mother tells him to do it.
ref: His mom makes him go.

src: वह अपने साथ किताब पढ़ने के लिए एक कॉफी शॉप में ले आई।
mt: She took him to a coffee shop to read a book.
ref: She brought the book with her to a coffee shop to read.

src: उसने स्थानीय हॉलीवुड वीडियो की ओर रुख किया।
mt: He went to local Hollywood Video.
ref: He drove to the local Hollywood video.

src: इस निजी जानकारी को जानने के बाद भीड़ में हड़कंप मच गया।
mt: After learning this private information, the crowd was in an uproar.
ref: The crowd went wild after learning this personal information.

src: उसने अपने टेस्ट पास किए और उसे होनोलूलू में काम पर रखा गया.
mt: He passed his tests and was hired to work in Honolulu.
ref: He passed his tests and was hired in Honolulu.

src: बड़े उम्र वाला कुत्ता बहुत बीमार हो गया और उसे सोने के लिए रखा गया.
mt: The older dog became very ill and was put to sleep.
ref: The older dog got very sick and was put to sleep.

src: उन्होंने उसे बताया कि उसे बहुत जल्द अपने कपड़े धोने की ज़रूरत है.
mt: He told her that she needed to wash her clothes very soon.
ref: They tell him he needs to clean his laundry pretty soon.

src: पहली बार जब उसने इसकी परीक्षा दी, तो उसे काफ़ी अच्छे अंक नहीं मिले.
mt: 1st time when he gave the exam, he didn't get good marks.
ref: The first time she took it, she did not get a good enough score.

src: वह जल्दी से गई और अपने पैर अंदर डाल दिए.
mt: She quickly went and put her feet inside.
ref: She immediately went and put her feet in.

src: हालांकि, उसने वर्म को हुक पर डालना घिनौना पाया.
mt: However, he found it disgusting to hang the worm on the hook.
ref: However, he found putting the worms on the hook to be disgusting.

src: एक हफ़्ते पहले अमेलिया की दोस्त ने उसे एक ब्लाइंड डेट पर के लिए सेट किया था.
mt: 1 week ago Amelia's friend set her up on a blind date.
ref: Amelia's friend had set her up on a blind date a week prior.

src: लड़का डरा हुआ था और उसने मना कर दिया.
mt: The boy was scared and refused.
ref: The boy was scared and refused.

src: वह उसमें इतना मगन हो गया कि, आग जला कर रखना ही भूल गया.
mt: He was so engrossed in it that he forgot to put the fire out.
ref: He got so engrossed in it, he forgot to keep the fire going.

src: उसे एक ऑनलाइन स्पेनिश कोर्स मिला, और उसने नाम दर्ज करा लिया.
mt: He found an online Spanish course and signed up for it.
ref: He found an online Spanish course, and he enrolled.

src: उसके पास ख़रीदने के लिए आइटम की एक छोटी लिस्ट थी.
mt: He had a short list of items to buy.
ref: She had a short list of items to buy.

src: वह अपने ब्लो ड्रायर को गायब पाकर उदास थी.
mt: She was sad that her blow dryer was missing.
ref: She was upset to find her blow dryer missing.

src: उसका बिस्तर कई सालों से दीवार के बगल में रखा हुआ है.
mt: His bed has been against the wall for years.
ref: Her bed has stood next to the wall for many Year's.

src: जब भी उसे मौका मिलता वह उसे चलाता.
mt: Whenever he gets a chance, he drives it.
ref: He rode it whenever he could.

src: वह सच में अपनी नौकरी से प्यार करती थी और निवासियों से संपर्क बनाए रहती थी.
mt: She really loved her job and kept in touch with residents.
ref: She really loved her job and connected with the residents.

src: वे जिस बैंड को बहुत पसंद करते हैं उसे देख रहे थे.
mt: They were watching the band they liked.
ref: They were seeing this band they love.

src: उसे यह सोचना पसंद था कि वह दूसरों के बदले टेक्नोलॉजी पर कम निर्भर था.
mt: He liked to think he was less dependent on technology than others.
ref: He liked to think he was less dependent on technology than others.

src: वह जानता था कि वे काफ़ी महंगे थे.
mt: He knew they were too expensive.
ref: He knew they were quite expensive.

src: मैंने एक कटोरी में सीरियल निकाला लेकिन पाया कि मेरे पास ज़रा भी दूध नहीं है.
mt: I poured a bowl of cereal but found I had no milk.
ref: I poured a bowl of cereal but found I did not have any milk.

src: वह उसमें सिर्फ़ कोरल रखती थी.
mt: She only kept coral in it.
ref: She only kept coral in it.

src: अफ़सोस की बात है कि, हॉली बहुत बीमार हो गई और ली को उसे सुलाना पड़ा.
mt: It is unfortunate that Holly got very sick and Lee had to put her down.
ref: Saddly, Holy got very sick and Lee had to put her to sleep.

src: वह उन्हें ख़रीदने के लिए स्थानीय डिपार्टमेंट स्टोर में गया था.
mt: He went to a local department store to buy them.
ref: He went to the local department store to buy them.

src: उसका पसंदीदा खिलाड़ी जमाल लुईस, वापस भगा रहा था.
mt: His favorite player Jamal Lewis was running back.
ref: His favorite player was running back Jamal Lewis.

src: उसे पता था कि यह ज़रूर अपने घोंसले से गिर गया होगा.
mt: He knew it had to have fallen from its nest.
ref: She knew it must have fallen from its nest.

src: मैंने अपने इस्तीफ़े का पत्र लिखा था.
mt: I wrote a letter of resignation.
ref: I wrote my letter of resignation.

src: मैंने कुछ हफ़्तों के लिए इसे अपनी किताबों की अलमारी के ऊपर छोड़ दिया.
mt: I left it on top of my bookshelf for a few weeks.
ref: I left it atop my bookcase for a few weeks.

src: उसने अपने डेबिट कार्ड का इस्तेमाल करके कॉफ़ी के पैसे चुकाए.
mt: He used his debit card to pay for his coffee.
ref: He paid for the coffee using his debit card.

src: एयरपोर्ट के चारों ओर घूमते हुए, उसने फ़ैसला किया कि वह इस समय का सही इस्तेमाल करेगा.
mt: As he circled the airport, he decided to use this time wisely.
ref: Pacing around the airport, he decided he would make use of this time.

src: मुझे याद है कि मैंने अपने पिता से पूछा था कि साइट का इस्तेमाल कैसे करें.
mt: I remember asking my father how to use the site.
ref: I remember asking my dad how to use the site.

src: वह घर गया और अपने जवाबों को याद करते हुए, सही में मेहनत से पढ़ाई की.
mt: He went home and studied hard, remembering his answers, and doing well in school.
ref: He went home and studied real hard, memorizing his answers.

src: जब वह आठ सप्ताह का था तब उसे एक प्यारे परिवार को सौंप दिया गया था।
mt: When he was eight weeks old, he was placed with a loving family.
ref: When he was eight weeks old he was given away to a lovely family.

src: एक गर्मियों में, उसने पहाड़ पर चढ़ने का फैसला किया।
mt: 1. In the summer, he decided to climb a mountain.
ref: One summer, she decided to go mountain climbing.

src: उसने फ्रेड से कहा कि समय कठिन था और उसे नौकरी से निकालना पड़ा।
mt: He told Fred that the time was hard and he had to be fired from his job.
ref: He told Fred that times were tough and he had to be laid off.

src: वह हाल ही में विधवा हुई है जो पेंशन पर रह रही है।
mt: She is recently widowed and living on a pension.
ref: She is a recent widow living on a pension.

src: हालांकि, उन्होंने कभी पिस्ता नहीं खाया।
mt: However, they never ate a pistachio.
ref: However, he has never eaten a pistachio.

src: उसने एक दिन बीज बोने का निश्चय किया।
mt: He decided to sow seeds one day.
ref: She decided one day to plant the seeds.

src: एमिली अच्छे मौसम का फायदा उठाना चाहती थी।
mt: Emily wanted to take advantage of the good weather.
ref: Emily wanted to take advantage of the great weather.

src: इसलिए, उसने ग्रिड से हटने का फैसला किया।
mt: So, he decided to leave the grid.
ref: So, he decided to move off the grid.

src: वह बाहरी अंतरिक्ष में जाना चाहता था।
mt: He wanted to go into outer space.
ref: He wanted to go into outer space.

src: वह एक वेट्रेस है।
mt: She is a waitress.
ref: She is a waitress.

src: शेयर की कीमत 90 डॉलर थी जब उसने इसे खरीदा था।
mt: 90 dollars was the share price when he bought it.
ref: The stock price was 90 dollars when he bought it.

src: पिछले एक महीने में उसने हर रात शब्दकोश का अध्ययन किया था।
mt: He had studied the dictionary every night for the past month.
ref: She had spent the past month studying the dictionary every night.

src: मैं आज उसके यहाँ नमस्ते कहने गया।
mt: I went to his place and said namaste to him today.
ref: I went up to her place today to say hello.

src: मौसम शांत होने लगा।
mt: The weather is calming down.
ref: The weather started out tranquil.

src: उसके माता-पिता एक सप्ताह के लिए शहर से बाहर थे।
mt: His parents were out of town for a week.
ref: His parents were out of town for the week.

src: वह बिजली गुल होने के दिनों को याद करती है।
mt: She remembers the days of power outages.
ref: She misses having days with the power out.

src: उसने अभी-अभी एक नया स्केटबोर्ड प्राप्त किया था और उसे आज़माना चाहता था।
mt: He had just gotten a new skateboard and wanted to try it out.
ref: He had just gotten a new skateboard and wanted to try it out.

src: लेकिन अचानक उसे अपने हाथ पर एक अजीब सी खुजली का अहसास हुआ।
mt: But suddenly he felt a strange itching on his hand.
ref: But suddenly, he felt a strange itching sensation on his arm.

src: वह बोस्टन से सिएटल की यात्रा करना चाहती थी।
mt: She wanted to travel from Boston to Seattle.
ref: She wanted to travel from Boston to Seattle.

src: मैरी नृत्य को लेकर उत्साहित हो गईं।
mt: She was excited about the Mary dance.
ref: Mary became excited about the dance.

src: मैं इसे आजमाने के लिए बहुत उत्साहित था क्योंकि मैं पहले कभी नहीं गया था।
mt: I was very excited to try it because I had never been before.
ref: I was super excited to try it because I never went before.

src: लेकिन उसने शिकायत की कि उससे बहुत अधिक प्रकाश परावर्तित होता है।
mt: But he complained that too much light is reflected from it.
ref: But she complained that they reflected too much light.

src: मैं अपने मित्र के समूह में शामिल हुआ क्योंकि उन्हें एक और व्यक्ति की आवश्यकता थी।
mt: I joined my friend's group as they needed another person.
ref: I joined my buddy's group because they needed one more person.

src: एक रात पहले हिमपात हुआ था इसलिए उसे अपनी कार को बेलचे से बाहर निकालना पड़ा।
mt: The car had to be dug out of the snow after a snowfall the night before.
ref: It snowed the night before so she had to shovel her car out.

src: डैन ने पूछा कि क्या यह लाइव था या रिकॉर्ड किया गया था।
mt: Dan asked if it was live or recorded.
ref: Dan asked if this was live or recorded.

src: उसकी नौकरी के साथ उसका बुरा समय था और उसे निकाल दिया गया।
mt: His job was going bad and he was fired.
ref: He had a bad time with his job and got fired.

src: प्रतिदिन सारस उसके आँगन के कीड़ों को खा जाती थी।
mt: Every day the peacock ate the insects in its yard.
ref: Everyday the cranes would feed off of the bugs in her yard.

src: हम सभी जीतने के लिए उत्साहित थे।
mt: We were all excited to win.
ref: We were all pumped to win.

src: उसने काम में बहुत परेशानी झेली और अक्सर शिक्षकों से मदद मांगी।
mt: She struggled a lot in her work and often asked teachers for help.
ref: She struggled a lot with the work and often sought help from teachers.

src: सोफी उन्हें अलविदा कहने अस्पताल गई।
mt: Sophie went to the hospital to say goodbye to him.
ref: Sophie visited her in the hospital to say goodbye.

src: वह दस मिनट में तैयार हो गई और दरवाजे से बाहर निकल गई।
mt: She was ready in ten minutes and walked out the door.
ref: She got ready in ten minutes and raced out the door.

src: उसने इसे मारने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to kill it.
ref: He decided to swat it.

src: एक दिन, उन्होंने इसके अंदर जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: 1 day, they decided to go inside.
ref: One day, they decided to go inside it.

src: उसने कुछ पोकर खेलकर रात की शुरुआत की।
mt: He started the night by playing some poker.
ref: She began the night by playing some poker.

src: हालांकि, उसने देखा कि उसके स्नीकर्स मैले और भद्दे होते जा रहे हैं।
mt: However, he noticed that his sneakers were getting dirty and ugly.
ref: However, she notices that her sneakers are becoming muddy and gross.

src: उसने शादी की अंगूठी महीनों पहले खरीदी थी और वह नहीं मिल रही थी!
mt: She bought the wedding ring months ago and she couldn't find it!
ref: He had bought the wedding ring months before and couldn't find it!

src: वह पैसे घर ले गया लेकिन उसने सोचा कि क्या उसने सही काम किया है।
mt: He brought the money home but he thought what he had done was right.
ref: He took the money home but he wondered if he did the right thing.

src: वे बहुत अच्छा महसूस कराते हैं और वे मज़ेदार हैं।
mt: They feel very good and they are fun.
ref: They feel great and they're fun.

src: बैरी ने फैसला किया कि वह एक पेशेवर खेल देखने जाएगा।
mt: Barry decided that he would go see a professional game.
ref: Barry decided that he would go and watch a professional game.

src: हमने विभिन्न उपचार देखे।
mt: We have seen various treatments.
ref: We looked up various treatments.

src: लेकिन एक दिन, उसने अपने पूरे कालीन पर दूध बिखेर दिया।
mt: But one day, he spilled milk all over his entire carpet.
ref: But one day, she spilled milk all over her carpet.

src: वे नवविवाहित सुखी थे, लेकिन अपने परिवार को बढ़ाना चाहते थे।
mt: They were happy newlyweds, but wanted to grow their family.
ref: They were happy newlyweds, but wanted an addition to their family.

src: वे सभी वहां जल्दी पहुंचना चाहते थे।
mt: They all wanted to get there quickly.
ref: They all wanted to get there fast.

src: कॉन्सर्ट अद्भुत था।
mt: The concert was amazing.
ref: The concert was amazing.

src: उसके नए साल का संकल्प एक आहार पर टिके रहने का था।
mt: 2016 was the year of the diet for her.
ref: His new year's resolution was to stick to a diet.

src: उसके माता-पिता ने फैसला किया कि उन्हें उसे प्रेरित करने की जरूरत है।
mt: His parents decided that he needed to be motivated.
ref: Her parents decided they needed to motivate her.

src: हम नींबू पानी स्टैंड के लिए विचार लेकर आए।
mt: We brought the idea of lemonade stand.
ref: We came up with the idea for a lemonade stand.

src: जब मैं बड़ा हुआ तो मैंने छोटी क्लिप ऑन फ्लैशलाइट खरीदी।
mt: When I was young, I bought a small clip-on flashlight.
ref: When I got older I bought small clip on flashlights.

src: वह सुपर मेट्रो वोल्केनो मैन जैसा कूल नाम चाहता था।
mt: He wanted a cool name like Super Metro Volcano Man.
ref: He wanted a cool name like Super Metro Volcano Man.

src: उन्होंने पूरे शहर में देखा, लेकिन उन्हें अपना मनचाहा घर नहीं मिला।
mt: He looked all over the city, but he didn't find his dream house.
ref: They looked all over town but couldn't find a home they wanted.

src: बहुत अधिक ट्रैफिक होने के बावजूद वह जितनी तेजी से गाड़ी चला सकता था, उतना चलाया।
mt: He drove as fast as he could, despite the heavy traffic.
ref: He drove as fast as he can although there was a lot of traffic.

src: उसने जम्प कराने की कोशिश की लेकिन यह काम नहीं किया।
mt: He tried to jump but it didn't work.
ref: She tried to have it jumped but it didn't work.

src: वह अपने नए स्केटबोर्ड को अपने दोस्तों को दिखाने के लिए पार्क में ले गया।
mt: He took his new skateboard to the park to show his friends.
ref: He took his new skateboard to the park to show it off to his friends.

src: अगस्त का मध्य था और कक्षाएं जल्द ही शुरू हो रही थीं।
mt: It was mid-August and classes were about to start.
ref: It was mid August and classes were beginning soon.

src: लेकिन उसे बताया गया कि ज्यादा मसालेदार भोजन सिचुआन प्रांत में है।
mt: But he was told that the spicier food was in Sichuan province.
ref: But he was told the spicier food was in Szechuan province.

src: मेरे शिक्षक ने मुझे जागने के लिए कहा क्योंकि सोने की अनुमति नहीं थी।
mt: My teacher told me to wake up because sleeping was not allowed.
ref: My teacher told me to wake up since no sleeping was aloud.

src: अमांडा इस बात से रोमांचित थी कि गिलहरी कितनी कुशल थी।
mt: Amanda was thrilled at how clever the squirrel was.
ref: Amanda was fascinated with how efficient the squirrel was.

src: वह हमेशा पहले पैरों तक के पानी में कूदता है।
mt: He always jumps in up to his ankles.
ref: He always jumps in the water feet first.

src: वह विज्ञान संग्रहालय का दौरा करने के लिए उत्सुक था।
mt: He was eager to visit the science museum.
ref: He was looking forward to visiting the science museum.

src: सीडर पॉइंट पर काम करते हुए, उसकी मुलाकात जेम्स से हुई।
mt: While working at Cedar Point, he met James.
ref: While working at Cedar Point, she met James.

src: वह बहुत घबराई हुई थी।
mt: She was very frightened.
ref: She was very nervous.

src: एक दिन उसने एक स्पा में दोपहर के लिए खुद को बुक किया।
mt: 1 day he booked himself for an afternoon at a spa.
ref: One day she booked herself an afternoon at a spa.

src: उसे पचास डॉलर का बोनस मिला।
mt: 50 dollars bonus was given to him.
ref: He got a fifty dollar bonus.

src: हम सब बहुत भूखे थे।
mt: We were all very hungry.
ref: We were all very hungry.

src: मैरी के दादाजी को छोड़कर सब वहाँ रहने वाले थे।
mt: Everyone else was there except Mary's grandfather.
ref: Everyone was going to be there except for Mary's Grandfather.

src: वे अपनी माँ के पास दौड़े और छुट्टा पैसों का निवेदन किया।
mt: They ran to their mother and asked for pocket money.
ref: They ran to their mother and begged for change.

src: इस पर चर्चा करने के बाद, हम ड्राइव नहीं करना चाहते थे।
mt: After discussing this, we did not want to drive.
ref: After discussing it, we didn't want to drive.

src: काम से पहले उसे जानवरों को खाना खिलाना पड़ता था।
mt: Before work, he had to feed animals.
ref: She had to feed the animals before work.

src: कल रात मैं एक नया टीवी शो देखने में लगा हुआ था।
mt: I was watching a new TV show last night.
ref: Last night I was hooked watching a new tv show.

src: उसने पूरा दिन अपने जीवन का आनंद लेने में बिताने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to spend the whole day enjoying his life.
ref: He decided to spend all day enjoying his life.

src: उसने अपनी हार्डहैट लगाई, अपने औजारों को पकड़ा और साइट पर चला गया।
mt: He put on his hard hat, grabbed his tools, and went to the site.
ref: He put on his hardhat, grabbed his tools and walked into the site.

src: हालांकि ट्रेंट को कैंपिंग से नफरत थी।
mt: However, Trent hated camping.
ref: Trent hated camping though.

src: उसे एक बहुत अच्छा टीवी मिला जो वह चाहता था और उसे लेने चला गया।
mt: He got a very good TV that he wanted and went to pick it up.
ref: He found a very nice TV that he wanted and went to pick it up.

src: उसने सोचा कि यह पंक और कूल था।
mt: He thought it was punk and cool.
ref: He thought it was punk and cool.

src: उसने फेसबुक पर पोस्ट किया, उम्मीद थी कि कोई देखेगा।
mt: He posted on Facebook, hoping someone would see it.
ref: She posted on Facebook, hoping somebody would see.

src: जब वह जगा तो जूते पहनने लगा।
mt: When he woke up, he started putting on his shoes.
ref: When he woke up, he went to put his shoes on.

src: उसने इसे गर्भावस्था के नौ महीनों के गुजार लिया।
mt: She has survived nine months of pregnancy.
ref: She made it through the nine months of pregnancy.

src: वह इसे हर सप्ताहांत समुद्र तट पर ले जाते हैं।
mt: He takes it to the beach every weekend.
ref: He takes it to the beach every weekend.

src: मेरी बहन ने मुझे अपने बच्चे को बाइक से स्कूल ले जाने के लिए प्रोत्साहित किया।
mt: My sister encouraged me to take my child to school by bike.
ref: My sister encouraged me to bike her kid to school.

src: वह एक रेस्तरां में उनसे मिलने के लिए निकली।
mt: She went to meet him at a restaurant.
ref: She drove out to meet them at a restaurant.

src: हमने पिल्लों और बिल्ली के बच्चों को उनके पिंजरों में देखा।
mt: We saw the puppies and kittens in their cages.
ref: We looked at puppies and kittens in their cages.

src: आज उसकी शादी का दिन था और वह पहले से ही तितलियों को महसूस कर रहा था।
mt: Today was her wedding day and she was already feeling butterflies.
ref: Today was his wedding day and he already felt the butterflies.

src: उसने कोज़ूमल जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to go to Kozhikode.
ref: He decided to move to Cozumel.

src: उसने एक भर्तीकर्ता से इसके बारे में पूछा।
mt: He asked a recruiter about it.
ref: She asked a recruiter about it.

src: वह पूरे स्कूल में केवल 2 लोगों को जानती थी।
mt: She knew only two people in the whole school.
ref: She only knew 2 people in the whole school.

src: विमान बहुत बड़ा था, मैं डर गया था।
mt: The plane was very big, I was scared.
ref: The plane was very big, I was scared.

src: उन्होंने विभिन्न हैट को ऑनलाइन देखा।
mt: They looked at various hats online.
ref: He looked online at different hats.

src: उन्होंने पाया कि उनके पास इसके लिए भुगतान करने के लिए पर्याप्त नहीं हो सकता है।
mt: They found they may not have enough to pay for it.
ref: They noticed that they may not have enough to pay for it.

src: लेकिन उसे उसकी चप्पलें नहीं मिली।
mt: But he didn't get his slippers.
ref: But she couldn't find her slippers.

src: वह वहां की सारी संस्कृति को देखने के लिए और इंतजार नहीं कर सकता था!
mt: He couldn't wait to see all the culture there!
ref: He could not wait to see all the culture there!

src: स्कूल में उसने बहुत मेहनत की थी और सोचती कि उसे इसके लिए ईनाम मिलना चाहिए.
mt: She had worked hard at school and thought she should be rewarded for it.
ref: She worked very hard in school and thought she deserved a reward.

src: वह पार्क में अपनी ट्रिप के लिए सही कपड़े नहीं चुन पा रहा था.
mt: He was having trouble choosing the right clothes for his trip to the park.
ref: He could not find a good outfit to wear for his trip to the park!

src: वह डिलीवरी मैन के आने से पहले अपना कमरा साफ़ करना चाहती थी.
mt: She wanted to clean her room before the delivery man arrived.
ref: She needed to clean her room before the delivery men arrived.

src: उन्हें बच्चों का पढ़ाना नहीं आता था.
mt: He didn't know how to teach children.
ref: They did not know how to teach the students.

src: एक दिन वह उसके पीछे चला गया.
mt: 1 day later he followed her.
ref: He followed her home one day.

src: वह महान पिरामिड देखने के लिए गया.
mt: He went to see the great pyramids.
ref: He took a tour to see the Great Pyramids.

src: वह उसे सिर्फ़ 5 मिनट के लिए लगाकर छोड़ना चाहती थी, न कि करीब एक घंटा.
mt: She wanted to leave him for just five minutes, not nearly an hour.
ref: She only meant to leave it in for about 5 minutes, not nearly an hour.

src: डग सिर्फ़ यही चाहता था कि क्रिसमस के दिन चारों तरफ़ बर्फ़ हो.
mt: Doug just wanted snow for Christmas.
ref: All Doug wanted was a white Christmas.

src: उसका परिवार कहता कि उसका काम उबाऊ है.
mt: His family says his job was boring.
ref: Her family told her she worked a boring job.

src: उसकी घड़ी में 10 बज चुके थे.
mt: 10 o'clock had just struck on his watch.
ref: His clock showed it was 10 am.

src: उसकी पत्नी ने अपने सभी दोस्तों को बताया कि उसे उसकी बीमारी के बारे में नहीं पता था.
mt: His wife told all her friends that she did not know about his illness.
ref: His wife told all her friends she hadn't known he was ill.

src: उसका बच्चा पैदा होने वाला है.
mt: She is about to give birth.
ref: Her baby is about to become born.

src: शनिवार को हम पेट स्टोर पर गए.
mt: We went to the pet store on Saturday.
ref: We went to the pet store on Saturday.

src: उसे हमेशा ए मिलते थे.
mt: He always got an A.
ref: She got As all the time.

src: उन्होंने ऑनलाइन हफ़्तों अपार्टमेंट सर्च किए.
mt: They searched online for apartments for weeks.
ref: They searched for apartments online for weeks.

src: वह जन्मदिन की पार्टी देना चाहती थी.
mt: She wanted to throw a birthday party.
ref: She wanted to throw a birthday party.

src: कल उसकी शादी थी और यह खुले में आयोजित किया गया था.
mt: It was to be an open-air wedding tomorrow.
ref: Her wedding was tomorrow, and it was an outdoor ceremony.

src: वह पूरे साल बहुत अच्छी रही है.
mt: 2015 was a very good year.
ref: She had been very good all year.

src: वह पैदावार काटने के लिए बाहर गई.
mt: She went out to harvest the crop.
ref: She went outside to harvest.

src: उसे निकालने के लिए अपना हाथ उसमें डालने में उसे घिन आ रही थी.
mt: She was disgusted at the thought of putting her hand in it to pull him out.
ref: She was disgusted by the thought of putting her hand in to pull it out.

src: अपनी पहली पियानो क्लास के बाद, हना निराश हो गई.
mt: After her first piano lesson, Hanna was disappointed.
ref: After her first piano lesson, Hannah felt discouraged.

src: उसके पास बहुत अच्छी जॉब, आलिशान घर था, और अपनी हर डेट पर खुद खर्च करता था.
mt: He had a great job, a nice house, and spent his own money on every date.
ref: He had a great job, impressive house, and paid for all their dates.

src: उसने भेड़ों को लाने के लिए अपना कुत्ता चारागाह में भेज दिया.
mt: He sent his dog to fetch the sheep to the pasture.
ref: He sent his dog into the pasture to round up the sheep.

src: वह बिंग पर एक अच्छी औरत से मिला और उसके साथ दोस्ती कर ली.
mt: He met a good woman on a dating site and became friends with her.
ref: He met a nice lady at bingo and became friendly with her.

src: उसके चेहरे की तरफ़ आ रही तेज़ हवाओं से बचने के लिए, उसने अपना चेहरा झुका लिया.
mt: To avoid the strong winds coming towards his face, he turned his face down.
ref: She put her face down to avoid the harsh wind coming towards her face.

src: मैंने अपने अंक अपनी पारिवारिक बाइबल से चुने.
mt: I chose my votes from my family Bible.
ref: I picked my numbers from our family's bible.

src: अगले हफ़्ते, उसका प्रकाशसंश्लेषण पर टेस्ट है.
mt: Next week, it will be tested for photosynthesis.
ref: She has a test next week about Photosynthesis.

src: मैं अपनी शुरू करने की तारीख से एक हफ़्ते पहले मुश्किल से ही सो पाया.
mt: I had trouble sleeping the week before I started.
ref: I could barely sleep the week before my start date.

src: माइक ने बेन का स्वागत किया और वे माइक के कमरे में खेलने चले गए.
mt: Mike welcomed Ben and they went to play in Mike's room.
ref: Mike greeted Ben, and they went to play in Mike's room.

src: वेटर ने बिल प्रिंट किया और उसे टेबल में रख दिया.
mt: The waiter printed the bill and placed it on the table.
ref: The waiter printed out the bill and slipped it on the table.

src: उसने उदास मन से अपनी चीज़ें पैक कीं और अपनी माँ के घर चली गई.
mt: She packed her things with a sad heart and went to her mother's house.
ref: She sadly packed her things and drove to her mom's house.

src: वे अपने परिवार वालों को भी साथ लाईं.
mt: They brought their family members along.
ref: They brought their families too.

src: उसके दोस्तों ने बताया कि किसी फ़िल्म स्टार से मिलना बहुत मुश्किल होता है.
mt: His friends said it was hard to meet a film star.
ref: His friends told him it was very tough to meet a movie star.

src: मुझे गहरे पानी में तैरना नहीं आता था.
mt: I didn't know how to swim in deep water.
ref: I did not know how to swim in deep water.

src: उन्हें डर था कि बाहर निकल गई है और खो गई है.
mt: They were afraid that it had gone out and was lost.
ref: They were afraid she had gotten outside and gotten lost.

src: वह कई यूरोपीय देश में गई और अनेक लोगों से मिली.
mt: She visited many European countries and met many people.
ref: She visited many European countries and met a lot of people.

src: यह उसने अपने नए साल के उस संकल्प के तहत किया था जिसमें वह पहले से स्वस्थ रहना चाहती थी.
mt: She did this under her New Year's resolution to be healthier than before.
ref: It was part of her new year's resolution to be healthier.

src: टेड के दोस्त ने उससे उनके साथ पानी में आना बहुत कहा.
mt: Ted's friend asked him to come in the water with him.
ref: Ted's friends kept asking him to get in the water with them.

src: उसने हाँ कह दी.
mt: She said yes.
ref: She said yes.

src: मैंने सुना था कि चिड़ियाघर में स्लॉथ हैं, और मैं हमेशा से उन्हें देखना चाहता था.
mt: I had heard that zoos had sloths, and I had always wanted to see them.
ref: I heard the zoo had sloths, and I had always wanted to see them.

src: वह अपनी लैब में उस बीमारी की दवा पर काम करता है.
mt: He works on a drug for that disease in his lab.
ref: He works on a cure for the disease in his lab.

src: लड़कों ने ब्लॉक और ट्रक और टेडी बियर के साथ खेला.
mt: The boys played with blocks and trucks and teddy bears.
ref: The boys played with blocks and trucks and teddy bears.

src: नए साल पर उसने संकल्प लिया कि वह कसरत करना शुरू करेगी.
mt: 2017, she resolved to start exercising.
ref: For New Year's she made a resolution to start exercising.

src: इंडिया ने तय किया कि वह अपनी आइस्ड कॉफ़ी घर पर ही बनाएगी.
mt: India has decided to make its own ice coffee at home.
ref: India decided to make her own Iced Coffee at home.

src: बेस्टी बहुत उदास और निराश हो थी क्योंकि उसे सच में कोई पालतु जानवर चाहिए था.
mt: Bestie was very sad and disappointed because she really wanted a pet.
ref: Betsy was so sad and disappointed because she really wanted a pet.

src: उसने जीव विज्ञान की विशेषज्ञ बनने के लिए बहुत पढ़ाई की.
mt: She studied hard to become an expert in biology.
ref: She studies very hard to become an expert in Biology.

src: उसने तय किया वह खुद से एक टेबल बनाने की कोशिश करेगी.
mt: She decided to try to make a table for herself.
ref: She decided she wanted to try building a table by herself.

src: फिर सांकलों वाली कोई कब्र आई.
mt: 2nd time a coffin with ropes came.
ref: The came upon a grave with chains.

src: वे अपनी-अपनी कारें यूता के नमक के मैदानों पर ले गए.
mt: They took their cars to the salt flats of Yuta.
ref: They took their cars to the salt flats in Utah.

src: उसे जंगलों के बीच से गुज़रना अच्छा लगता था.
mt: He liked to go through the forests.
ref: She loved walking through the woods.

src: उसे एहसास नहीं हुआ कि वह बचपन से गोल्फ़ खेल रही है.
mt: She was unaware that she had been playing golf since childhood.
ref: He didn't realize she had been playing golf since she was a child.

src: हमारे घर पर हमारे लिए खाना बनाते समय उसने थोड़ा दिखावा करना चाहा.
mt: He wanted to show off a little when he was cooking for us at our house.
ref: While cooking for us at our house he decided to show off a bit.

src: वह बहुत खुश थी, पर फिर उसे समझ आया कि इसके बाद से वह सबसे छोटी बच्ची नहीं रहेगी.
mt: She was very happy, but then she realized that after that she would not be the youngest child anymore.
ref: She was excited until she found out she would no longer be the baby.

src: मैं अकेले कैंप से दूर पैदल सफ़र पर चला गया.
mt: I walked away from camp alone.
ref: I went to go hike away from the campsite by myself.

src: लेकिन, वह अपने दौड़ने के जूते लाना भूल गई थी.
mt: But she forgot to bring her running shoes.
ref: However she forgot to bring her running shoes.

src: जिम ने धातु को करीब से देखा और उसे वह किसी गहने की तरह लगा.
mt: Jim looked at the metal closely and it looked like a piece of jewelry to him.
ref: Jim looked closely at the metal and saw that it looked like jewelry.

src: वे साथ-साथ अपनी-अपनी पाई के सामने बैठ गए.
mt: They sat together in front of their own pie.
ref: They sat down together in front of their pies.

src: अचानक से उसे चक्कर आने लगे और गिर गया.
mt: Suddenly, he felt dizzy and fell down.
ref: He suddenly felt very dizzy and fell down.

src: इसलिए, उसने अपने छोटे बच्चों को इकट्ठा किया और स्टोर चली गई.
mt: So, she gathered her small children and went to the store.
ref: So she gathered her young children up and went to the store.

src: डिबेट करने के लिए उसके पास अच्छे विचार हैं, पर उसे सबके सामने बोलने से डर लगता है.
mt: He has good ideas to debate, but he is afraid to speak in front of everyone.
ref: He has great ideas to debate with but he is scared of public speaking.

src: यह बहुत गर्म था।
mt: It was very hot.
ref: It was very hot.

src: वह हर रोज क्लास के बाद पेंट करती थी।
mt: She painted every day after class.
ref: She would paint everyday after class.

src: उसने खाली समय में बॉक्सर बनने की ट्रेनिंग शुरू की।
mt: He started training to become a boxer in his spare time.
ref: He started training to become a boxer in his spare time.

src: इसलिए हमने ग्रेट वुल्फ लॉज की एक मजेदार यात्रा करने का फैसला किया।
mt: So we decided to take a fun trip to Great Wolf Lodge.
ref: So we decided to take a fun trip to Great Wolf Lodge.

src: उसके बगल में एक लंबा सज्जन था।
mt: A tall gentleman was standing next to him.
ref: Next to him was a tall gentleman.

src: डॉक्टर ने उसे बताया कि उसे 10 और कम करने की जरूरत है।
mt: The doctor told him he needed to lose 10 more pounds.
ref: The doctor told her she needed to lose 10 more.

src: जब वह गाड़ी चला रही थी तब भी जेनी ने टेक्स्ट किया।
mt: When she was driving, Jeni also texted.
ref: Jenny texted even while she was driving.

src: वह डीलरशिप पर गई और बेहतरीन का चयन किया।
mt: She went to the dealership and chose the best.
ref: She went to the dealership and selected the perfect one.

src: वह गैरेज में इधर-उधर फिरता रहा।
mt: 1. He was wandering around the garage.
ref: He puttered into the garage.

src: गांठ हिलने लगी, फिर हल्की चीख निकली।
mt: The knot began to loosen, then a faint cry came out.
ref: The lump started to move, then emitted little cries.

src: इस तरह निरावरण होने पर डॉन नाराज और शर्मिंदा था।
mt: When this happened, Don was embarrassed and ashamed.
ref: Don was angry and embarrassed at being exposed in this way.

src: मैं घबरा गया।
mt: I was scared.
ref: I panicked.

src: उसने मेरी सदस्यता की तस्वीर पर सीँघे बना दीं और बेतहाशा छेड़खानी की।
mt: He put a stain on my membership picture and harassed me wildly.
ref: He drew horns on my membership picture and flirted wildly.

src: और उसने गर्म सूप का आर्डर दिया।
mt: And he ordered hot soup.
ref: And she ordered hot soup.

src: वह आमतौर पर बैकस्ट्रोक से बचती है क्योंकि उसे अपने कानों में पानी नहीं चाहिए था।
mt: She usually avoids backstroking because she doesn't want water in her ears.
ref: She usually avoids backstroke because doesn't want water in her ears.

src: यह मेरे घर से दूर नहीं था, केवल कुछ मील की दूरी पर था!
mt: It was not far from my house, just a few miles away!
ref: It wasn't far from my house, only a few miles!

src: जब उसकी सहेली की माँ ने उसे परोसा, तो वह जानती थी कि उसे इसे खाना पड़ेगा।
mt: When her friend's mother served it to her, she knew she would have to eat it.
ref: When her friend's mother served it, she knew she had to eat it.

src: यह बहुत ही सुंदर था।
mt: It was very beautiful.
ref: It was very elegant.

src: उसने ग्रिड से बाहर जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to leave the grid.
ref: He decided to go off the grid.

src: उसकी कार की बैटरी कार को स्टार्ट करने के लिए संघर्ष कर रही थी।
mt: Her car's battery was struggling to start the car.
ref: His car battery was struggling to start the car.

src: उसे डर था कि यह महंगा होगा।
mt: He was afraid it would be expensive.
ref: She feared it'd be expensive.

src: उसे पता चला कि उसकी कंपनी चाहती है कि वह सेवानिवृत्त हो जाए।
mt: He learned that his company wanted him to retire.
ref: She found out her company wanted her to retire.

src: उसने लगातार दस गेम गंवाए थे!
mt: 10 games in a row!
ref: She had lost ten games in a row!

src: वह बहुत ही घबराई हुई थी।
mt: She was very frightened.
ref: She was incredibly nervous.

src: उन्होंने इसके सुंदर डिजाइन की प्रशंसा की।
mt: They praised its beautiful design.
ref: He admired the beautiful design of it.

src: मार्क की माँ ने उनके लिए एक स्पंज बॉल लाई।
mt: Mark's mother brought him a sponge ball.
ref: Mark's mother brought out a sponge ball to them.

src: पहले दिन, वह सैम से फुटबॉल खेलते हुए मिला।
mt: 1st day, he met Sam playing football.
ref: The first day, he met Sam playing soccer.

src: विंस आइसक्रीम वाली अपनी सामान्य मिठाई नहीं चाहता था।
mt: Vincent didn't want his usual ice cream dessert.
ref: Vince did not want his usual dessert of ice cream.

src: वह टीम के अभ्यास को देखते हुए स्कूल के जिम में समय बिताता था।
mt: He spent time watching the team's practice in the school's gym.
ref: He hung out in the school gym watching the team practice.

src: लज्जित होकर, वह सड़कों पर भीख मांगनेबैठ गया।
mt: He sat down on the streets, ashamed, to beg for alms.
ref: Ashamed, he sat on the road to panhandle.

src: उसे लगता था कि वो इस ग्रह के लिए अच्छी हैं
mt: She thought she was good for this planet
ref: He thought they were good for the planet.

src: सामान्यतया हम ये नहीं करते हैं |
mt: We don't usually do this
ref: It's not something we normally do.

src: वहाँ उसे आकर्षक बरिस्ता के बारे में पता चला |
mt: He learned about the attractive Berista.
ref: He got to know the attractive barista.

src: वह इधर उधर यह सोचकर घुमती रही कि उसे क्या खाना चाहिए |
mt: She was walking around thinking what she should eat.
ref: She wandered around thinking about what she wanted to eat.

src: जेनी ने जवाब दिया और बाहर कार के पास चली गयी |
mt: Jenny answered and went outside to the car.
ref: Jenny answered and walked outside to the car.

src: ख़ुशी मनाने के लिए मैं मडिंग करने चला गया |
mt: I went to mudding to celebrate.
ref: To celebrate, i went mudding.

src: पीटर जैसे ही उस स्थल पर पहुँचा वह हजारों लोगों से खचाखच भरा हुआ था |
mt: Peter arrived at the site, which was packed with thousands of people.
ref: As Peter entered the arena it was full of thousands of people.

src: वह शोध छात्र जोश की कहानियों से प्रभावित हो गया |
mt: He was inspired by Josh's stories of research students
ref: The researcher was impressed by Josh's stories.

src: फिर भी वह वीडियो को अपलोड करने में झिझक महसूस करता था
mt: But he still felt hesitation in uploading the video
ref: However, he was too embarrassed to upload any videos.

src: एक अजनबी मेरे पास आया और उसने कुछ छुट्टे मांगे
mt: 1. A stranger came to me and asked for some sweets
ref: A stranger approached me to ask for change.

src: वे अंदर जाना चाहते थे
mt: They wanted to go inside
ref: They wanted to go inside.

src: उसने पूरे झील में तैराकी की और दूसरे साइड पड़े राफ्ट तक भी तैरती रही
mt: She swam the entire lake and rafted to the other side.
ref: She swam across the whole lake and to the raft on the other side.

src: वह उसी ब्रांड की साइकिल थी जिसे उसने बचपन में खुद के लिए खरीदा था
mt: It was the same brand of bike that he had bought for himself as a child
ref: It was the same brand of bike he'd owned himself as a boy.

src: स्कूल के बाद वह जैक के लिए मुख्य द्वार के बाहर इंतजार कर रही थी
mt: After school she was waiting outside the main gate for Jack
ref: After school she waited for jack outside of the front door.

src: उन्होंने उसे एक भुतहा घर में जाने का चैलेंज दिया
mt: He challenged him to go into a haunted house
ref: They dared him to go into the haunted house.

src: वह अपनी लड़की का कान छिदवाना चाहती थी
mt: She wanted to pierce her daughter's ear
ref: She wanted her girl to have pierced ears.

src: उसने जाकर उनके लिए एक दर्जन लाल गुलाब के फूल खरीदे
mt: He went and bought a dozen red roses for them
ref: She went and bought her a dozen red roses.

src: मेरे पास उन्हें खरीदने के पैसे थे लेकिन मैंने बस यूं ही नहीं खरीदा
mt: I had the money to buy them but I just didn't buy them
ref: I had the money to buy them, I just didn't.

src: अब 17 साल का होने के बावजूद उसने अभी तक होम रन नहीं बनाया है
mt: 17 years old and still hasn't hit a home run
ref: Now seventeen Year's old he still had not hit a homerun.

src: उसने अपने दोस्तों के साथ एक बहुत बड़ी पार्टी आयोजित की
mt: He hosted a big party with his friends
ref: She had a massive party with her friends.

src: डारलिन अपने नए घर के लिए थ्रिफ्ट स्टोर में सेल्फ ढूंढ रही था
mt: Darlin was looking for a thrift store for her new home
ref: Darlene was looking for shelves in thrift stores for her new home.

src: उसने पिछले साल ऑस्ट्रेलिया में एक सेफ़ के रूप में कार्य करने के लिए गैप लिया था
mt: He took a gap year in Australia last year to work as a ski instructor.
ref: He took a gap year last year to work as a chef in Australia.

src: मैं अपने परिवार के लिए एक परफेक्ट कुत्ते की तलाश कर रहा हूं
mt: I am looking for a perfect dog for my family
ref: I have been in search of the perfect dog for my family.

src: उसने अपनी मां को कॉल किया और उससे ब्रेड बनाने की रेसिपी पूछी
mt: She called her mother and asked for a bread recipe
ref: He called his mom and got her bread recipe.

src: उनमें से एक उसे लेकर बहुत ही ज्यादा आसक्त था
mt: 1 of them was very much attached to him
ref: One of them was too obsessed.

src: किसी विशेष तौर पर जमे हुए वेफ़ल्स पसंद थे
mt: He preferred a particular brand of frozen waffles
ref: He particularly loved frozen waffles.

src: जैसे ही वह चढ़ा उसका पैर फिसला और वह ज़मीन पर गिरा
mt: As soon as he climbed up, his foot slipped and he fell to the ground
ref: As he climbed, his foot slipped and he fell to the ground.

src: परंतु उसके रूम में एक मक्खी इधर उधर घूम रही थी
mt: But a fly was buzzing around his room
ref: But there was a fly flying around his room.

src: हम ड्रिंक को लेकर बैठे और हमने आपस में खेलना शुरू किया
mt: We sat down to drink and we started playing with each other
ref: We got together with drinks and started to play.

src: उसके पड़ोसी उसके ऊपर उसे चुप कराने के लिए चिल्लाए
mt: His neighbors yelled at him to shut up over him
ref: Her neighbors yelled for her to shut up.

src: उन्होंने स्क्रिप्ट लिखी और कलाकारों को काम पर रखा
mt: They wrote the script and hired actors
ref: They wrote the script and hired the actors.

src: वह किसी नई नौकरी का साक्षात्कार देने जा रहा था
mt: He was going for a job interview
ref: He was on his way to a new job interview.

src: उसके मां बाप ने उसे मन कर दिया
mt: His parents convinced him
ref: Her parents told her no.

src: जब समय आया वह अपने बाड़े में गयी और ढेर सारे बक्से निकाल लाई
mt: When the time came, she went to her cage and brought out a lot of boxes
