ref: When it finally did she went to her shed and pulled out tons of boxes.

src: उसने स्वास्थ्यवर्धक खाना भी लगातार खाया था
mt: He also ate healthy food constantly
ref: She also kept a healthy diet.

src: रॉबर्ट ने अपनी पढ़ाई में अधिकतर प्रयास और समय लगाया
mt: Robert spent most of his time and effort on his studies.
ref: Robert put in extra time and effort in his studies.

src: अचानक उसे एक विचित्र झटका महसूस हुआ
mt: Suddenly he felt a strange jolt
ref: Suddenly he felt a strange bumping.

src: वह हर शनिवार को एक ऑर्चर्ड में जाती है
mt: She goes to an orchard every Saturday
ref: She dedicates a Saturday to drive to an orchard.

src: मौसम की भविष्यवाणी में बर्फबारी दिखा रहा था
mt: Weather forecasts were showing snowfall
ref: The weather forecast was calling for snow.

src: उन्हें लगा कि वे सुरक्षित हैं, इसीलिए उन्होंने अपनी सतर्कता छोड़ दी
mt: They thought they were safe, so they dropped their guard
ref: They thought that they were safe, so they let their guard down.

src: उसने बेड के चारों ओर लयसोल छिड़क दिया
mt: He sprayed lysol around the bed
ref: She sprayed a can of lysol all around the bed frame.

src: उसे घास में एक छोटा चमड़े का पर्स मिला
mt: He found a small leather purse in the grass
ref: He noticed a small leather wallet in the grass.

src: वह स्कूबा डाइविंग सीख रहा था
mt: He was learning scuba diving
ref: He was learning to scuba dive.

src: मैंने एक बुरी खबर सुनी कि एक जगह कुछ लोगों को बंधक बनाया गया है
mt: I heard a bad news that some people have been taken hostage at a place
ref: I saw sad news that there were hostages in a venue.

src: वो इतने डोर थे कि वह उन तक पहुँच ही नहीं पाती थी
mt: He was so drunk that he couldn't reach them
ref: They were so far out, she could never reach them.

src: उसने पोर्क चॉप की बारबेक्यू वाली रेसिपी चुनी
mt: He chose a pork chop barbecue recipe
ref: He chose the recipe calling for barbecuing the pork chops.

src: कोर्ट में दौड़ने की वज़ह से उसके कपड़े गीले हो गए थे
mt: His clothes were wet from running to court
ref: His clothes were soaked from running up and down the court.

src: वह और बुरे की आशा कर रही थी
mt: I was hoping for worse
ref: She was expecting worse.

src: कोल नौजवान था और उसने इसे बहुत गंभीरता से लिया
mt: He was a young man and he took it very seriously
ref: Cole was young and took it very seriously.

src: दुर्भाग्यवश, माइक को कोई आईडिया नहीं था कि वह कहां जाए
mt: Unfortunately, Mike had no idea where to go
ref: Unfortunately, Mike had no idea where he should go.

src: उसे दिशा का पता नहीं चला
mt: He did not know which way to go
ref: She didn't read the directions.

src: लिफ़्ट की लाइन में, हम एक और जोड़े से बात करने लगे
mt: In the lift, we started talking to another couple
ref: In the lift line, we started talking to another couple.

src: वह उनसे छुटकारा पाना चाहती थी पर वह यह भी जानती थी कि उसे उनकी बहुत याद आएगी
mt: She wanted to get away from them but she also knew she would miss them a lot
ref: She considered getting rid of them, but knew she'd miss them too much.

src: मेरे भाई ने वह टुकड़ा खाया जिस पर गोंद लगा हुआ था
mt: My brother ate the part of the cake that had the glue on it
ref: My brother bit into a slice that had a piece of gum on it.

src: उस औरत ने उसे एक मफिन का टुकड़ा दिया
mt: She gave him a piece of muffin
ref: The young lady gave him a small muffin.

src: उसे उस चीज़ का बस रंग ही नहीं पसंद था
mt: He didn't like the color of that thing at all
ref: The only thing he didn't like about it was the color.

src: वह देर तक काम करने की बात करती है
mt: She talks about working late
ref: She often talks about long hours at work.

src: पता नहीं कहाँ से, कोई आदमी आया और उसनव उसे छुरा घोंप दिया
mt: Some guy came and stabbed me
ref: Out of nowhere, a man approached and stabbed him.

src: उसने बनाया और ख़ुद ही सब बाहर लगा दिया
mt: He made it and put it all outside himself
ref: He built it and set it all up outside himself.

src: उसने सर उठाया तो उसे आकाश में अनगिनत हिमकण दिखे
mt: He raised his head, he saw countless ice crystals in the sky
ref: He looked up at the sky to see countless snowflakes.

src: उसे सभी सामग्री सीखने में मुश्किल हो रही थी।
mt: He was having difficulty learning all the material.
ref: He was having a tough time learning all of the material.

src: उसके पास एक रहस्यमय पते वाला एक पैकेज था।
mt: He had a mysterious package with an address.
ref: He had one package with a mysterious address.

src: वह अपनी कार्यस्थल के पास नेल सैलून गई थी।
mt: She went to a nail salon near her workplace.
ref: She went to the nail salon near her job.

src: जॉन के परिवार के पास एक नाव है, इसलिए उन्होंने सवारी की।
mt: John's family has a boat, so they took a ride.
ref: John's family owns a boat, so they took a ride.

src: उसने एक फुट लंबे चिकन सैंडविच के लिए कहा।
mt: He asked for a foot-long chicken sandwich.
ref: She asked for a footlong chicken sub.

src: मैंने कुछ असाइनमेंट्स हासिल किय।
mt: I have got some assignments.
ref: I caught up on some assignments.

src: एमी ने मौसम का आनंद लेने के लिए बाहर जाने का इरादा किया।
mt: Amy had planned to go outside to enjoy the weather.
ref: Amy decided to go outside to enjoy the weather.

src: जाने से पहले मैंने सनस्क्रीन लगाया।
mt: I put on sunscreen before going out.
ref: I applied sunscreen before we left.

src: जेन ने उसे सिखाने के लिए एक पेशेवर बाजीगर से सलाह ली।
mt: Jen hired a professional gambler to teach him how to play.
ref: Jane consulted with a professional juggler to teach her.

src: वह इसे रोज रात के खाने में बनाते थें।
mt: He made it every night for dinner.
ref: He would make it every night for dinner.

src: बेट्टी ने कहा कि उसे दूध चाहिए।
mt: Betty said she wanted milk.
ref: Betty said she wanted milk.

src: उन सभी के पास आग के ऊपर लटके हुए s'mores थे, जो गर्म हो रहे थे।
mt: All of them had s'mores hanging over the fire, which were getting hot.
ref: They all had s'mores dangling over the fire, warming up.

src: इस बात को लेकर वह काफी शर्मिदा महसूस करते हैं।
mt: He feels very embarrassed about this.
ref: He feels very embarrassed about this.

src: केवल बॉब एक ​​मैच था।
mt: Only Bob was a match.
ref: Only Bob was a match.

src: वह अपने सामान, सभी स्मृति चिन्हों को लेने के लिए बैगेज करौसेल में गई!
mt: She went to the baggage carousel to pick up her belongings, all souvenirs!
ref: She went to the baggage carousel to claim her luggage, all souvenirs!

src: यह कठिन था क्योंकि वह दस साल से धूम्रपान कर रही थी।
mt: It was hard because she had been smoking for ten years.
ref: It was hard because she had been smoking for ten Year's.

src: वह एक रोड ट्रिप पर थी और उसके पास केवल मीठा स्नैक्स था।
mt: She was on a road trip and had only sweet snacks.
ref: She was on a road trip and only had sweet snacks.

src: इसलिए रे ने अपनी मांसपेशियों बनाने के लिए अभ्यास किया।
mt: So Ray exercised his muscles.
ref: So Ray worked out to build up his muscles.

src: क्रिस्टिन के पसंदीदा बैंड में से एक को उत्सव में परफॉर्म करना चाहिए।
mt: 1 of Chris's favorite bands should perform at the festival.
ref: One of Kristin's favorite bands should be performing at the festival.

src: ग्राहकों ने महसूस किया कि उसकी आवाज बहुत अच्छी है।
mt: Customers felt that her voice was very good.
ref: Customers noticed he had a really nice voice.

src: उसने उसे देखने के लिए इडाहो की लंबी यात्रा करने का इरादा किया।
mt: He intended to make the long trip to Idaho to see him.
ref: He decided to take the long trip to Idaho to see her.

src: लेकिन स्कूल में बच्चों के लिए कॉफी मशीन नहीं थी।
mt: But there was no coffee machine for the children at school.
ref: But there was no coffee machine in the school for kids.

src: वह हत्या के आरोप में जेल गया था।
mt: He was jailed for murder.
ref: He went to prison for murder.

src: वह खुद खाना बनाने और साफ-सफाई का काम करते-करते थक गई।
mt: She got tired of doing her own cooking and cleaning.
ref: She grew tired of doing all the cooking and cleaning by herself.

src: उसकी जेब में हमेशा पुदीना होता था।
mt: He always had mint in his pocket.
ref: He always had peppermints in his pocket.

src: वह एक किताब लेता और पेड़ के नीचे बैठ जाता।
mt: He takes a book and sits under a tree.
ref: He would take a book and sit under the tree.

src: मैंने पेलिकन M800 नामक एक अच्छे पेन के ऑनलाइन वीडियो देखे हैं।
mt: I have seen online videos of a good pen called the Pelican M800.
ref: I'd seen online videos of a nice pen called a Pelikan M800.

src: वह एक करीबी पुरुष मित्र के साथ गई थी।
mt: She went with a close male friend.
ref: She went with a close guy friend.

src: वह 5 साल की उम्र से अभ्यास कर रहा है।
mt: 5 years old.
ref: He's been practicing since he was 5 years old.

src: उन्होंने दर्जनों विंग्स के नमूने के लिए एक टिकट खरीदा।
mt: They bought a ticket for a dozen wings samples.
ref: He bought a ticket to sample dozens of wings.

src: यह दिन के दौरान इतना बुरा नहीं होता है.
mt: It's not that bad during the day.
ref: It's not so bad during the day.

src: वह सोने की खोज में पहाड़ियों में निकला.
mt: She went into the mountains in search of gold.
ref: He went out in the hills to look for gold.

src: उसकी पत्नी रॉबर्ट का ध्यान किसी चीज़ के साथ भटकाना चाहती है.
mt: His wife Robert wants to distract him with something.
ref: His wife wants to distract Robert with something.

src: वह तुरंत जल्दी उठ गई और उसकी ओर भागी.
mt: She immediately got up and ran towards him.
ref: She immediately woke up early and ran over to it.

src: टेरेसा एक नई छोटी बहन को पाने को लेकर उत्साहित थी.
mt: Teresa was excited to be getting a new little sister.
ref: Teresa was excited to have a new baby sister.

src: और जैसे ही वह क्लास में बैठा, उसे अपने साथियों से डर महसूस हुआ.
mt: And as soon as he sat in class, he felt scared by his peers.
ref: And as he sat in class, he felt intimidated by his peers.

src: वह कभी बर्तन नहीं धोता लेकिन हमेशा उनका इस्तेमाल करता है.
mt: He never washes the dishes but always uses them.
ref: He never washes the dishes but always uses them.

src: उसे काम पर PC ऑपरेटिंग सिस्टम से परिचित होने में परेशानी होती है.
mt: He has trouble with operating system at work.
ref: He has trouble becoming familiar with the PC operating system at work.

src: वह सो गई और सुबह 10 बजे तक नहीं उठी.
mt: She slept and didn't wake up until 10 am.
ref: She slept in, and did not get up until 10 AM.

src: मैंने अपने घर भर में देख डाला लेकिन कुछ नहीं मिला.
mt: I searched my entire house but found nothing.
ref: I looked through my house but didn't find anything.

src: उसे उसको जल्दी सुलाने की ज़रूरत थी.
mt: She needed to put him to bed quickly.
ref: She needed to put her to sleep early.

src: वह वहां पहुंचती है और तुरंत एक जोड़े जूते पर 250 डॉलर ख़र्च करती है.
mt: She arrives and immediately spends $250 on a pair of shoes.
ref: She gets there and promptly spends 250$ on a pair of shoes.

src: स्कूल उसके लिए ज़रूरी था, लेकिन उसकी सहेली एक एमर्जेंसी की हालत में थी.
mt: The school was important, but her friend was in an emergency.
ref: School was important to her, but her friend was in an emergency.

src: उसका कॉस्टयूम बहुत विस्तार वाला था.
mt: His costume was very elaborate.
ref: His costumes were very elaborate.

src: टॉम ने कहा था कि वह उसे रात 8:00 बजे पिक अप कर लेगा और यह 9 बजे के बाद हुआ.
mt: Tom said he would pick her up at 8:00 p.m. and it happened after 9:00 p.m.
ref: Tom had said that he would pick him up at 8:00 PM and it was after 9.

src: हालांकि, उसे ऐसी जगह खोजने की ज़रूरत थी जहां वह नियमित रूप से बोलिंग कर सके.
mt: However, she needed a place where she could bowl regularly.
ref: However, he needed to find a place where he could bowl regularly.

src: वे सबसे नज़दीक पार्क में टहलते हुए गए.
mt: They went for a walk in the nearest park.
ref: They walked to the nearest park.

src: ब्रैड को पता चला कि पास में एक कॉन्सर्ट हो रहा था.
mt: Brad found out there was a concert nearby.
ref: Brad found out there was a concert happening nearby.

src: जब वह छोटी थी तब से, वह कैमरे पर प्रैक्टिस करती थी.
mt: She practiced in front of the camera since she was little.
ref: Even since she was little, she practiced on camera.

src: उसने अपने बच्चों को पिक अप किया, और उन्हें सीधे एक आइसक्रीम पार्लर में ले गई.
mt: She picked up her children and took them straight to an ice cream parlor.
ref: She picked up her kids, and took them straight to an ice cream parlor.

src: लड़कों ने अपने कोट, हैट, दस्ताने और बूट पहने और बाहर चले गए.
mt: The boys dressed in their coats, hats, gloves and boots and went outside.
ref: The boys put on their coats, hats, gloves and boots and went outside.

src: कोई मुझे कॉल कर रहा था और मैंने अपना फ़ोन निकालने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: Someone was calling me and I decided to take my phone out.
ref: Someone was calling me and I decided to pull out my phone.

src: जब आसमान से बर्फ़ गिरने लगती है तो वह उसे देखता है.
mt: When snow falls, the snow sees it.
ref: When snow begins to fall from the sky he watches it.

src: हाल ही में, गैरी गणित की परीक्षा, और अंग्रेज़ी की परीक्षा में फ़ेल हो गया.
mt: Recently, he failed his math exam, and his English exam.
ref: Recently, Garry failed a Math test, and a English test.

src: उसकी प्रेमिका ने उसके लिए रात का खाना बनाना शुरू किया, लेकिन उसने कहा कि इससे बदबू आ रही है.
mt: His girlfriend started cooking dinner for him, but he said it smelled bad.
ref: His girlfriend started making him dinner, but he said it smelled bad.

src: उसने सोचा कि वह फ़िट है क्योंकि वह बास्केटबॉल खेलता है.
mt: He thought he was fit because he played basketball.
ref: He thought he was in great shape because he played basketball.

src: लेकिन इधर-उधर देखने पर भी उसे उसके जूते नहीं मिले!
mt: But he couldn't find his shoes anywhere!
ref: But she couldn't find his shoes even after looking everywhere!

src: उसने अपने दोस्तों के साथ तैरने जाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: He decided to go swimming with his friends.
ref: He decided to go swimming with his friends.

src: उसके दोस्त ने उसे पढ़ाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: His friend decided to teach him.
ref: His  friend  decided  to  teach him.

src: उसे अपनी नौकरी बहुत पसंद थी और उसमें बहुत अच्छी थी.
mt: He liked his job very much and was very good at it.
ref: She loved her job and was very good at it.

src: वह पकड़े जाने से डरती थी।
mt: She was afraid of being caught.
ref: She was afraid of being caught.

src: वह पहेली को सुलझाने के लिए कोशिश करता रहा।
mt: He tried to solve the puzzle.
ref: He struggled to solve the puzzle.

src: टिम ने बहामास में एक रोमांटिक यात्रा की योजना बनाई।
mt: Tim planned a romantic vacation in the Bahamas.
ref: Tim planned a romantic getaway in the Bahamas.

src: उसने सॉस बनाई।
mt: She made the sauce.
ref: She made the sauce.

src: मुझे काम के लिए एक नई जोड़ी चाहिए थी इसलिए जाने के लिए जगह तलाशनी पड़ी।
mt: I needed a new pair of shoes for work, so I had to go looking for them.
ref: I needed a new pair from work so had to look for a place to go.

src: वह न्यूनतम वेतन वाली नौकरी कर रही थी।
mt: She was working a minimum wage job.
ref: She was working a minimum wage job.

src: वह बहुत लंबे समय तक अस्पताल में रहे।
mt: He was in hospital for a very long time.
ref: He was in the hospital for a very long time.

src: मुझे एक नए स्कूल में जाना था।
mt: I had to go to a new school.
ref: I had to go to a new school.

src: उन्होंने हमेशा ऊंचे पुल से गुजरने से बचने के लिए अपनी यात्रा की योजना बनाई।
mt: They always planned their journey to avoid crossing high bridges.
ref: He always planned his travels to avoid any tall bridges.

src: वह किसी भी ऐसी स्थिति से बाहर निकल सकता है जिसमें वह नहीं रहना चाहता।
mt: He can get out of any situation he doesn't want to be in.
ref: He can get out of  just about any situation he doesn't want to be in.

src: उसने अपनी बिल्ली को डेक से उठाया।
mt: He lifted his cat off the deck.
ref: She picked up her cat from the deck.

src: जैसे ही मैंने उसे टेबल पर रखा, मेरे परिवार ने उस पर हमला कर दिया।
mt: As soon as I put it on the table, my family attacked it.
ref: As soon as I placed it on the table, my family attacked it.

src: वह कभी नहीं गिरा और खुद को चोट नहीं पहुंचाई।
mt: He never fell and did not hurt himself.
ref: He has never fallen off and hurt himself.

src: मैट और टैमी ने रात के बाद नंबरों का आदान-प्रदान किया।
mt: Matt and Tami exchanged numbers after the night.
ref: Matt and Tammy exchanged numbers after the night.

src: उसने चारों ओर हाथ घुमाया।
mt: He waved his hands around.
ref: He swung his hand around.

src: चाहे उसे कहीं भी जाना पड़े, वह हमेशा जमीनी यात्रा करती थी।
mt: Whether she had to go anywhere, she always traveled by land.
ref: No matter where she had to go she would always travel by land.

src: वह स्वाभाविक रूप से आलसी था।
mt: He was naturally lazy.
ref: He was notoriously lazy.

src: उसने सोचा कि कोई उसे डेट नहीं करना चाहेगा।
mt: He thought no one would want to date him.
ref: She thought no one would want to date her.

src: जहां वह अपनी बहन के लिए खुश थी, वहीं वह आंटी बनने से डरती थी।
mt: Where she was happy for her sister, she was afraid of becoming an aunt.
ref: While she was happy for her sister, she was scared to be an aunt.

src: उसके घर में बहता पानी नहीं था।
mt: There was no water in his home.
ref: He didn't have running water in his house.

src: उसने स्टोर से टीवी अपने घर पहुंचवाया था।
mt: He had the TV delivered to his home from the store.
ref: She had the store deliver the television to her house.

src: उसने उन्हें अपने बगीचे में उगाया।
mt: He grew them in his garden.
ref: She grew them in her garden.

src: वह उससे मिलने अस्पताल गया था।
mt: He went to the hospital to see her.
ref: He went to visit her at the hospital.

src: लेकिन उसने खुद को स्कूल जाने के लिए मजबूर किया।
mt: But he forced himself to go to school.
ref: But she forced herself to go to school.

src: उसे हवाई अड्डे के लिए एक टैक्सी मिली।
mt: He got a taxi to the airport.
ref: She got a taxi to the airport.

src: सैंडी ने अपने रास्ते में आने वाले एक खतरनाक बर्फीले तूफान के बारे में सुना।
mt: Sandy heard about a dangerous ice storm coming her way.
ref: Sandy heard of a dangerous snow storm coming her way.

src: हालाँकि उसे सहकर्मियों से कोई परेशानी नहीं है, वह अकेला रहना पसंद करता है।
mt: He doesn't have any problems with his colleagues, but he prefers to be alone.
ref: Although he doesn't mind coworkers, he likes to be left alone.

src: मैं कम सोडियम आहार लेता हूं।
mt: I eat a low sodium diet.
ref: I am on a low sodium diet.

src: वह अपने पिता से पोशाक के लिए पूछने से डरता था।
mt: She was afraid to ask her father for a dress.
ref: He was scared to ask his father for the costume.

src: वह फिलाडेल्फिया में अपने कजिन से मिलने के लिए एक यात्रा बुक करता है।
mt: He books a trip to Philadelphia to visit his cousin.
ref: He books a trip to visit his cousin in Philadelphia.

src: वह एक डिपार्टमेंट स्टोर में था.
mt: He was in a department store.
ref: It was in a department store.

src: उसके जाने से पहले, हमने एक-दूसरे के फ़ोन नंबर लिए.
mt: Before he left, we exchanged phone numbers.
ref: Before she left, we exchanged phone numbers.

src: उसे जो चाहिए था उसे ढूँढने के लिए वह बीच के रास्तों पर काफ़ी देर तक चलती रही.
mt: She walked along the middle of the road for a long time looking for what she wanted.
ref: She walked up and down the aisles to find what she wanted.

src: वह बड़ी-बड़ी मशीनों के आस-पास होने पर घबरा रहा था.
mt: He was scared to be around big machines.
ref: He was nervous being around heavy machinery.

src: उसने स्थानीय गैंग के लिए अकांउट तैयार करने का काम शुरू कर दिया.
mt: He started to set up accounts for the local gang.
ref: He started doing the accounting for a local gang.

src: ऐलिस बहुत खुश थी क्योंकि उसकी माँ उसके लिए नए कपड़े लाई थी.
mt: Alice was very happy because her mother had brought her new clothes.
ref: Alice was so excited because her mom had bought her a new outfit.

src: नीला को पता था कि उसकी माँ के पास जीने के लिए बहुत दिन नहीं हैं.
mt: Blue knew her mother had not many days to live.
ref: Nila knew her mom did not have a long time to live.

src: उसने उनके साझा भविष्य की कल्पना की.
mt: He imagined their shared future.
ref: She dreamed of their future together.

src: वे जल्दी सोने चले गए, ताकि जल्दी उठ सकें.
mt: They went to bed early, so they could get up early.
ref: They went to sleep early so they could wake up early.

src: किम ने अपने बच्चे से सारी ड्रैगन और फ़ैंटसी की किताबें वापस लेने का तय किया.
mt: Kim has decided to take back all the books of dragons and fantasy from her son.
ref: Kim decided to take away all dragon and fantasy books from her kid.

src: हम सब बहुत घबराए हुए थे.
mt: We were all very scared.
ref: We were all very nervous.

src: और भौंकने की वजह से जेफ़ की नींद जल्दी खुल जाती थी.
mt: And the barking woke Jeff up early.
ref: And the barking always woke Jeff up early.

src: उसने समय लेकर, ध्यान से वह लगाया.
mt: He took his time, carefully applied the glue.
ref: He took his time and applied it very carefully.

src: वह कुछ दिन के लिए शहर से बाहर थी और वह इसके बिना सोया.
mt: She was away from the city for a few days and she missed it.
ref: She was out of town a few days and I went to sleep without it.

src: वह कई महीनों से जाने का प्लान बना रही थी.
mt: She had been planning to leave for several months.
ref: She planned the move for months.

src: उसे बहुत ही अच्छे जूतों का एक जोड़ा मिला.
mt: He got a very good pair of shoes.
ref: She found a pair of great shoes.

src: वह पाँच साल की होने वाली है.
mt: 5 years old on 23 March.
ref: She will be five Year's old.

src: हम साथ में फ़्रिस्बी और गेंद ले गए थे.
mt: We brought Frisbees and balls with us.
ref: We took along a frisbee and a ball.

src: फ़िल्म के लिए वह Redbox के किसी स्टोर पर गया.
mt: He went to a Redbox store for the movie.
ref: I headed down to a Redbox to get one.

src: उसके दोस्त उसकी तारीफ़ करते थे, हालाँकि वे कविताएँ अच्छी नहीं थीं.
mt: His friends praised him, although his poems were not good.
ref: Her friends were supportive even though it was bad.

src: उसमें एक सेवा थी. मैंने उसे रद्द करने का तय किया.
mt: I had a service. I decided to cancel it.
ref: Since there was service on it, I decided to cancel it.

src: उसकी माँ ने उसके लिए सरप्राइज़ पार्टी रखी थी.
mt: His mother had planned a surprise party for him.
ref: Her mom had planned her a surprise party.

src: सब उसे इसके लिए जानते थे और सभी उसे उसमें देखना चाहते थे.
mt: Everyone knew him for it and everyone wanted to see him in it.
ref: She was known for it and everyone expected to see her in one.

src: लेकिन, वह डरता था कि शायद वह इस सपने को कभी पूरा न कर पाए.
mt: But he was afraid that perhaps he would never be able to complete this dream.
ref: However, he had feared that it was a goal he would never reach.

src: उसने उस इमारत का कोने-कोने एक्स्पलोर किया.
mt: He explored every corner of that building.
ref: She explored every nook and cranny of the structure.

src: फिर उन्होंने जुड़वा लड़कियों की एक प्रोफ़ाइल देखी.
mt: Then they saw a profile of twin girls.
ref: Then they saw a profile for two twin ladies.

src: वह अपने पहले दिन अच्छा दिखना चाहता है.
mt: He wants to look good on his first day.
ref: He wants to look good on his first day.

src: वह पहले कभी हवाईजहाज पर नहीं बैठा था.
mt: He had never been on an airplane before.
ref: He had never been on an airplane before.

src: पहले ही इतनी देर हो जाने की वजह से उसे सोना पड़ा.
mt: He had already been delayed so much that he had to sleep.
ref: It was already very late and she had to get to bed.

src: वह हर महीने कम से कम एक उपन्यास पढ़ता था.
mt: He read at least one novel every month.
ref: He used to read at least one every month.

src: अपनी बेकरी में, वह खूबसूरत केक बनाती थी।
mt: In her bakery, she made beautiful cakes.
ref: In her bakery, she made beautiful cakes.

src: उन्होंने अपने टिकट के पैसे दिए और अपना-अपना स्विमसूट पहना।
mt: They paid for their tickets and put on their own swimsuits.
ref: They paid for their tickets and got into their swimsuits.

src: उसने एक ऐसी मूर्ति बनाई जो कछुए की तरह दिखती थी।
mt: He made a statue that looked like a turtle.
ref: He made one that looked like a turtle.

src: जेफ़ उत्साहित है और वहां जाने के लिए उससे सब्र नहीं हो पा रहा।
mt: Jeff is excited and can't wait to go there.
ref: Jeff is excited and can't wait to go.

src: एक रात उसका एक मरीज़ उसके बिछड़े हुए पिता थे।
mt: 1 night his patient was his lost father.
ref: One night her estranged father was one of her patients.

src: जेन नाम की एक लड़की वहां आई, जिसे वह पहचानती नहीं थी।
mt: A girl named Jen came by, whom she didn't recognize.
ref: A girl she didn't know named Jane showed up.

src: वह सनस्क्रीन लगाना भूल गई थी।
mt: She forgot to put on sunscreen.
ref: She forgot to apply sunscreen.

src: वह एक सफ़ारी टूर ग्रुप में शामिल हो गया।
mt: He joined a safari tour group.
ref: He joined a safari tour group.

src: जैसा रेसिपी में था वह बिलकुल सावधानी से वैसा-वैसा कर रही थी।
mt: As the recipe said, she was doing it exactly as it was.
ref: She was extremely careful to follow the recipe exactly.

src: हालांकि उसके पास पैसे नहीं थे।
mt: However, he had no money.
ref: He had no money however.

src: सजावट बढ़िया थी, लेकिन कुछ कमी लग रही थी।
mt: Decor was good, but it seemed to be lacking something.
ref: The decorations were great, but something was missing.

src: उसके लिए यह तय करना मुश्किल हो गया था कि कौन सा पेड़ लेना है।
mt: It was difficult for him to decide which tree to take.
ref: He had a hard time deciding which tree to get.

src: मैंने और मेरे दोस्त ने एक ही टीम में खेला।
mt: I played on the same team as my friend.
ref: Me and my friend played on the same team.

src: वह अक्सर पैसों के लिए सार्वजनिक प्रदर्शन करता था।
mt: He often performed in public for money.
ref: He often performed out in public for money.

src: वह उन्हें पीनट बटर सैंडविच खिलाने लगी।
mt: She started feeding them peanut butter sandwiches.
ref: She began to feed them peanut butter sandwiches.

src: उसने अपनी माँ से पूछा कि क्या वे लोग समुद्र के तट पर जा सकते हैं।
mt: He asked his mother if they could go to the beach.
ref: He asked his mother if they could go to the beach.

src: मुझे अपने सेल फ़ोन के लिए उसकी जरूरत थी।
mt: I needed his cell phone for mine.
ref: I needed one for my cell phone.

src: मैं पुरानी वाली से थक गया था।
mt: I was tired of the old one.
ref: I was tired of the old ones.

src: उसकी माँ उसके लिए एक नया खिलौना नहीं खरीदकर देगी।
mt: 1. She will not buy her son a new toy.
ref: His mom would not purchase a new toy for him.

src: उसने गिटार बजाना सीखने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to learn to play the guitar.
ref: She decided to learn to play guitar.

src: उसने इतनी सारी पकड़ीं कि उसे कुछ दे देनी पड़ी।
mt: He caught so many fish that he had to give some away.
ref: He caught so many he had to give some away.

src: मैं और मेरी पत्नी दिमागी तौर से बोर हो चुके थे।
mt: My wife and I were bored mentally.
ref: My wife and I were bored out of our minds.

src: टिम हर रोज़, सारा-सारा दिन अभ्यास करता था।
mt: Tim practiced every day, all day.
ref: Tim practiced all day, everyday.

src: टिगर दिन-रात लगातार खुद को खुजलाता रहता था।
mt: Tiger day and night scratched himself constantly.
ref: Tigger was constantly scratching himself day and night.

src: हर दिन, वह अपने वर्तमान प्रोजेक्ट पर कड़ी मेहनत करती थी।
mt: Every day, she worked hard on her current project.
ref: Every day, she worked hard on her current project.

src: सैम ने अपने सभी दोस्तों और पड़ोसियों को बुलाया।
mt: Sam called all his friends and neighbors.
ref: Sam invited all of his friends and neighbors.

src: वह धीरे से पैरों की उंगलियों के बल सीढ़ियों से नीचे उतरकर किचन में गई।
mt: She slowly descended the stairs, step by step, to the kitchen.
ref: She tiptoed downstairs and into the kitchen.

src: उसने सरप्राइज़ के तौर पर उसका पसंदीदा खाना घर लाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He surprised his wife by deciding to bring her favorite food home.
ref: He decided to bring home her favorite meal as a surprise.

src: वे किसी एक ब्रांड के बारे में फैसला नहीं ले पा रहे थे।
mt: They were unable to decide on one brand.
ref: They couldn't decide on a particular brand.

src: उसे लगा कि वह बिना पढ़े कुछ न कुछ करके संभाल सकती है।
mt: She thought she could manage something without reading.
ref: She figured she could just wing it.

src: उसके पास बहुत ज्यादा पैसे नहीं थे मगर उसे लगा कि वहां जाना ही उसके पास एकमात्र विकल्प बचा है
mt: He had little money, but he felt that he had no other option but to go there.
ref: He did not have much money but he thought that going is the only way.

src: बेन ने नाश्ता न करने का निर्णय लिया और काम पर चला गया
mt: Ben decided not to have breakfast and went to work
ref: Ben decided to skip breakfast and went to work.

src: उसने अपने पूरे घर में ढूंढा
mt: He searched his entire house
ref: He looked all over his house.

src: मेरी प्रेमिका ने मुझे एक नई टाई खरीदने में मदद की
mt: My girlfriend helped me buy a new tie
ref: My girlfriend helped me pick out a new tie.

src: उसने एक स्थानीय लीग के लिए खेलने का निर्णय लिया
mt: He decided to play in a local league
ref: He decided to sign up to play for a local league.

src: पहले उसे यह अच्छा लगा बाद में वह डर गई
mt: 1st she liked it then she got scared
ref: She like it at first but then got scared.

src: उसको प्रकृति से यह तोहफ़ा प्राप्त था
mt: He was blessed with this gift from nature
ref: She always had a natural gift.

src: वह फुटपाथ पर बर्फ के एक टुकड़े पर फिसल गया ।
mt: He slipped on a piece of ice on the sidewalk.
ref: He slipped on a piece of ice on the sidewalk.

src: मोज़ों की जोड़ी मिलाना खुद में ही एक समय खपाने वाला काम है
mt: Matching pairs of socks is a time-consuming task
ref: Matching socks is a horrible waste of time.

src: उसने आज़तक खाना बनाने के बारे में नहीं सोचा
mt: She didn't think about making food for Azadkhan.
ref: He never really thought about making food until today.

src: इसलिए ली ने एक जोड़ा बुनना शुरू कर दिया
mt: So Lee started knitting a pair
ref: So Lee began to knit a pair.

src: वो अच्छा काम करती थीलेकिन उसे हमेशा ख़राब टिप्पणी ही मिलती थी
mt: She did good work but she always got bad comments
ref: She did good work but always received poor remarks on her reviews.

src: वह अपनी टीम की सबसे उम्दा खिलाड़ी थी
mt: She was the best player on her team
ref: She was the best on her team.

src: वे दोनों एक साथ नई और मज़ेदार चीजें करना पसंद करते थे
mt: They both liked to do new and exciting things together
ref: They both loved to do things together that were fun and creative.

src: जिससे बिजली चली गई
mt: causing a power outage
ref: It took out the power.

src: वे किसी बिल्डिंग के 8वें तल पर रहने जा रहे थे
mt: They were going to live on the 8th floor of a building
ref: They were moving to the eighth floor of a building.

src: उसने यह सपना देखा कि वह स्कूल में एक टेस्ट दे रही थी
mt: She dreamed that she was taking a test at school
ref: She dreamed that she was taking a test at school.

src: उसने अपने लिए खरीदे जाने वाले सामानों की सूची बनाई
mt: He made a list of things he wanted to buy for himself
ref: She made a list of things to buy.

src: केटी पता नहीं क्यों नहीं समझती है
mt: Katie doesn't know why she doesn't understand
ref: Katie does not understand why.

src: उसे आखिरकार नाथन का स्टैंड दिखा और उसने एक हॉट डॉग आर्डर किया
mt: He finally showed him Nathan's Stand and ordered a hot dog
ref: She finally saw a Nathan's stand and ordered a traditional one.

src: क्रिसमस मात्र कुछ सप्ताह बाद था औऱ उसके पास एकदम पैसे नहीं थे
mt: It was only a few weeks before Christmas and he had no money at all
ref: Christmas was a few weeks away and she didn't really have money.

src: वह अकेले जाना चाहती थी ताकि यह सिद्ध कर सके कि वह निडर है
mt: She wanted to go alone to prove she was brave
ref: She wanted to go by herself to prove she was brave.

src: उसके पास अपने मेहमानों को खिलाने के लिए कोई खाना नहीं है
mt: He has no food to feed his guests
ref: He doesn't have any food at home to give to his guests.

src: उसको वह नौकरी मिली और वह बहुत उत्साहित थी
mt: He got the job and he was very excited
ref: She got the job and was excited.

src: प्रत्येक दिन की अपनी ही मुसीबत है
mt: Each day has its own trouble
ref: Everyday has been a struggle.

src: वह सच नें अजीब था और उसके साथ समय बिताना मुश्किल था
mt: He was a strange man and it was difficult to spend time with him
ref: He was really awkward and he had a hard time.

src: उसे गोद लेने के बाद उसकी माँ ने तीन और बच्चों को गोद लिया
mt: After adopting her, her mother adopted three more children
ref: After her adoption her mom adopted 3 more children.

src: उसकी प्रेमिका ने बताया कि वह स्वादिष्ट है लेकिन वह नर्वस था
mt: His girlfriend said he was tasty but he was nervous
ref: His girlfriend told him that it was delicious, but he was nervous.

src: वह यह कार्य रोज करता था
mt: He did this work every day
ref: He did it every day.

src: उसने ड्राइव करते हुए कॉफी पी
mt: He was driving and drinking coffee
ref: She drank the coffee as she drove.

src: एक मस्टैंग उसके बगल में आ गई और स्पीड बनाए रखी.
mt: A Mustang flew alongside and maintained speed.
ref: A Mustang pulled up next to him and kept speed.

src: उसने शुरुआत से अंत तक अपनी पोशाक बनाने में कई घंटे बिताए.
mt: She spent hours sewing her outfit from start to finish.
ref: He spent many hours making his costume from scratch.

src: यह जानते हुए कि उनके पास पैसे नहीं हैं, मैंने उन्हें अपना क्रेडिट कार्ड उधार दिया.
mt: I lent them my credit card even though I knew they didn't have money.
ref: Considering that she's broke, I loaned my credit card to her.

src: उसे कुछ सूझ नहीं रहा था कि वह क्या करे.
mt: He had no idea what to do.
ref: She had no clue what to do.

src: उसने ख़ुद एक पार्टी में ज़बरदस्ती जाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: He decided to go to a party against his will.
ref: She decided to force herself to go to a party.

src: वह अपने बच्चे के लिंग का पता लगाने वाली थी.
mt: She was trying to determine the sex of her child.
ref: She was about to find out the sex of her baby.

src: उसे अपना नाम पसंद था और आशा करती कि काश लोग इतने बुरे नहीं होते.
mt: She liked her name and hoped people weren't so bad.
ref: She liked her name and wished people wouldn't be so mean.

src: वह घूमने के लिए फ़ैमिली वैन को बाहर ले गई.
mt: She took the family van out for a drive.
ref: She took the family van out for a spin.

src: डॉक्टर ने उसे बताया कि उसका वज़न काफ़ी ज़्यादा है.
mt: The doctor told him that his weight was too much.
ref: The doctor told him that he was overweight.

src: वह जानता था कि उसका आख़िरी लक्ष्य शिक्षक बनना है.
mt: He knew his ultimate goal was to become a teacher.
ref: He knew that his end goal was to be a teacher.

src: उसने गर्मी वाले एक दिन स्टेट पार्क में हाइक करने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: He decided to go hiking in a state park on a hot day.
ref: She decided to hike in the state park on a sunny day.

src: वह एक गर्म हवा का दिन था.
mt: It was a hot day.
ref: It was a warm breezy day.

src: वह नहीं जानती थी कि यह कैसे हो गया.
mt: She didn't know how it happened.
ref: She didn't know how it happened.

src: जब वह 21साल का था, जेरेमी ने घर से जाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: When he was 21, Jeremy decided to leave home.
ref: When he was 21, Jeremy decided to move out.

src: वह चाहता है कि यह उतना ही साफ़ दिखे जितना कि जब वह छोटा था.
mt: He wants it to be as clear as it was when he was young.
ref: He wishes it looked as clean as it did when he was young.

src: मैंने अलमारी से अपने कपड़े और तौलिया लिया.
mt: I took my clothes and towel from the closet.
ref: I got my clothes and towel from the closet.

src: क्योंकि मेरा भाई काम पर था, उसके मुझे लेने के लिए मुझे उसका इंतज़ार करना पड़ा.
mt: Because my brother was at work, I had to wait for him to come and pick me up.
ref: Since my brother was at work, I had to wait for him to pick me up.

src: वज़न उठाने के लिए वह सिर्फ़ अपने ख़ास बारबेल का इस्तेमाल करता था.
mt: He only used his special barbell to lift weights.
ref: He only used his special barbell to lift weights.

src: यह उसे अन्य व्यक्तिगत मुद्दों की वजह से बहुत ज़्यादा तनाव दे रहा था.
mt: It was causing him a lot of stress because of other personal issues.
ref: It was stressing her out a great deal due to other personal issues.

src: उसने एक छोटे कॉन्ट्रैक्ट पर हस्ताक्षर किया जिसने उसे फ़्रंट लाइन पर भेज दिया.
mt: He signed a small contract that sent him to the front lines.
ref: He signed a short contract that put him on the front lines.

src: वह एक आदमी को कुछ देर तक देखता रहा.
mt: He watched the man for a few minutes.
ref: He watched one man for a while.

src: मुझे यकीन नहीं हो रहा था कि वह इस हुनर के बिना जीवन में इतना आगे निकल गई है.
mt: I couldn't believe that she had come so far in life without this talent.
ref: I couldn't believe she had gotten this far in life without this skill.

src: उसने फ़ोन किया और अपनी दोस्त किम को बताया कि वह सबसे ख़राब खिलाड़ी है.
mt: She called her friend Kim and told her that she was the worst player.
ref: She called and told her friend Kim she was the worst player.

src: वह जवाब नहीं देना चाहती थी और उसके जाने का इंतज़ार करने लगी.
mt: She did not want to answer and waited for him to leave.
ref: She didn't want to answer and waited for it to go away.

src: उसने पेंटिंग की डिग्री के साथ ग्रेजुएशन किया.
mt: She graduated with a degree in painting.
ref: He graduated with a degree in painting.

src: उसने उन्हें स्कूल में पहनने के लिए अपने बैग में रख दिया.
mt: He put them in his bag to wear to school.
ref: He slipped them in his backpack to wear at school.

src: मुझे आश्चर्य हुआ कि मेरे क्रश ने शुरुआत में हां कह दी.
mt: I was surprised when my crush said yes at first.
ref: I was surprised my crush said yes to begin with.

src: उसका नतीजा उसने काफ़ी शराब पी लिया.
mt: The result was that he had drunk a lot of alcohol.
ref: He ended up getting pretty drunk.

src: सबसे पहले, वह मंकी बार पर उल्टा लटक गया.
mt: 1st, he hung upside down on the monkey bars.
ref: First, he hung upside down on the monkey bars.

src: मैंने तीन नीली गाड़ी को एक पंक्ति में से गुज़रते देखा.
mt: I saw three blue cars pass in a line.
ref: I saw three blue cars pass by in a row.

src: उसके माता-पिता दूर जा रहे थे इसलिए उसने एक करने का फैसला किया।
mt: His parents were leaving so he decided to do one.
ref: Her parents were going away so she decided to have one.

src: उसने फैसला किया कि वह पार्क में दौड़ने जाएगा।
mt: He decided to run in the park.
ref: He decides he will go for a run in the park.

src: उसने फैसला किया कि उसे कुछ बर्फ हटानी चाहिए।
mt: He decided that he needed to remove some ice.
ref: He decides he should shovel some of the snow.

src: वह चुपके से उसकी ईमेल पढ़ने लगा।
mt: He secretly started reading her emails.
ref: He began to sneakily read her emails.

src: वे सप्ताह में कई बार कोर्ट आरक्षित करते थे।
mt: They reserved the court several times a week.
ref: They would reserve a court a couple times a week.

src: उसने अपने गंदे कपड़ों को रंग के अनुसार छाँटा।
mt: He sorted his dirty clothes by color.
ref: She sorted her dirty clothes by color.

src: हमने अपनी जरूरत का सामान पैक किया और द्वीप के दूसरी तरफ चले गए।
mt: We packed our supplies and moved to the other side of the island.
ref: We packed what we needed and headed to the other side of the island.

src: एक छोटे से कंकड़ ने उसका एक दांत आधा कर दिया!
mt: A small pebble knocked out one of his teeth!
ref: A small pebble in it made one of his teeth snap in half!

src: पहले तो वह याद नहीं कर सका कि वह कहाँ हो सकती है।
mt: 1st she couldn't remember where she could be.
ref: At first he cannot remember where it might be.

src: वह सदियों से एक नया कुत्ता चाहती थी।
mt: She had wanted a new puppy for centuries.
ref: She had wanted a new dog for ages.

src: वह घंटों मॉल में खरीदारी करता रहा और उसे कुछ नहीं मिला।
mt: He spent hours shopping at the mall and didn't find anything.
ref: He shopped at the mall for hours and was unable to find anything.

src: बिल के पास न्यूनतम मजदूरी वाली नौकरी थी।
mt: 1. The bill passed with a minimum wage job.
ref: Bill had a minimum wage job.

src: वह उन्हें पहनना चाहती थी।
mt: She wanted to wear them.
ref: She wanted to wear them out.

src: वह और उसका परिवार मैक्सिको से यहां आया था।
mt: He and his family came here from Mexico.
ref: He and his family came here from Mexico.

src: उसने अपने लचीलेपन में सुधार के लिए योग कक्षा में दाखिला लेने का फैसला किया।
mt: She decided to enroll in yoga classes to improve her flexibility.
ref: She decided to enroll in Yoga class to improve her flexibility.

src: छात्रों ने सामूहिक रूप से शोक मनाना शुरू कर दिया।
mt: Students began to mourn collectively.
ref: The students let out a collective groan.

src: उसने देखा कि उसकी बेटी का खाली समय उसके नए क्लबों के साथ गायब हो गया।
mt: He saw that his daughter's free time had disappeared with her new clubs.
ref: She'd seen her daughter's free time disappear with her new clubs.

src: यह पहला दिन था, और जीना जागने वालों में आखिरी थी ।
mt: It was the first day, and the last day to be alive for the living.
ref: It was the first day, and Gina was the last to wake up.

src: वह एक शिकारी धनुष चाहता था।
mt: He wanted a hunting bow.
ref: He wanted a hunting bow.

src: एक दिन उसकी माँ ने उसे पालतू जानवरों के स्टोर की यात्रा से आश्चर्यचकित कर दिया।
mt: 1 day after her mother took her to the pet store.
ref: One day her mother surprised her with a trip to the pet store.

src: उसके सभी दोस्त परिधानों में थे।
mt: All his friends were dressed in clothes.
ref: All his friends were dressing up.

src: उसे आखिरकार एक बड़ी फिल्म में एक भूमिका मिल गयी।
mt: He finally got a role in a big movie.
ref: She finally landed a role in a big film.

src: अंत में उन्होंने भरोसा किया, और पूल को स्थापित किया गया।
mt: In the end, they trusted, and the pool was established.
ref: He finally relented, and the pool was installed.

src: किसान जोंस अभी भी उसके लिए सुबह की जई नहीं लाया था।
mt: Farmer Jones hadn't yet brought in his oats for the morning.
ref: Farmer Jones still had not brought her morning oats.

src: उसने आसपास पूछा कि क्या यह वहां किसी का है।
mt: He asked around if it belonged to anyone nearby.
ref: He asked around if it was anybody's there.

src: मैंने पूरे दिन स्वस्थ खाना खाया!
mt: I ate healthy all day!
ref: I ate healthy food the entire day!

src: वह वास्तव में इस यात्रा की प्रतीक्षा कर रहा था।
mt: He was actually looking forward to this trip.
ref: He was really looking forward to this trip.

src: लेकिन एरिक की मां ने कहा कि एरिक बाहर आकर खेल नहीं सकता।
mt: But Eric's mother said Eric can't play outside.
ref: But Eric's mom said that Eric could not come out and play.

src: एक दिन उसने जितनी दूर तक हो सके एक पत्थर फेंका।
mt: 1 day he threw a rock as far as he could.
ref: One day he threw a stone as far as he could.

src: उसने रेत का महल बनाया।
mt: He built a palace of sand.
ref: He made a sand castle.

src: वह कीचड़ में लोटता रहा, जो उसके फर में फंस गया।
mt: He kept rolling in the mud, which got stuck in his fur.
ref: He rolled in the mud, which got caught in his fur.

src: वह अपने घर के पास की गली में चला रहा था तभी गड्ढे में गिर गया।
mt: He was walking in the alley near his home when he fell into a hole.
ref: He started down the street near his house when he hit a pothole.

src: मैंने उसे कभी व्यक्तिगत रूप से नहीं देखा, लेकिन मुझे उस पर भरोसा है।
mt: I have never seen him in person, but I trust him.
ref: I never seen her in person, but I trust her.

src: मुझे लगा कि वे मेरी वेबसाइट पर अधिक ट्रैफ़िक लाएंगे।
mt: I thought they would bring more traffic to my website.
ref: I thought they would drive more traffic to my website.

src: उसने एक पार्टी की मेजबानी करने का फैसला किया।
mt: She decided to host a party.
ref: He decided to host a party.

src: मुझे अपनी नयी पोशाक पहननी है जो माँ ने खरीदा था।
mt: I have to wear my new dress that my mother bought.
ref: I got to wear my new outfit that Mom bought.

src: यह चालू नहीं होता।
mt: It is not running.
ref: It would not turn on.

src: इसलिए उसने फोन बुक में से एक नाम और पता चुना।
mt: So he picked a name and address from the phone book.
ref: So she picked a name and address out of the phone book.

src: बिल ने एक सुंदर लड़की को देखा।
mt: Bill saw a beautiful girl.
ref: Bill noticed a pretty girl.

src: हमें एक बवंडर की चेतावनी मिली और भयानक आंधी थी।
mt: We got a tornado warning and a terrible windstorm.
ref: We had a tornado warning and terrible thunderstorms.

src: जेनी एक कॉमेडी देखना चाहती थी, लेकिन लिन एक रोमांचक देखना चाहती थी।
mt: Jenny wanted to see a comedy, but Lin wanted to see an action movie.
ref: Janie wanted to see a comedy, but Lynne wanted to see a thrill.

src: उसने मॉल जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to go to the mall.
ref: She decided to go to the mall.

src: हमारा पुराना घर अब हमारे परिवार के लिए बहुत छोटा है।
mt: Our old house is now too small for our family.
ref: Our old house is now too small for our family.

src: वह अपनी सिगरेट के लिए पहुंचा लेकिन पैक खाली था।
mt: He went to get his cigarette but the pack was empty.
ref: He reached for his cigarettes but the pack was empty.

src: वह अपनी गुड़िया से बहुत प्यार करती थी।
mt: She loved her doll very much.
ref: She loved her doll very much.

src: उसके दोस्तों को यकीन नहीं है कि उसका रहस्य क्या है।
mt: His friends don't believe what his secret is.
ref: Her friends aren't sure what her secret is.

src: लेकिन वह स्वस्थ खाना भी चाहता था।
mt: But he also wanted healthy food.
ref: But he also wanted to eat healthier.

src: जल्दी से, उसकी माँ उसे ड्राइव करके डाउनटाउन ले गयी।
mt: Quickly, his mother drove him downtown.
ref: Quickly, his mother drove him downtown.

src: वह एक गुलाबी कमरा रखना चाहती थी।
mt: She wanted to have a pink room.
ref: She wanted to have a pink room.

src: वे एक अच्छे रेस्टोरेंट में मिले और हाथ मिलाया।
mt: They met at a good restaurant and shook hands.
ref: They met at a nice restaurant and shook hands.

src: वह उसके आसपास बहुत घबरा जाता है।
mt: 1. He gets very nervous around her.
ref: He gets very nervous around her.

src: उसने पहले कभी कुछ नहीं उगाया था।
mt: He had never grown anything before.
ref: She had never grown anything before.

src: वह उठा और अपने किचन में चला गया।
mt: He got up and went to his kitchen.
ref: He got up and went into his kitchen.

src: यह सितारों के साथ नीली थी।
mt: It was blue with stars.
ref: It was blue with stars.

src: यह अबहुत ज़्यादा उन्नत था।
mt: It was very advanced.
ref: It was extremely advanced.

src: वह पोर्क चॉप बना रहा था।
mt: He was making pork chops.
ref: He was making pork chops.

src: उसने आसपास पूछा और पता लगाया कि यह किसने किया।
mt: He asked around and found out who did it.
ref: She asked around and found out who did it.

src: उसने अपने दोस्त के जन्मदिन के लिए उसे एक पेंटिंग दी।
mt: He gave his friend a painting for his birthday.
ref: For her friend's birthday, she gave her a painting.

src: उनके जन्मदिन पर उनके परिवार ने उसे एक क्लासिक कार संग्रहालय का टिकट दिलवाया।
mt: On his birthday, his family gave him a ticket to a classic car museum.
ref: For his birthday, his family got him tickets to a classic car museum.

src: अब जॉनी के घुटने में चोट लग गई है।
mt: Now Johnny's knee is hurt.
ref: Now Johnny has a bruised knee.

src: वह अक्सर नाश्ते में फास्ट फूड खाता है।
mt: He often eats fast food for breakfast.
ref: He often eats fast food for breakfast.

src: सभी ने प्रयोग शुरू कर दिया।
mt: All have started their experiments.
ref: Everyone began to start on the experiment.

src: जब उसने उनमें से एक की आलोचना की तो उनके फैन्स उनसे नाराज हो गए.
mt: When he criticized one of them, their fans got angry with them.
ref: When he criticized one of them, its fans got angry with him.

src: वे उसके पसंदीदा हैं क्योंकि उसे जितना चाहिए उतना खाने को मिलता है।
mt: He likes them because he gets to eat as much as he wants.
ref: They are his favorite because he gets to eat as much as he wants.

src: वह हमेशा एक ही समय पर अपना स्मोक ब्रेक लेता है।
mt: He always takes his smoke break at the same time.
ref: He always takes his smoke break at the same time.

src: वह एक फोटोग्राफर था और वह एक ग्राफिक डिजाइनर थी।
mt: He was a photographer and he was a graphic designer.
ref: He was a photographer and she was a graphic designer.

src: मैंने अपना कंप्यूटर बंद कर दिया ताकि मैं धोखा न दूं।
mt: I shut down my computer so I wouldn't be caught.
ref: I turned off my computer so I wouldn't cheat.

src: छवियों को देखने के बाद, मैंने एक को चुना।
mt: After looking at the pictures, I chose one.
ref: After looking through images, I picked one out.

src: जब यह ठंडा हो गया, तो वह इसे फ्रॉस्ट करने के लिए तैयार थी।
mt: When it cooled, he was ready to freeze it.
ref: When it had cooled, she was ready to frost it.

src: यह हर समय सोता रहता है।
mt: It sleeps all the time.
ref: It sleeps all the time.

src: उसकी माँ अंदर चली गई और हांफने लगी।
mt: His mother went inside and started panting.
ref: Her mother walked in and gasped.

src: मेरे शिक्षक कक्षा को स्कूल के सामने ले गए।
mt: My teacher took my class out in front of the school.
ref: My teacher took the class towards the front of the school.

src: रविवार की दोपहर वह घर में हल्की सफाई कर रही थी।
mt: She was cleaning the house in the afternoon on Sunday.
ref: She was home doing light cleaning on a Sunday afternoon.

src: उसने नहीं सोचा था कि वह इसे पसंद करेगी।
mt: He didn't think he would like it.
ref: She didn't think she would like it.

src: अगर कोई शिक्षिका बीमार थी तो मैंने उसके स्कूल में पढ़ाना शुरू कर दिया।
mt: If a teacher was sick, I started teaching in her school.
ref: I began to substitute teach at her school if a teacher was sick.

src: आज गैरी को अपना लंचबॉक्स नहीं मिल रहा था।
mt: Today, Gary couldn't find his lunchbox.
ref: Today Gary couldn't find his lunchbox.

src: कल उसकी महत्वपूर्ण परीक्षा थी।
mt: Yesterday was her important exam.
ref: He had an important test tomorrow.

src: मैंने देखा कि एक आदमी अकेला बैठा है।
mt: I saw a man sitting alone.
ref: I noticed a man sitting by himself.

src: उन्होंने आइंस्टीन के बारे में कई वृत्तचित्र देखे।
mt: He had seen many documentaries about Einstein.
ref: He watched several documentaries about Einstein.

src: उसने अखबार के रोजगार खंड में खोज की।
mt: He searched the newspaper's job section.
ref: She searched the newspaper employment section.

src: अचानक उसने देखा कि एक छोटा सा साँप उसकी बाँह पर घूम रहा है!
mt: Suddenly he saw a small snake winding around his arm!
ref: Suddenly she saw a small snake slither across her arm!

src: उनमें से कुछ ने उन्हें प्रायोजित किया था।
mt: Some of them were sponsored by them.
ref: He had some of them sponsor him.

src: एक दिन उसने हाईक पर जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: 1 day he decided to go to the high peak.
ref: One day he decided to go on a hike.

src: एक दिन, अपने कुत्ते के साथ बाहर खेलते समय लोगन को एक मधुमक्खी ने काट लिया।
mt: One day, while playing outside with his dog, Logan was stung by a bee.
ref: One day, while playing outside with his dog, Logan was stung by a bee.

src: उनके माता-पिता ने उन्हें एक ट्यूटर लगाने पर विचार किया।
mt: Their parents considered putting them in a tutor.
ref: His parents considered getting him a tutor.

src: राय के भाई ने गलती से उसका ड्रिंक गिरा दिया।
mt: Ray's brother accidentally spilled his drink.
ref: Rae's brother accidentally spilled his drink.

src: जीना को उम्मीद थी कि उसके अन्य दोस्त आएंगे और उनके साथ शामिल होंगे।
mt: Gene hoped that his other friends would come and join him.
ref: Gina hoped her other friends would come over and join them.

src: वे पूरे साल अच्छे रहे हैं।
mt: 2015 was a good year for them.
ref: They have been good all year.

src: मैंने डॉक्टर का अपॉइंटमेंट निर्धारित किया।
mt: I have scheduled an appointment with the doctor.
ref: I scheduled a doctor's appointment.

src: क्रिश्चियन ने टीम के लिए कोशिश करने का फैसला किया।
mt: Christian decided to try for the team.
ref: Christian decided to try out for the team.

src: वे एक-एक हफ़्ते करके उन्हें धुलते थे.
mt: They washed them one week at a time.
ref: They would each alternate which week to do them.

src: उन्होंने उसे बताया कि वे जानवर नहीं खरीद सकते.
mt: He told them they could not buy animals.
ref: She told him that she could not afford to buy him one.

src: जानवरों के डॉक्टर, डॉक्टर माइक को ली के शरीर में तीन पिस्सू मिले.
mt: 3 ticks were found in the body of the animal doctor, Dr. Mike Lee.
ref: The veterinarian, Doctor Mike, found three fleas on Lee.

src: जल्द ही, वह चाबी हाथ में लेकर, अपनी कार की तरफ़ दौड़ी.
mt: Soon, she was running toward her car, key in hand.
ref: Quickly, she ran to her car, keys in hand.

src: उसे पक्का था कि वह वहीं होगा.
mt: He was sure he would be there.
ref: She was sure it would be there.

src: उसने अपना सबसे अच्छा स्कर्ट सूट पहना और इंटरव्यू के लिए चली गई.
mt: She wore her best skirt suit and went for the interview.
ref: She put on her best skirt suit and headed to the interview.

src: उसे टैको खाने थे.
mt: He was going to Taco Bell.
ref: She wanted to eat tacos.

src: एक दिन स्केटबोर्डिंग के लिए, वह पार्क में स्केटबोर्ड लेकर गया.
mt: 1 day ago, he went to the park with a skateboard.
ref: He brings the skateboard to the park for a day of skateboarding.

src: उसके पापा और उसकी माँ, दोनों शराबी थे.
mt: His father and his mother were both alcoholics.
ref: His dad and his mom were both alcoholics.

src: इसिलए उसने कई महींनो तक उन्हें बढ़ने दिया.
mt: So he let them grow up to be women.
ref: So she let it grow for months and months.

src: उसने अपनी अलार्म घड़ी को देखा.
mt: He looked at his alarm clock.
ref: She looked at her clock alarm.

src: मैंने Coke मँगाई.
mt: I bought a Coke.
ref: I asked for a Coke.

src: वह टीवी देख रहा था कि जाने कहाँ से एक चेतावनी की आवाज़ सुनाई दी.
mt: He was watching TV when a warning sound came from somewhere.
ref: He was watching tv and out of no where an alert popped up.

src: हम खुश थे कि आज स्कूल की छुट्टी हो गई थी.
mt: We were happy that today was a holiday from school.
ref: We're excited that school is cancelled for the day.

src: वह जो से कुछ फ़ुट दूर तक आती और फिर भाग जाती.
mt: She came from a distance of some feet and then ran away.
ref: It would get a few feet from Joe then scurry away.

src: उसने नगद पैसे दिए.
mt: He gave him cash.
ref: He paid cash.

src: उसे अभी से पीने की दिक्कत हो गई थी.
mt: He had already been having trouble with his drinking.
ref: But he already had a drinking problem.

src: अचानक, उसने एक अजीब सी हवा महसूस की.
mt: Suddenly, he felt a strange wind.
ref: All of a sudden she realized she felt an unusual breeze.

src: बाहर बारिश हो रही थी और ठंड थी.
mt: It was raining and cold outside.
ref: It was rainy and cold out.

src: मैं बाहर गया और नए जूते ले आया.
mt: I went out and brought back new shoes.
ref: I went out and bought some new shoes.

src: वह छोटे कम्यूटर प्लेन उड़ाना सीख रहा था.
mt: He was learning to fly small commuter planes.
ref: He was learning to fly small commuter planes.

src: वह पार्टी में कोई सलाद लेकर आएगा.
mt: 1. He will bring a salad to the party.
ref: He needs to bring a salad to the party.

src: आज, उसकी माँ उसकी सबसे पहली नाव की सवारी के लिए उसे घाट पर लेकर गई.
mt: Today, his mother took him to the dock to ride his first boat.
ref: Today her mom took her to the pier for her very first boat ride.

src: वह बस से एक पुरानी जेल देखने गया.
mt: He went to see an old jail by bus.
ref: He took a bus tour to an old prison.

src: उसके फ़ोन का स्टोरेज खत्म हो रहा था.
mt: His phone was running out of storage.
ref: She was running out of space on her phone.

src: उससे माफ़ी माँगने के लिए, उसने उसके लिए कार की नई बैटरी खरीदने का फैसला किया.
mt: To apologize, he decided to buy her a new car battery.
ref: As a way to ask forgiveness he decided to buy her a new car battery.

src: उसकी सबसे पसंदीदा शरारत थी, टीचर से सारी चॉक छिपाना.
mt: Her favorite mischief was hiding all the chalk from the teacher.
ref: Her favorite trick was to hide all of the chalk from the teacher.

src: जेन हमेशा से उसकी रेसिपी जानना चाहती थी, पर उसकी माँ उसे नहीं बता रही थी.
mt: Jane always wanted to know her recipe, but her mother wouldn't tell her.
ref: Jane always wanted the recipe but her mother wouldn't give it to her.

src: कचरा फेंकने का समय हो गया था.
mt: It was time to throw away the trash.
ref: It was the time of the day to take out the trash.

src: हममे से आधे लोगों को पेपरोनी चाहिए था.
mt: 50% of us wanted pepperoni.
ref: Half of us wanted pepperoni.

src: जो परिवार रहने के लिए आया था उनकी एक जवान बेटी थी और साइमन उस पर फ़िदा हो गया.
mt: The family who came to live there had a young daughter and Simon fell in love with her.
ref: The family moving in had a teenage daughter and Simon was smitten.

src: उस शनिवार को, उसकी टीम का एक बहुत ही ज़रूरी ख़ेल था.
mt: That Saturday, his team had a very important game.
ref: One Saturday, his team had a very important game.

src: उसके शिक्षक ने उस पर चिल्लाया.
mt: His teacher yelled at him.
ref: His teacher yelled at him.

src: उसने ज्वेलरी स्टोर के काउंटर पर फ्लायर को छोड़ दिया.
mt: He left a flier on the jewelry store's counter.
ref: She left jewelry store fliers on the counter.

src: मैंने तुरंत उसे ख़रीद लिया.
mt: I immediately bought it.
ref: I immediately purchased it.

src: उन्होंने एक ही वक़्त पर अपना गाना बजाने के लिए कई रेडियो DJs को रिश्वत दी.
mt: They bribed several radio DJs to play their song at the same time.
ref: They bribed several radio DJs to play their song all at the same time.

src: उसने बहुत बार भाग भी लिए और उसे कई पुरस्कार मिले.
mt: He has run many times and has won many awards.
ref: She received many awards and competed a lot.

src: उसे विश्वास नहीं हो रहा था कि कोई और दुनिया भी है जिसे उसने नहीं देखा था.
mt: He could not believe that there was another world out there that he had not seen.
ref: She couldn't believe there was another world she couldn't see.

src: गर्मियों में उसने अपने परिवार के साथ महिला विश्व कप देखा.
mt: She watched the Women's World Cup with her family in the summer.
ref: Over the summer she watched the women's world cup with her family.

src: रजिस्ट्रेशन डेस्क पर, उन्होंने उससे उसका क्रेडिट कार्ड मांगा.
mt: At the registration desk, they asked her for her credit card.
ref: At the registration desk, they asked her for her credit card.

src: उसने काफ़ी अच्छा वक़्त बिताया.
mt: He spent a lot of good time.
ref: She had a great time.

src: उसने इसे दो दिन रखा था.
mt: He kept it for two days.
ref: He had kept it 2 days.

src: उसे शक होने लगा था कि नई नौकरानी ने उन्हें चुरा लिया है.
mt: He began to suspect that the new maid had stolen from him.
ref: She was beginning to suspect the new maid had stolen them!

src: वह रसोई में थी और कुछ वक़्त से उनकी आवाज़ नहीं आ रही थी.
mt: She was in the kitchen and had not been heard from for some time.
ref: She had been in the kitchen and hadn't heard them in awhile.

src: उसने उसे भूरे अंडे याद रखने की को कहा.
mt: He told her to remember brown eggs.
ref: She admonished him to remember the brown eggs.

src: वे सैंटा हैट पहनकर एक स्थानीय नर्सिंग होम गए.
mt: They dressed as Santa Claus and went to a local nursing home.
ref: They went to a local nursing home, wearing Santa hats.

src: उन्होंने सबसे पहले बंदरों, गोरिल्लाओं और पांडा को देखा.
mt: They first saw monkeys, gorillas and pandas.
ref: They saw monkeys, gorillas and panda's first.

src: उसके पास नौकरी नहीं थी और उसे पैसे की ज़रूरत थी.
mt: He had no job and needed money.
ref: She did not have a job and she needed money.

src: यह कई लोगों के लिए एक लंबी यात्रा थी, लेकिन उन्होंने इसे पुरा किया.
mt: This was a long journey for many, but they have completed it.
ref: It was a long journey for many, but they made it.

src: फिर उसने शिकायत की के जिम ने कभी रात का खाना नहीं बनाया.
mt: He then complained that Jim had never made dinner.
ref: She then complained that Jim never cooked dinner.

src: लीना अपने कमरों की सफाई कर रही थी और मेहसुस किया कि उसकी दराजें भरी हुई हैं.
mt: Lena was cleaning her rooms and noticed her drawers were full.
ref: Lina was cleaning their rooms and realized their drawers were stuffed.

src: उसकी स्थानीय आइसक्रीम की दुकान में वो फ्लेवर नहीं था.
mt: It wasn't the flavor she was looking for at her local ice cream shop.
ref: Her local ice cream shop didn't have that flavor.

src: मैंने इंजन ऑन किया और गाड़ी चलाने लगा.
mt: I started the engine and drove the car.
ref: I turned the engine on and started to drive.

src: वे आज रात बहस कर रहे थे.
mt: They were arguing last night.
ref: They were having a debate tonight.

src: वो क्लॉस में जाने से डरती थी.
mt: She was afraid to go to class.
ref: She dreaded having to go to class.

src: वो इतना घबराया हुआ था कि उसने अपने लक्षणों को ऑनलाइनही देख लिया.
mt: He was so panicked that he looked up his symptoms online.
ref: He was so nervous that he checked his symptoms online.

src: लॉट पर रहते हुए, उसने बहुत सारी गाड़िया देखीं लेकिन कोई भी जो उसे पसंद आई हो.
mt: He saw many cars on the lot, but none that he liked.
ref: While on the lot, he saw plenty of cars but none that he liked.

src: इस खेल में दर्जनों लोग शामिल थे.
mt: 100s of people were involved in this game.
ref: The game involved dozens of people.

src: फिर से पाने के लिए चीज़ो की एक सूची पहले बनाई गई थी.
mt: A list of things to do to get it back was made first.
ref: A list of items to retrieve was created first.

src: उसमें आत्म-सम्मान की कमी थी और उसे लगता था की वो दोस्त बनाने के लायक़ नहीं हैं.
mt: He had a low self-esteem and thought he was not worthy of making friends.
ref: He had low self esteem and felt didn't deserve to have friends.

src: उसे अपनी आयरिश विरासत पर हमेशा गर्व था।
mt: He was always proud of his Irish heritage.
ref: He was always proud of his Irish heritage.

src: उसने एक पुराने टोस्टर को एक जर्जर तार से प्लग किया।
mt: He plugged an old toaster with a frayed cord.
ref: He plugged in an old toaster with a frayed cord.

src: आलू पक जाने के बाद अब समय था उनको मसलने का।
mt: After the potatoes were cooked, it was time to mash them.
ref: After cooking the potatoes it was time to mash them.

src: उनको मना किया गया फिर भी वे ये करते थे।
mt: They were told not to do it, but they did it anyway.
ref: They were told not to do it but they did anyway.

src: बिफ़ यह भी चाहता था कि वह थिएटर में फिल्म देखे।
mt: He also wanted to see a movie in the theater.
ref: Biff also wanted to watch a movie in theaters.

src: अपने दोस्तों को दोबारा देखकर मैं खुश था।
mt: I was happy to see my friends again.
ref: I was happy to see some of my friends again.

src: एश्ली बहुत चिंतित थी कि कहीं उसे भी पिस्सू न लग जाएँ।
mt: Ashley was very concerned that she might get fleas too.
ref: Ashley was very worried that she would get fleas as well.

src: यह शहर का एक जर्जर इलाका था।
mt: This was an old part of the city.
ref: It was a run down section of town.

src: उसका जन्मदिन आनेवाला था।
mt: His birthday was coming up.
ref: Her birthday was coming up.

src: उसके जन्मदिन पर उसके माता पिता उसे एक फार्म पर ले गए।
mt: On his birthday, his parents took him to a farm.
ref: On her birthday her parents took her to a farm.

src: वह अभी डोवर में आया था।
mt: He had just arrived in Dover.
ref: He had just arrived in Dover.

src: उसने हाईस्कूल के दौरान अच्छे नंबरों के लिए खूब मेहनत की।
mt: She worked hard for good grades in high school.
ref: She worked hard all throughout high school to have good grades.

src: किसी कारण से वह चालू नहीं हो रहा था।
mt: It wouldn't start for some reason.
ref: It stopped turning on for some reason.

src: उन्होंने हमें बताया कि एसिड के बाद पानी नहीं डालना चाहिए।
mt: They told us not to put water on acid after.
ref: He told us not to pour water followed by an acid.

src: उन्हें अक्सर पहाडों में स्की पर जाना पसंद था।
mt: They often liked to ski in the mountains.
ref: They often liked to go skiing in the mountains.

src: वह बाहर जाकर खेलना चाहता था!
mt: He wanted to play outside!
ref: He wanted to go out and play!

src: उसे एक नौकरी की तलाश थी।
mt: He was looking for a job.
ref: He needed to find a job.

src: एक बीच ट्रिप के दौरान दोस्तों ने उससे शर्त लगाई।
mt: Friends bet him a beach trip.
ref: During a beach trip his friends made a dare to him.

src: वह किराने की दुकान पर गया और सामान ले आया।
mt: He went to the grocery store and brought back the goods.
ref: He went to the grocery store and bought the ingredients.

src: लीना दुखी थी क्योंकि वह अपने दोस्तों को स्कूल में नहीं मिल पाएगी।
mt: Leena was sad because she would not be able to meet her friends at school.
ref: Lena was sad because she wouldn't see her friends at school.

src: उसकी पत्नी को चिंता हुई क्योंकि उनमें बहुत बदबू आ रही थी।
mt: His wife was concerned because he had a bad smell.
ref: His wife became concerned because they smelled unusually terrible.

src: वह उसे सेट अप करने घर गया।
mt: He went to his house to set it up.
ref: He went home to set it up.

src: वह ग्रेजुएट होने वाली थी और नाचने वाली टीम में शामिल होना चाहती थी।
mt: She was going to graduate and wanted to join a dance team.
ref: She was about to graduate and wanted to tryout for dance team.

src: हॉल में वह उस बुली को देख सकती थी जिसने उसे गिराया था।
mt: She could see the bully in the hall who had pushed her down.
ref: Down the hall Gina could see he bully who had tripped her.

src: उसने एक ट्रैवल मग खरीदा ताकि वह स्कूल में अपने लिए चाय ला सके।
mt: She bought a travel mug so she could bring tea for herself at school.
ref: She bought a travel mug to bring tea with her to school.

src: उसने ऑनलाइन और अन्य दुकानों से डॉल खरीदना शुरू कर दिया।
mt: She started buying dolls online and at other stores.
ref: She bought dolls online and at flea markets and antique shops.

src: उसने गो कार्ट खुद ही बनाई थी।
mt: She made her own go-cart.
ref: He designed his go kart by himself.

src: वह वैलेंटाइन पर उसे एक स्पेशल गिफ्ट देना चाहता था।
mt: He wanted to give her a special gift on Valentine's Day.
ref: He wanted to get her a very special gift for Valentine's Day.

src: जब पहले दिन बारिश होने लगी तो उसे बहुत दुख हुआ।
mt: 1. When it started to rain on the first day, he was very sad.
ref: She was sad when it began to rainy on day one.

src: जेफ को लगा कि वह खतरे में है इसलिए वह पास के घर में चला गया।
mt: Jeff thought he was in danger so he went to a nearby house.
ref: Jeff knew he was in danger so he went to a nearby house.

src: चार्ल्स ने कार्यकारी अधिकारी के कलाकार के बारे में लिखने के लिए पूछा.
mt: Charles asked the executive officer to write about the artist.
ref: Charles asked to write about the executive's artist.

src: उसने दो बार कोशिश की, पर दोनों केक बिखर गए.
mt: She tried twice, but both cakes fell apart.
ref: She tried twice, but both cakes fell flat.

src: रॉन घबरा हुआ था.
mt: Ron was scared.
ref: Ron was nervous.

src: एक बार जब किसी स्टोर पर गया था, तो उसे धीरे-धीरे काम कर रहे कैशियर पर गुस्सा आ गया.
mt: Once he went to a store, he got angry at the cashier who was working slowly.
ref: During a trip to the store, he got angry at a slow cashier.

src: मैं गाना गाता था और मेरा दोस्त गिटार बजाता था.
mt: I used to sing and my friend played the guitar.
ref: I was singer and my friend played guitar.

src: उसके इतना ज़्यादा माँग करने के बाद, उन्होंने हार मान ली और हाँ कह दिया.
mt: After he demanded so much, they finally gave in and said yes.
ref: After all the time he asked they finally gave in and said yes.

src: वह वॉलीबॉल की प्रैक्टिस कर रही थी, जब उसे पापा बाहर आए.
mt: She was practicing volleyball when Papa came out.
ref: She was practicing her volleyball skills when her dad came out.

src: वह कई रातें तारों को देखते हुए गुज़ार देता.
mt: He spends many nights watching the stars.
ref: He would spend many of his nights looking at the stars.

src: उसे कुछ अंडे खरीदने की सख्त ज़रूरत थी.
mt: She needed to buy some eggs badly.
ref: He really needed to buy some eggs.

src: वह सरकते-सरकते, लाल जलते हुए स्टोव बर्नर के पास पहुँच गया.
mt: He was getting closer, red hot stove burner in front of him.
ref: He nimbly scurried to where the stove burner glowed red.

src: उसने एक नक्शा बनाया, ताकि वह उसे रखने की जगह न भूले.
mt: He made a map so he wouldn't forget where to put it.
ref: He drew a map so he wouldn't forget where he'd put it.

src: उन्होंने मुझे सारा खाना चुनने दिया.
mt: They let me choose all the food.
ref: She let me pick out all the food.

src: अब क्योंकि वह स्थाई नौकरी कर रहा था, उसने एक कुत्ता भी लेने का तय किया.
mt: Now that he was permanently employed, he decided to get a dog.
ref: Now that he had a steady job, he felt ready to have a dog too.

src: वह उदास था.
mt: He was sad.
ref: He was sad.

src: उसने ऑनलाइन क्लास की तलाश करने लगा.
mt: He started looking for online classes.
ref: He looked online for a lesson.

src: वह स्थानीय सीफ़ूड मार्केट में गया और एक बड़ी झींगा मछली ले ली.
mt: He went to the local seafood market and bought a large shrimp.
ref: He visits the local seafood market and picks a huge lobster.

src: जब पहली बार मैं कार में बैठा, तो ब्रेक का हिसाब भूल गया.
mt: When I first got in the car, I forgot to count the breaks.
ref: The first time I got into the car I lost track of the brake pedal.

src: रास्ता एक फ़ुट बर्फ़ से ढका हुआ था!
mt: 1 foot of snow covered the road!
ref: The street was covered in a foot of snow!

src: वह बहुत सारे खा जाते थे.
mt: He ate a lot.
ref: He ate a lot of it.

src: ब्रैड के पास एक भी अंडे नहीं थे!
mt: Brad had no eggs!
ref: Brad was all out of eggs!

src: हालाँकि, उसे डर था कि वह चुना नहीं जाएगा.
mt: However, he was afraid he would not be chosen.
ref: However, he was worried he wouldn't be elected.

src: एक दिन, बतखों के पास खेल रहा था.
mt: 1 day, a duck was playing with a ball.
ref: One day, Patrick was playing near the ducks.

src: मैंने अपनी नई सफ़ेद ड्रेस पहनी थी.
mt: I was wearing my new white dress.
ref: I wore my new white dress.

src: मैं सबसे मोटी हुआ करती थी, पर मैंने वजन कम कर लिया था.
mt: I used to be the fattest, but I've lost weight.
ref: I used to be heavyset but I lost weight.

src: उसे गेम देखने जाना बहुत पसंद था.
mt: He loved to go watch games.
ref: She loved going to games.

src: वह अपने काम से कभी नहीं थकती.
mt: She never gets tired of her work.
ref: She never gets tired of her work.

src: वह कभी पर्वत की चोटी पर नहीं गया था.
mt: He had never been to the top of a mountain.
ref: He had never made it to the top of a mountain.

src: उसने पूरे घर में तलाश की.
mt: He searched the entire house.
ref: He searched all over the house.

src: एक शुक्रवार, वे फ़िल्म देखने के लिए बाहर निकलने में कामयाब हो गए.
mt: On Friday, they succeeded in getting out to see a movie.
ref: One Friday, they were finally able to get away to see a movie.

src: दोनों कुछ मील दूर गाड़ी चलाकर दादी के घर गए.
mt: 2 went to grandma's house by car a few miles away.
ref: The two drove to Grandma's house a few miles down the street.

src: सू ने अपनी बिल्ली को घंटों खोजा जब तक कि उसने बाहर गड़गड़ाहट नहीं सुनी।
mt: Su searched for her cat for hours until she heard a commotion outside.
ref: Sue searched for her cat for hours until she heard purring outside.

src: उसने उसे अपने टैंक में डाल दिया।
mt: He put him in his tank.
ref: She put it into her tank.

src: मैं लगभग हर एक वीकेंड पर जाता था।
mt: I went to the beach almost every weekend.
ref: I used to go almost every single weekend.

src: यह चमकदार और लाल है।
mt: It is shiny and red.
ref: It is shiny and red.

src: उसने एक परी की एक सुंदर मूर्ति बनाई।
mt: She made a beautiful statue of a fairy.
ref: She made a beautiful sculpture of an angel.

src: हम खेलने और व्यायाम के लिए पार्क में गए।
mt: We went to the park to play and exercise.
ref: We walked to the park for playtime and exercise.

src: वह खोया हुआ और डरा हुआ लग रहा था, इसलिए मैट इसे घर ले गया।
mt: He looked lost and scared, so Matt took him home.
ref: It looked lost and scared, so Matt took it home.

src: वह अपने घर से दोस्त के घर साइकिल चलाकर गया था।
mt: He went to his friend's house by bicycle from his house.
ref: He cycled from his house to a friend's house.

src: उसने टाइमर लगाया और टीवी देखने बैठ गई।
mt: She set a timer and sat down to watch TV.
ref: She set a timer and sat down to watch television.

src: वह बहुत थक कर कक्षा में आया।
mt: 1. He came to the class very tired. 2. He came to the class very tiredly.
ref: He arrived to class very tired.

src: उसने प्रतिनिधि को अपनी समस्या बताई।
mt: He told his representative his problem.
ref: She explained her issue to the representative.

src: उसने अपने समापन पैराग्राफ टाइप किए।
mt: He typed his closing paragraph.
ref: He typed up his closing paragraphs.

src: जब वे वहां थे तो उन्हें एक आवारा कुत्ता मिला।
mt: When they were there, they met a stray dog.
ref: While they were there they found a stray dog.

src: वह एक विशेषज्ञ पियानोवादक थे, और अपने बेटे के लिए भी यही चाहते थे।
mt: He was an expert pianist, and wanted the same for his son.
ref: He was an expert pianist, and wanted the same for his son.

src: दुर्भाग्य से, वह पार्क में गीले पत्ते पर फिसल जाता है।
mt: Unfortunately, he slips on wet leaves in the park.
ref: Unfortunately, he slips on a wet leaf in the park.

src: उसने बच्चों को जल्दी सुलाया और रात का खाना शुरू किया।
mt: She put the children to bed quickly and started dinner.
ref: He put the kids to bed early and started dinner.

src: दुकान में मछली, छोटे जानवर और कुछ पिल्ले थे।
mt: The store had fish, small animals and some puppies.
ref: The store had fish, small animals, and a few puppies.

src: उसने इसमें पूरी तरह से घुस जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to go all the way in.
ref: She decided to fully immerse herself in it.

src: यह फ्लोर के बीच रुक गयी और रोशनी टिमटिमाने लगी।
mt: It stopped in the middle of the floor and the lights started to flicker.
ref: It stopped between floors and the lights flickered.

src: उसने पहले कभी बेबीसैट नहीं किया था और वह घबरा गया था।
mt: He had never done a babysit before and he was nervous.
ref: He had never babysat before and he was nervous.

src: आखिरकार उसे हिस्सा लेने का मौका मिल ही गया।
mt: Finally, I got the chance to be a part of it.
ref: He finally got the chance to run.

src: एक दिन, यह बहुत दूर उछली और गली में चली गयी।
mt: 1 day, it bounced very far and went down the alley.
ref: One day, it bounced too far and went into the street.

src: हमने लगभग एक साल में एक भी नहीं किया था।
mt: We haven't done anything in almost a year.
ref: We haven't had one in almost a year.

src: उसने हवाई जहाज का टिकट खरीदा और अपना बैग पैक किया।
mt: He bought an airplane ticket and packed his bag.
ref: He bought a plane ticket and packed his bags.

src: जॉन अब अपने शुरुआती 40 के दशक में है।
mt: John is in his early 40s.
ref: John is now in his early 40's.

src: उसे यह विचार घृणित लगा।
mt: She thought that was disgusting.
ref: She found the thought disgusting.

src: वह तुरंत विस्मय और आश्चर्य से भर गया।
mt: He immediately became amazed and astonished.
ref: He was immediately breath-taken and full of wonder.

src: बैरी ने जूली से कहा, जो नई थी, कि उसे हैलोवीन के लिए तैयार होना चाहिए।
mt: Barry told Julie, who was new, that she should be getting ready for Halloween.
ref: Barry told Julie, who was new, that she should dress up for Halloween.

src: उसने मैराथन के लिए प्रशिक्षण शुरू करने का फैसला किया।
mt: She decided to start training for a marathon.
ref: He decided to begin training for a marathon.

src: मुझे थोड़ी देर हो गई थी, इसलिए मैं जल्दी में था।
mt: I was a little late, so I was in a hurry.
ref: I was a little late, so I was in a hurry.

src: लड़कियां साथ में हसीं।
mt: 2 girls laughing together.
ref: The girls giggled together.

src: उसने देखा कि उसके घर की लाइट चालू नहीं हो रही थी।
mt: He saw that his house's light was not coming on.
ref: He noticed the lights in his home wouldn't turn on.

src: उसने कहा कि मैं तेज गति से जा रहा था।
mt: He said he was going fast.
ref: He said I had been speeding.

src: वह हमेशा दरवाजे से बाहर जाने में देर करता था।
mt: He always delayed going out the door.
ref: He was always late going out the door.

src: वह एक बड़ी लड़ाई के लिए तैयार हो रहा था।
mt: He was preparing for a big fight.
ref: He was getting ready for a big fight.

src: वह बड़ी यात्रा के लिए अपना पैसा बचाता है।
mt: He saves his money for a big trip.
ref: He saves up his money for the big trip.

src: एक दिन उसने एक को एक यार्ड सेल पर देखा।
mt: 1 day he saw a yard sale on a yard.
ref: One day he saw one at a yard sale.

src: कुछ पौधों को छोड़कर उनके पास एक नए टैंक के लिए ज़रूरी सब कुछ था।
mt: Except for a few plants, they had everything they needed for a new tank.
ref: They had everything they needed for a new tank except for some plants.

src: उसके आने के बाद, उसने महसूस किया कि वह बर्फ भूल गई है!
mt: After his arrival, he realized that he had forgotten the ice!
ref: After she arrived, she realized she had forgotten the ice!

src: उसने अपने माता-पिता से कहा कि वह इसके लिए जिम्मेदार होगी।
mt: He told his parents he would be responsible for it.
ref: She told her parents she would be responsible for it.

src: या कम से कम, उन्होंने कोशिश की।
mt: Or at least, they tried.
ref: Or at least, they tried to.

src: वह जानता था कि उस सपने को हासिल करने के लिए उसे कड़ी मेहनत करनी होगी।
mt: He knew that to achieve that dream, he would have to work hard.
ref: He knew that he would have to work hard to achieve that dream.

src: उसने पेड़ों के नीचे पाइनकोन का एक गुच्छा इकट्ठा किया।
mt: He gathered a bunch of pinecones under the trees.
ref: She gathered a bunch of pinecones under the trees.

src: हम एक ऐसे रेस्तरां में गए, जिसमें जंगल की थीम थी।
mt: We went to a restaurant with a jungle theme.
ref: We went to a restaurant that had a jungle theme.

src: उसने देखा कि उसके घर में स्पेगेटी और सॉस है।
mt: He saw spaghetti and sauce in his house.
ref: She notices that she has spaghetti and sauce in the house.

src: लीया का भाई भी उनके साथ लड़ा था।
mt: Leia's brother also fought with her.
ref: Leia's brother also fought with them.

src: तो जब उसने फोन गिराया तो उसे पता था कि यह आफ़त थी।
mt: So when he dropped the phone, he knew it was a disaster.
ref: So when she dropped the phone she knew it was trouble.

src: वह डॉक्टर के पास गई और उसने पाया कि उसे चिंता की बीमारी है।
mt: She went to the doctor and he found that she had an anxiety disorder.
ref: She went to the doctor and she discovered she had anxiety.

src: जल्दी में, वह गाड़ी से हाउसकोट और चप्पल पहनकर स्कूल गई।
mt: She quickly put on her housecoat and slippers and went to school.
ref: In a hurry, she drove to school in housecoat and slippers.

src: वह अपनी प्रस्तुति के लिए अभ्यास कर रही थी।
mt: She was practicing her presentation.
ref: She was practicing for her recital.

src: उसे अपना आना-जाना पसंद नहीं है।
mt: He does not like his comings and goings.
ref: He doesn't like his commute.

src: आज रात बड़ा गेम था।
mt: It was a big game tonight.
ref: Tonight was the big game.

src: उसने शिकायत की कि उसे सोने में परेशानी होती है।
mt: She complained that she had trouble sleeping.
ref: She complained that she had trouble sleeping.

src: काम के बाद, वह जिम चला गया।
mt: After work, he went to the gym.
ref: After work, he drove to the gym.

src: तो वह बाहर गई और अपने ब्लॉक के चारों ओर वॉक किया।
mt: So she went out and walked around her block.
ref: So she went outside and walked around her block.

src: उसने पैसे कमाने के लिए पेपर बाटने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to make money by selling paper.
ref: She decided to deliver papers to earn money.

src: उन्होंने 5 मिनट तक बात की।
mt: 5 minutes of conversation.
ref: They talked for 5 minutes.

src: उसकी माँ ने उसे अपना कंप्यूटर ठीक करने के लिए बुलाया।
mt: His mother called him to fix her computer.
ref: His mother called him over to fix her computer.

src: आज ही मैंने उन्हें एक ऐसे प्रार्थी के साथ घोटाला करते देखा, जिससे मैं प्यार करने लगा था।
mt: I saw him cheating on a client with whom I had fallen in love today.
ref: Just today I watched them scam a requester I had grown to love.

src: वह उन्हें नाश्ता करने के लिए पार्क में ले गई।
mt: She took them to the park to eat breakfast.
ref: She took them to the park to eat a snack.

src: डैना के पति ग्लेन को लगता है कि उसकी माँ उसे जहर देने की कोशिश कर रही है।
mt: Glenn thinks his mother is trying to poison him.
ref: Dana's husband Glenn thinks her mother is trying to poison him.

src: इस फैशन वीक को करने के लिए उसके पास लगभग बारह अलग-अलग शो थे।
mt: She had about twelve different shows to do for this fashion week.
ref: She had about twelve different shows to do this fashion week.

src: हम अपना सारा सामान पैक कर ट्रक में लाद देते।
mt: We pack all our stuff and load it into the truck.
ref: We would pack up all our stuff and load them into the truck.

src: गिल ने प्रत्येक एपिसोड देखा था।
mt: Gil watched each episode.
ref: Gill had seen every episode.

src: पिछले शनिवार वह करीब आया था।
mt: He was close last Saturday.
ref: Last Saturday he came close.

src: प्रेमी उसकी उपस्थिति से बेखबर थे।
mt: 1. His lover was oblivious to his presence.
ref: The lovers were oblivious to his presence.

src: डंक लाल और खुजलीदार था, लेकिन शुरू में इसने परेशान नहीं किया।
mt: It was itchy and red, but initially it didn't bother me.
ref: The bite was red and itchy, but it didn't bother him at first.

src: उसे हमेशा अपने दोस्तों में से सबसे अच्छे ग्रेड मिलते थे।
mt: He always got the best grades among his friends.
ref: She always got the best grades out of her friends.

src: उसे उसके साथ बातें करना और समय बिताना अच्छा लगता था।
mt: He liked to talk to him and spend time with him.
ref: He enjoyed talking to her and spending time with her.

src: एक दिन एक आदमी दुकान में आता है और उसे घर ले जाता है।
mt: 1 day, a man comes to a store and takes him home.
ref: One day a man comes in the store and takes it home.

src: वह और उसकी माँ लगभग दो घंटे से लाइन में इंतजार कर रहे थे।
mt: He and his mother had been waiting in line for about two hours.
ref: Her and her mother waited in line for what seemed like two hours.
